name: 數值方法
syllabus:
先修課程：3002011或負責教授同意。基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始與邊界值問題之數值解法。
1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the numerical method 2. Numerical methods of solving nonlinear algebraic equations. 3. Numerical methods of solving systems of linear equations. 4. Numerical interpolation and extrapolation. 5. Numerical differentiation and integration.6. Numerical methods of ordinary differential equations with initial-value problems and boundary value problems.
progress:
Week 1: Course Introduction and Overview

    Introduction to Numerical Methods
    Overview of the course, expectations, and resources
    Introduction to mathematical modeling and problem-solving with computers

Week 2: Foundations of Numerical Computing

    Introduction to numerical computing languages
    Basics of floating-point arithmetic and representation on computers

Week 3: Mathematical Modeling Techniques

    Translating real-world problems into mathematical models
    Introduction to simple numerical algorithms

Week 4: Error Analysis

    Understanding numerical accuracy, stability, and round-off errors
    Significance and impact of errors in computational methods

Week 5: Linear Algebra - Basic Concepts

    Overview of matrix operations and their computational aspects
    Introduction to systems of linear equations

Week 6: Linear Algebra - Advanced Concepts

    Direct and iterative methods for solving linear systems
    Eigenvalue problems and decompositions

Week 7: Interpolation and Approximation

    Polynomial and spline interpolation
    Approximation theory and practice

Week 8: Numerical Integration and Differentiation

    Techniques and methods for numerical integration
    Numerical differentiation and its applications

Week 9: Solving Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs)

    Overview of ODEs and numerical methods for solving them
    Initial value problems and boundary value problems

Week 10: Solving Partial Differential Equations (PDEs)

    Introduction to PDEs and numerical methods for solving them
    Finite difference and finite element methods

Week 11: Monte Carlo Methods

    Introduction to Monte Carlo simulations
    Applications in physical sciences and engineering

Week 12: Numerical Optimization

    Basic concepts in optimization
    Gradient-based and gradient-free optimization methods

Week 13: Advanced Topics in Numerical Linear Algebra

    Sparse matrix techniques
    Advanced decomposition methods and their applications

Week 14: Numerical Methods in Data Science

    Numerical techniques in data fitting and regression
    Introduction to machine learning algorithms

Week 15: High-Performance Numerical Computing

    Understanding parallel computing and its use in numerical methods
    Introduction to GPUs and distributed computing

Week 16: Review and Project Work

    Comprehensive review of course material
    Guidance and consultation for final projects

Week 17: Final Project Presentations

    Presentation of final projects by students
    Peer review and feedback sessions

Week 18: Course Wrap-up and Examination

    Final examination covering the entire course content
    Feedback and course closure

Each week will include lectures, readings from the recommended texts, and practical assignments or problem sets to reinforce the concepts taught.
grading:
Homework 40%
Midterm oral exam 30%
Final oral exam 30%
textbook: self-made materials

name: 熱處理
syllabus:
先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 
1. fundamental metallographic concepts.
2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.
3. Hardenability 
4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 
5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

name: 人工智慧
syllabus: 人工智慧已在各個領域中影響人類生活，特別是在機器學習與深度學習技術的發展。本課程為人工智慧領域的入門課程，旨在提供學生關於機器學習的基本概念，其中包含了分類以及迴歸類演算法、神經網路、深度學習於電腦視覺的應用以及生成式AI的介紹等內容。課程亦提供實際人工智慧問題的Python程式給予學生練習。透過理論以及實作的訓練，本課程最終目標則是希望學生能夠將這些人工智慧技術應用在當前的工程以及工業問題中。

name: 智慧鐵道系統導論
syllabus:
本課程為本校「智慧鐵道學程」的進階基礎課程。課程開授之目標，是希望藉由先進智慧鐵道系統的介紹，使修課學生能夠清楚瞭解鐵道產業的未來發展方向，並引領學生積極投入各種先進智慧鐵道應用系統之研究。本課程是以同時段合院授課的方式、針對選讀學程之學生、邀請智慧鐵道系統相關、學有專精的技術研發人員、以業師的身份共同參與授課。本課程會要求修課同學於期末報告時進行實作系統的展示，並邀請鐵道產業專家擔任評審。修習本課程前，不同學系之學生須先修習的課程清單另訂定之。
This course is one of the advanced core courses for the Intelligent Railway Curriculum. The aim of this course is, via the introduction of advanced intelligent rail system, to have the students realize thoroughly the development trend of futuristic rail industry, and subsequently, to encourage the students into the research and development of various application systems for intelligent railway. This course is a joint lecture among departments inside our college with synchronized class hours. The industrial instructors to our participant students include R&D experts from relevant fields in intelligent rail industry. In their term reports, the students will have to demonstrate the prototypes of their projects and to be reviewed by the invited senior professionals from rail industry. The prerequisites for taking this course will be determined based on the background of students with different majors.

name: 數位製造結合 AI 科技應用(二)
syllabus:
本課程將企業教育訓練的專精、實務、效益特質融入學校實務課程。企業教育訓練講究課程要專精、內容要具體針對需求、以實務技術做講解、要能有具體成效、講求時間效率。本課程以落地產業應用技術主題，導入德國工業大學任務導向學習模式，課程教導學生從建置雲端資料庫伺服器到撰寫三機一體網頁控制程式進行工廠CPS產銷戰情資訊管理系統，串聯工廠人機物料及生產線與品管，並實務教導開發AI瑕疵檢測模型，再利用人機操控PLC達到機聯網，進行工廠整廠資訊連線。另外，本課程特別加強AI瑕疵檢測技術與應用，導入產業AI技術搭配教學。今年的課程將加入生成式AI，教導學生應用及開發生成式AI應用。
This course integrates the specialization, practice, and benefit characteristics of corporate education and training into the school's practical courses. Enterprise education and training emphasizes that the curriculum should be specialized, the content should be specific to the needs, the explanation should be based on practical skills, it should be able to have specific results, and it should pay attention to time efficiency. This course is based on the theme of landing industrial application technology, and introduces the task-oriented learning model of the German Technical University. The course teaches students from building a cloud database server to writing a three-in-one webpage control program to implement a factory CPS production and marketing war situation information management system, and connect factories in series. Man-machine material and production line and quality control, and practical teaching to develop AI defect detection model, and then use man-machine control PLC to achieve machine networking, and carry out information connection of the whole factory. In addition, this course especially strengthens AI defect detection technology and application, and introduces industrial AI technology for teaching.

name: 數位化製造
syllabus:
全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位工廠。數位製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位製造概論、數位製造實例說明、商業模型分析、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站。
Brief: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc

name: 數位影像處理
syllabus:

1. Fundamental digital image, 2. Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 3. Image enhancement in the frequency domain, 4. Image restoration, 5. Color image processing, 6. Morphological image processing, 7. Image segmentation, 8. Image compression. 9. Machine vision system.

name: 3D列印實作
syllabus: ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對其中的光聚合固化及材料擠製技術進行軟硬體材料的剖析，並導入實作。本課程鼓勵學生在修課後，參加IPAS 3D列印實作考科之工程師級考試。

name: 軟體工程
syllabus:
課程主要介紹軟體工程的原理，透過軟體工程的訓練讓學生熟悉軟體開發的流程、方法與技術，讓學生可以獲得開發高品質軟體的能力。本課程將介紹下列主題：
(1)	軟體工程簡介 
(2)	軟體流程模型 
(3)	需求工程 
(4)	軟體設計方法 
(5)	軟體測試與驗證 
(6)	軟體專案管理與規劃 
(7)	軟體工程進階主題
This course is to introduce the principle of software engineering. The course aims to provide software engineering discipline for students to exercise the process, methods, and techniques of software development. Students will gain the ability for developing high quality software. The course will cover the following topics: 
(1) An Overview of Software Engineering 
(2) Software Process Models 
(3) Requirements Engineering 
(4) Software Design Methods 
(5) Software Testing Strategy and Tactics 
(6) Software Project Management and Planning 
(7) Advanced Topics in Software Engineering

name: 資料結構
syllabus:
課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序，搜尋。
This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

name: 高科技專利取得與攻防
syllabus: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。因此本課程主要強調專利策略與專利布局分析在企業界的運用分析。
progress:
主題一 (第1~4週):
PCT 專利系統、多國專利與檢索報告閱讀、國際專利家族與布局、國際專利申請策略。
主題二(第5~15週):
老師會在開學第一周提供約10幾篇papers供同學們閱讀，主題與下列有關
Patent strategy、Patent portfolio、Patent mapping、Patent quality、patent life cycle、Knowledge flows、patent classification
主題三 (第16~18週):
請同學在期初提出期末報告之proposal，並與老師討論，並在最後期末時進行期末報告。
grading: 1 st Mid-exam (30%)、2nd- Mid Exam (30 %)、Final reports (40%)
textbook: 劉國讚，”國際專利分析與佈局”，元照出版社
note2: 機械大四、機電所和智財所合開,大學部限13人

name: 非傳統加工
syllabus:
先修課程：3001018或負責教授同意。介紹特殊加工如超音波加工、放電加工、雷射加工、化學蝕刻、電化學加工、電子束加工、高壓水束加工等，及表面處裡技術等，除了說明加工原理外並探討各加工法之技術。
This course provides an introduction to special material processing methods including ultrasonic machining,  electrical-discharge machining, laser-material processing, chemical machining, electrochemical machining, electron-beam machining, hydrodynamic machining, and surface treatment techniques, In addition to the principles, techniques for the corresponding process will be discussed.

name: 控制實務設計
syllabus: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程主要說明如何應用自動控制理論與概念於機電一體化控制系統之實務設計；課程內容包括：控制設計基本概念、頻率域控制設計、常用控制系統架構、以及傳動機構與致動器/感測器等機電一體化控制系統之關鍵與整合。本課程進行控制系統模擬與實驗，同學們可體會控制系統之實務設計與應用，培養與建立機電一體化控制系統分析與設計之基礎能力。

name: 學院指定向度-社會與法治
學院指定向度-創新與創業
工程材料
syllabus:
先修課程：負責教授同意。材料一般性質之介紹、化學對材料性質的影響、原子在晶體內的堆積方式及X光繞射、固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散、固體傳導電子特性、凝固的各種物理性質、相金屬和有關的各種機械性質、鋼鐵材料及其應用。
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
General Properties of Materials, Chemical Effects to Material Properties, Atomic Packing Types in Crystals and X-ray Diffraction, Imperfections of Atomic Arrangement in Solids and Atomic Diffusion, Conduction of Electrons in Solids, Solidification, Physical Properties, Metals and their Mechanical Properties, Ferrous Materials and their Applications.

name: 機動學
syllabus:
先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組、凸輪、齒輪、傳動組等的介紹。
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
Introduction of the principles that all the members of a mechanical system have to obey in motion as well as the forces transmitted between the members. Examples include linkages, cams, gears, pure rolling systems, etc.

grading:

Projects (30%): competition score (10%), final report (10%), oral presentation (10%)

name: 工程數學(二)
syllabus: 先修課程：3002011或負責教授同意。特徵值、特徵向量及特徵函數，向量分析、向量微積分、傅立葉級數與邊界值問題、偏微分方程、複變函數。
progress:
第一週：向量分析，基礎向量、向量函數 (Basic Vectors, Vector Functions)
第二週：向量分析，曲線、多變數函數微分 (Curves, Functions of Derivatives of Several Variables)
第三週：向量分析，梯度、散度、旋度 (Gradient, Divergence, and Curl)
第四週：向量分析，圓柱座標與球座標 (Cylindrical and Spheric Coordinates) 
第五週：向量分析，線積分與面積分、格林定理 (Line and Surface Integral, Green’s Lemma)   
第六週：向量分析，體積分、史托克定理與高斯定理 (Volume Integral, Stokes’ and Gauss’s Theorem)
第七週：傅立葉分析，正交性、傅立葉級數 (Orthogonality, Fourier Series)
第八週：傅立葉分析，傅立葉正弦和餘弦級數, 相位角形式 (Sine and Cosine series, Phase Angle Form)
第九週：期中考 (Midterm Exam)
第十週：傅立葉分析，傅立葉積分 (Fourier Integral)
第十一週：傅立葉分析，傅立葉變換 (Fourier Transfer)
第十二週：複變分析，複變函數 (Functions of a Complex Variable)
第十三週：複變分析，複平面積分 (Integration in the Complex Plane)
第十四週：複變分析 ，數列與留數 (Series and Residues)
第十五週：複變分析 ，等角映射 (Conformal Mapping)
第十六週：偏微分方程，斯徒姆-劉維邊界條件 (Sturm–Liouville Boundary Condition)
第十七週：偏微分方程，邊界值問題求解 ( Solving Boundary-Value Problems)
第十八週：期末考 (Final Exam)
grading:
平常成績 30% 
期中考：35%
期末考 ：35%
textbook: 課本：Advanced Engineering Mathematics, 7/e , Dennis G. Zill, Jones & Bartlett Learning.

name: 工業電子學及實驗
syllabus: 本課程將簡介感測器及其應用之後再進入電晶體特性與辨識課程，了解電壓增幅與電力控制概念 並學習如何計算與實作電路，另外控制元件常用的接面場效電晶體(JFET) 及金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)也會透過電晶體教學課程進行實際馬達控制實驗。在本課程的後半也將介紹OP放大器的特性及其應用電路 並解釋回授電路的特性，最後將介紹一些常用的電路並分析電路的特行。

工程材料
syllabus:
本教學目標是材料在工業之各種不同領域上扮演著舉足輕重的關鍵性角色，故將金屬材料學的基礎理論及使用日趨廣泛的鋁合金、鈦合金、陶瓷材料、聚合體及複合材料作一一的介紹，必可使您瞭解各種工程材料之種類及其特性與特徵。
The learning objectives of this course are that materials play a crucial role in different fields of industry. Therefore, the basic theories of metal materials science and the increasingly widely used aluminum alloys, titanium alloys, ceramic materials, polymers and composite materials are introduced one by one. It will surely enable you to understand the types and characteristics of various engineering materials.

name: 流體力學
syllabus:

Incompressible fluid, mass conservation, invoiced flow, Bernoulli principle, linear, angular momentum conservation and application, vortex, and potential flow, Navier-Stoke equation, pressure loss, boundary layer flow, separation flow, lift and drag, Reynold analogy and applications.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life. Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
微積分
syllabus:
本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

name: 物理
syllabus:
本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

name: 物理實驗
syllabus: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。

name: 靜力學
syllabus: 藉由本課程了解工程力學中靜力學之各項定理，並以常見之結構問題為例，實際應用各定理。本課程包含: 簡介、向量運算、力、力矩、平衡方程式、等效力系、粒子平衡、剛體平衡、分散力系、形心及質心、結構應用、桁架、樑及纜繩。

Metrology Introduction, distance measurements, angular measurements, measurement of geometrical tolerance (straightness, parallelism, squareness, roundness, flatness, etc.), temperature measurements, force, torque and strain measurement, Velocity/Speed Measurement, gear measurements, CMM measurement, machine tool metrology, Micro- and Nano-scale measurement, Metrology for semiconductor devices.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
本課程教授商業領域知識以及實務應用。修習本課程之學生，將習得中高階英語素養以及商務溝通基本知識。課程內容包含: 基礎商業概念、重點時事商業議題、基本商業字彙，和廣泛商業實務用語。
The course is designed for students who wish to strengthen English competence as well as increase their knowledge in business-related issues and expertise in future business practice. All students enrolled in this course are expected to be equipped with high-intermediate level of English proficiency as well as basic knowledge of effective business communication. This course covers rudimentary business concepts, important current business events, essential business terms, and English use in business practice.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 微積分
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。
progress:
第 1~3   週 : Techniques of Integration, Applications of integration
第 4~7   週 : Parametric equations, Polar Coordinates
第 8~10  週 : Series, Vectors and the Geometry Space
第 11~14 週 : Partial Derivatives
第 15~17 週 : Multiple Integrals
第 18 週 : 期末考
grading:
1.小考兩次：30%
2.出席與學習狀況：5%
3.期中考：30%
4.期末考：35%

  Essential Calculus Metric Version Early Transcendentals (custom solution, 2e)  
  作者:James Stewart, Daniel Clegg, Saleem Watson

 (1)書名:Essential Calculus Early Transcendentals (2nd edition) 
  作者:Ron Larson & Bruce H. Edwards 
 (2)書名:微積分(第2版) 
  作者:吳舜堂、洪春凰、林建洲、林建仲、林晶璟、劉國安

name: 靜力學
syllabus:
先修課程：負責教授同意。力系的平衡、摩擦、面積與質量慣性矩、結構分析、虛功法。
Equivalent Systems of Forces, Static Equilibrium ,Area And Mass Moments of Inertia, Analysis of Structures, Methods of Virtual Work.
progress:
藉由本課程了解工程力學中靜力學之各項定理，並以常見之結構問題為例，實際應用各定理。本課程包含: 簡介、向量運算、力、力矩、平衡方程式、等效力系、粒子平衡、剛體平衡、分散力系、形心及質心、結構應用、桁架、樑及纜繩。
W1. Introduction
W2-W4. Statics of particles (plane)
W5-W6. Statics of particles (space)
W7-W8. Rigid bodies: Equivalent systems of forces
W9. Midterm exam
W10-W11 Rigid bodies: Equivalent system of forces
W12-W14. Equilibrium of rigid bodies
W15-W17. Analysis of structures
W18. Final exam
textbook:
教科書: 
Vector Mechanics for Engineers: Statics (10th edition,導讀版), By Beer , Johnston & Mazurek/莊嘉陽導讀，滄海書局

Engineering Mechanics: Statics (15th edition in SI units), by Hibbeler, 高立圖書

name: 專業基礎實習(二)
syllabus: 先修課程：負責教授同意。依所欠專長及發展專題需要選項實習，每學期以兩項為原則，項次含：1.機工實習：車床、銑床、鉗工等。2.鑄鍛實習：鑄造或鍛造等。3.焊接實習：鈑金及氣焊、電弧焊實習。
progress:
週次 講授內容概要
第一週  教學內容簡介、工廠安全規則、安全衛生教育訓練講解與說明、實施學生分組、開工與收工的工作分配、領取刀具與工具、實習材料預備與分配。
第二週  量具介紹，游標卡尺、游標高度規原理、使用例與保養。
第三週  高速車床的構造與操作練習；車刀介紹，各型車刀角度；砂輪機使用與注意事項，高速鋼車刀研磨。
第四週  車削練習：三、四爪夾持；車刀架設與校正；切削速度、進刀量、切削深度選擇，自動進刀使用。
第五週  車削練習：階級、端面車削練習。
第六週  車削練習、尺寸控制：游標卡尺量測，進給手輪刻度使用。
第七週  螺紋定義、切削原理；後列齒輪、螺紋指示器介紹；牙刀研磨，螺紋指示器操作練習。
第八週  螺紋切削：中心規使用、牙深計算。
第九週  螺紋切削：光度、牙深檢討。
第十週  螺紋切削：不同進給方式。
第十一週  螺紋切削練習。
第十二週  鑽床介紹，鑽床種類、工件夾持；鑽頭、絲攻介紹、手弓鋸使用；鋸切、鑽孔、攻牙練習。
第十三週  車床雙頂心加工介紹：雞心夾頭使用、中心鑽使用，活頂心車削。
第十四週  雙頂心加工。
第十五週  綜合操作。
第十六週  綜合操作。
第十七週  綜合操作與測驗、實習報告繳交。
第十八週  期末考試：工廠整理，機器保養。
grading:
本中心實習成績:出勤、平時表現、學習態度(40%)，實習報告(30%)，實作工件(30%)。
學期成績:
1.各加工中心實習成績（平均）佔90％。
2.依學生學習態度、公眾服務、團隊合作佔10％。

name: 電工原理及實驗
syllabus:
先修課程：負責教授同意
第一部份（電工原理）：電路元件、直流電阻電路、直流電容電路、電磁感應、直流電感
電路、直流電機、交流電路、變壓器、三相交流、三相感應電動機、單相感應電動機、
同步電動機、電工儀表設備。
第二部分（電工實驗）：三用電表量測、電磁開關動法、電動機之順序控制、RC電路
之量測、感應電動機之Ｙ－△降壓動法、直流馬達與直流發電機、、繞線式感應馬達、
直流伺服馬達速度及位置控制、變頻器與感應馬達速度控制。
progress:

第3,4 週 電阻器,功率計算,瓦特數計算

第13 週  交流電特性與基本性質 
第14 週  交流電方程式計算
第15 週 交流電壓與交流電流相位變化分析

第17 週  交流電功率計算與截止頻率點計算 
第 18 週 期末考 (停課)

name: 自動化機構設計
syllabus: 本課程目標在於認識自動化機構設計的架構與原理，由元件組配、機構設計、機電控制邏輯設計等三方面進行分析與探討。並藉由介紹相關自動化機構之原理、特徵及合成、分析之要領，讓同學學習建立設計及分析自動化機構的方法，以奠定未來從事機械設計與製作自動化設備之基礎。

name: 流體力學
syllabus:
先修課程：物理或負責教授同意。不可壓縮流體、質量不滅、非黏性流體之運動、柏努力定律、線性及角動量定理及其應用、渦流與勢流、黏性流、納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及應用、管中壓力頭損失及增加、邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
Incompressible fluid, mass conservation, invoiced flow, Bernoulli principle, linear, angular momentum conservation and application, vortex, and potential flow, Navier-Stoke equation, pressure loss, boundary layer flow, separation flow, lift and drag, Reynold analogy and applications.

第8週 	Introduction to Differential analysis of Fluid Motion (I)

第14週 	Internal Incompressible Viscous Flow (II)

第16週 	Internal Incompressible Viscous Flow (IV)	 
第17週 	External Incompressible Viscous Flow
第18週 	期末考

name: 實務專題(一)
syllabus:
先修課程：負責教授同意。學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。經選定後之題目在第一學期修完時如欲換題目時須在第一學期成績打出後，再徵求原來及新接手老師都同意才可更換題目。
The topic of the special project is discussed and decided together by the students and the advisor. Under the face-to-face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester. The students can't change their chosen topic during the semester, except after the grade of the term being filed and under the consents of the original advisor and new advisor.

name: 機器人學
syllabus: This course will teach students kinematic analysis methods, trajectory motion technologies, dynamic analysis methods, and force control methods for manipulators and robot arms. It will enable students to perform robotics research and develop applications in the future. This course first introduces the architectures and industrial applications of various fix-based manipulators and robot arms. Subsequently, this course will cover detailed methods and technologies including kinematic analysis, path and trajectory planning, dynamic analysis, and control design and analysis.

name: 高科技專利取得與攻防
syllabus: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。因此本課程主要強調專利策略與專利布局分析在企業界的運用分析。
progress:
主題一 (第1~4週):
PCT 專利系統、多國專利與檢索報告閱讀、國際專利家族與布局、國際專利申請策略。
主題二(第5~15週):
老師會在開學第一周提供約10幾篇papers供同學們閱讀，主題與下列有關
Patent strategy、Patent portfolio、Patent mapping、Patent quality、patent life cycle、Knowledge flows、patent classification
主題三 (第16~18週):
請同學在期初提出期末報告之proposal，並與老師討論，並在最後期末時進行期末報告。
grading: 1 st Mid-exam (30%)、2nd- Mid Exam (30 %)、Final reports (40%)
textbook: 劉國讚，”國際專利分析與佈局”，元照出版社
note2: 機械大四、機電所和智財所合開,研究所限7人

name: 雷射原理與應用
syllabus: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2.雷射基本原理  3.各種雷射介紹  4.雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用

name: 電腦輔助工程
syllabus: This is a project based course to learn how to use the computer software to aid the engineering design. Students will form groups and choose a topic to design a mechanical device. Each group will have several presentations in the semester, which includes mechanical device selection, motivation, motion requirements, CAD drawing for the design, trouble shooting, and the simulation results. At the end of the semester, it is required to turn in a formal report that concludes the progress and the results.

	Motion simulations.
	Force analysis and static simulations.
	Dynamic simulations

name: 雲端資料庫技術
syllabus:
工業4.0智能工廠因為大量使用電腦資訊流進行智慧控制達到產線無人化境地，雲端資料庫技術是智能工廠的核心技術，從智慧排單到網頁控制，達到智能聯網與控制。本課程以落地產業應用技術主題，導入德國工業大學任務導向學習模式，課程教導學生從建置雲端資料庫伺服器到撰寫三機一體網頁控制程式進行工廠CPS產銷戰情資訊管理系統，串聯工廠人機物料及生產線與品管，再利用人機操控PLC達到機聯網，進行工廠整廠連線。
Industry 4.0 intelligent factory because of the heavy use of computer information flow for intelligent control to achieve the production line unmanned situation, cloud database technology is the core technology of intelligent factory, from smart single to web control, to achieve intelligent networking and control. This course to the landing industry application technology-based, imported into the German University of Technology task-oriented learning model, the course teaches students from the construction of a cloud database server to write a three-machine integrated web control program for factory CPS production and marketing information management system, series factory man-machine materials and production lines and quality control, and then use human-machine control PLC to achieve machine networking, factory-wide factory connection.

name: 顆粒物質流導論
syllabus: Granular material flows are commonly occurred in many industrial applications and nature hazards, such as fluidized bed, additive manufacturing, and debris avalanche. To provide a comprehensive understanding for granular materials flows, this course will be divided into three parts. We start from the basic flow characteristics of granular materials and its rheological models. Then, we will move to the simulation approaches for granular material flows in view of continuum and discrete description. Finally, the two-phase suspension system will be introduced, followed by the demonstration of practical industrial and geophysical applications for these complex flows.

name: 醫電工程概論
syllabus:
With the aging population trend, healthcare-related industries are already witnessing significant growth, and biomedical engineering plays a crucial role in this expanding market.

Biomedical engineering is an interdisciplinary field that leverages various engineering knowledge and technologies to contribute to biological research. Its primary goal is to provide information beneficial for the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of diseases in medicine.

Within the broad category of biomedical engineering, our focus will be on the field of medical electrical engineering, particularly in laser medicine. This specialization aims to offer information that aids in diagnosis and assists in the treatment and prevention of diseases.

Laser technology, recognized as one of the three great inventions of the 20th century, has found widespread applications in various medical fields. This course will delve into the following topics:

1. Basic principles of laser
2. Diverse applications of laser in medicine
3. Laser applications in dentistry
4. PBM PhotoBioModulation applications in Medicine and Dentistry
5. Advanced thesis writing in laser medicine

Join us to explore the cutting-edge advancements and applications of laser technology in the medical field.

name: 技術創新與管理
syllabus:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
本課程經由研究、分享、討論，瞭解科技創新轉型發展之趨勢，進行科技創新之思維與實例教學，使學生能瞭解創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流。內容包含科技未來趨勢和創新挑戰，企業核心技術、來源和取得，科技管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業發展生存之道，全球創新產品之開發與技術策略與戰略。
Through research, sharing, and discussion, this course aims to understand the trend of technological innovation, its transformation and development, to tell technological innovation, thought and examples, to enable students to understand the mode of innovation and related theories. The course will inspire students' creativity, and will promote the interaction between academia and industry. The course content includes the future trend of science, technology and innovation challenges, enterprise core technology with its source and acquisition. It also includes the science and technology management and risk which impact the national science and technology policy for enterprise development and survival, and the development of global innovative products and technology strategies and tactics.

name: 田口式品質設計法
syllabus:
本課程的學習目標是要讓學生學習「田口方法」的基本觀念，並且以實際案例做說明，讓學生學習專有名詞的定義及應用。課程內容包含：直交表實驗、品質計量方法(品質損失、S/N比之理論基礎及應用)、變異分析、案例說明。在學期結束時，應用「田口方法」進行專案主題研究，並繳交期末報告。
The learning goal of this course is to enable students to learn the basic concepts of the Taguchi Method. In addition, actual cases are used to explain, so that students can learn the definition and application of proper nouns. The course content includes: experiment with orthogonal arrays, quality measurement methods (theoretical basis and application of quality loss, S/N ratio), analysis of variance, and case description. At the end of the semester, apply the "Taguchi Method" to conduct project thematic research and submit the final report.

syllabus: 本課程介紹微處理機之基本原理與應用設計，包含CPU介紹與指令集、I/O與記憶體、及軟硬體架構等，並且結合微控制器(ARM-based Processor)程式設計與泛用型嵌入式系統平台，修課同學可以學習如何使用STM32的微控制平台開發微處理器的程式，以及結合超音波感測、馬達驅動控制、無線傳輸模組等，可應用於移動載具及機器人運動控制器架構設計與演算法開發，並延伸至人工智慧及IOT等相關處理器整合應用。

name: 鐵道車輛技術與跨領域設計
syllabus:
本課程開授之目標，在讓修習之學生能將鐵道車輛之工程技術與跨領域設計相互融合，在工程分析面能配合跨領域人文設計之需求，並在人文設計面瞭解工程之規範與要求。本課程內容包括鐵道車輛之系統基本架構、鐵道車輛結構及動態之基本工程分析技術、鐵道車輛車廂之功能性設計、及鐵道人文文化；本課程並配合軌道單位之校外參訪，讓課堂所學能與實務技術融合。本課程是以跨院合授的方式，由鐵道車輛技術研發中心、車輛系、文化事業發展系之師資共同參與授課。
This course aims to provide students the knowledge of engineering technology and interdisciplinary design for railway vehicles.  Design of railway vehicles should consider both the engineering and interdisciplinary cultural design at the same time.  A designer should consider not only engineering regulations and requirements, but also concepts of cultural design.  This course covers basic introduction of railway vehicle system, basic analysis of vehicle structures and dynamics, vehicle interior and exterior functional design, and railway culture.  The industrial tour in this course helps students to realize the theoretical and practical parts of railway vehicles.  This course is a joint lecture instructed by professional faculties from Railway Vehicle Research Center, Department of Vehicle Engineering, and Department of Cultural Vocation Development.

name: 自駕車理論與實務
syllabus:
透過自駕車理論與實務的課程講述，以及搭配業師實作經驗分享，除可以使修課同學對自駕車研究有基本概念之外，也可以藉本堂課引發對新興車輛技術研究領域與其實際應用之興趣。本課程涵蓋內容為自駕車軌跡規劃與控制、先進駕駛輔助控制設計、自駕車感知資料處理及物件偵測演算法、及AI技術應用於自駕車相關功能設計。本課程根據授課主題搭配實驗單元與期末專題，配合使用Matlab/Simulink、CarSim、Python、AI ToolBox等工具軟體，讓修課同學可應用課堂所學來進行自駕車演算法與技術開發，及透過模擬結果分析與驗證。
This course aims to teach the lessons of autonomous vehicle (AV) theory and practical applications. Moreover, with the experience sharing and cooperative lecturing from industrial experts, students can gain more knowledge about the fundamental concepts of AV research. The course introduces major contents including path planning and tracking control design, advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS), perception data processing and detection algorithms, and AI-based technologies in the applications of AV. The course will arrange some labs and the term project to provide students, through conducted simulation analysis and verification, with an in-depth understanding of the emerging technology of AV.

name: 車輛基礎化學
syllabus:
化學是富挑戰性且具教學難度之科目，使這個複雜的學科讓學生易於接受化學教育家的挑戰，特別是基礎化學。嘗試推展關鍵的化學概念，並以觀察現象為主，再討論理論模式，並用以解釋所觀測的現象是本課程的重點。希望學生實踐"如同一個化學家的思考方式"來仔細觀察，而不是跳入公式或模型中。此外，舉例證明化學在現實生活中的重要性與最新的應用及發展並以簡易明瞭的方式呈現於授課內容。
Chemistry is a fascinating and important subject that is challenging to teach and even more challenging to learn. Marking this complex subject accessible to students without distortion is challenge of the chemical educator, especially at the introductory level.
In this lecture I try to develop key chemical concept in the same way to show the observations first and then discuss the models that have been constructed to explain the observed behavior. I hope students will practice "thinking like a chemist" by carefully studying the observation to see if they can follow the thought process, rather than just jumping ahead to the equation or model that will follow.
In addition, to demonstrate the importance of chemistry in real life, I have incorporated throughout the book a number of applications and recent advances in essay form.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

name: 勞作教育
syllabus:
目標：
期望學生透過校園環境整理及打掃體驗活動，認識勞作教育之理念，並從實作課程中養成同學不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的企業家精神，同時建立學生手腦並用，勤勞愛物的觀念，培養學生健全的人格品德、正確的價值觀及刻苦耐勞的工作態度。

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
微積分
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。

name: 程式設計(二)
syllabus:
本課程為介紹程式設計相關之計算機進階觀念、教授C程式語言進階語法、及程式語言之基礎應用，以奠定學生之程式設計之基礎。本課程程式設計語言以 C 語言為基礎，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入 C++程式語言。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計之基礎。
This course covers advanced parts of computers and computer programming, including: operating systems, file and database, internet, C programming function and array, and C++ programming.  The basic computer programming concepts, i.e., Syntax and semantics of C and C++ programming languages, will be introduced to students. Topics cover the methods for analyzing problem, program designing using structured programming notions, and program debugging.

name: 高等熱傳學
syllabus:
本課程的目的是教授基本和先進的解決方案技術，包括精確和近似的方法，以解決廣泛的傳導傳熱問題。 其中包括多維穩態和暫態分析，重點是與傳熱相關的基礎物理學和基礎數學。因此，本課程將通過各種形式的控制傳熱方程的形式化求解技術來強調能量平衡和邊界條件的概念。
The goal of this course is to teach basic and advanced solution techniques, including exact and approximate approaches, for a wide range of conduction heat transfer problems. Included are both multidimensional steady state and transient analyses, with emphasis on the fundamental physics and underlying mathematics associated with heat transfer. Accordingly, this course will stress the concepts of energy balance and boundary conditions with a wide range of formal solution techniques for solution of governing heat transfer equations.

name: 智慧型控制
syllabus:
This course will teach the knowledge-based control methods, mainly focuses on Fuzzy logic control and Gray system (and neural network if time is available).  The Fuzzy method includes Fuzzy Logic theory and Fuzzy Logic Control.  
From this course, students can understand Fuzzy theory and can apply FLC and Grey in mechanical, electrical, or vehicle systems.  The topics covered in this lecture include: fuzzy set, membership function, fuzzification / defuzzification, fuzzy reasoning and inference, FLC design, FLC applications, grey theory, grey prediction, gray modeling, and grey control (and neural-network if time is available).  This lecture needs all students to do a 2- or 3-person team project to design and implement a fuzzy logic control to a real system.  Before the core lessons, a review of system dynamics will be provided.

name: 能源系統分析
syllabus:
The course is a fundamental carriers transport analysis method for performing steady-state and dynamic system simulations . These methods are essentially a numerical analysis; the course teach student to set up various system composed of; compressor, turbine, heat exchanger, reformer and fuel cell system. Course lectures are listed as:
1.	Numerical method 
2.     review of basic transport process: charge, gas and energy transfer 
2.	System components modeling 
Compressor 
Turbine 
Heat exchanger
3.	Case study of energy system; fuel cell system analysis
Flow modeling, GDL model, mass & charge transport and programing

name: 先進能源應用
syllabus:
介紹各種產能反應的原子分子層級理論，包括燃燒、氫生成反應、氧還原反應、二氧化碳還原反應，和電化學電池、燃料電池，新能源材料等物理化學反應程序，以及低碳應用。
This course introduces reactions of energy production in the insight of atomic and molecular scale, including combustion, hydrogen evolution reaction, oxygen reduction reaction, carbon dioxide reduction reaction, and physiochemical mechanisms of electrochemical cells, fuel cells, new energy materials, and low-carbon applications.

name: 鐵道車輛技術與跨領域設計
syllabus:
本課程開授之目標，在讓修習之學生能將鐵道車輛之工程技術與跨領域設計相互融合，在工程分析面能配合跨領域人文設計之需求，並在人文設計面瞭解工程之規範與要求。本課程內容包括鐵道車輛之系統基本架構、鐵道車輛結構及動態之基本工程分析技術、鐵道車輛車廂之功能性設計、及鐵道人文文化；本課程並配合軌道單位之校外參訪，讓課堂所學能與實務技術融合。本課程是以跨院合授的方式，由鐵道車輛技術研發中心、車輛系、文化事業發展系之師資共同參與授課。
This course aims to provide students the knowledge of engineering technology and interdisciplinary design for railway vehicles.  Design of railway vehicles should consider both the engineering and interdisciplinary cultural design at the same time.  A designer should consider not only engineering regulations and requirements, but also concepts of cultural design.  This course covers basic introduction of railway vehicle system, basic analysis of vehicle structures and dynamics, vehicle interior and exterior functional design, and railway culture.  The industrial tour in this course helps students to realize the theoretical and practical parts of railway vehicles.  This course is a joint lecture instructed by professional faculties from Railway Vehicle Research Center, Department of Vehicle Engineering, and Department of Cultural Vocation Development.

name: 節能車輛模擬與嵌入式系統
syllabus:
建立節能車輛模擬平台，用以評估主系統與次系統之性能與響應關係，並以行車型態為例，分析能量管理系統、引擎、馬達、燃料電池、變速箱與不同儲能電池彼此之特性影響，進一步完成整車調校與控制策略之修正；介紹節能車輛中所使用數學模型與相關理論，進一步連結到學生在實務時會遇到的實際案例，解釋所觀察到的物理反應現象。
Establish the energy-saving vehicle simulation platforms are developed in this study to evaluate performance and response between main system and subsystems. The driving cycles are adopted as an example and characteristics among energy management system (EMS), engine, motor, fuel cell, automated manual transmission (AMT) and Energy storage batteries are analyzed for further calibration and modification of control strategy. This course aims at teaching key mathematical models and related theories used in energy-saving vehicles, further links to actual cases that students will encounter on the scene, and explains the physical reaction phenomena observed.

name: 自駕車理論與實務
syllabus:
透過自駕車理論與實務的課程講述，以及搭配業師實作經驗分享，除可以使修課同學對自駕車研究有基本概念之外，也可以藉本堂課引發對新興車輛技術研究領域與其實際應用之興趣。本課程涵蓋內容為自駕車軌跡規劃與控制、先進駕駛輔助控制設計、自駕車感知資料處理及物件偵測演算法、及AI技術應用於自駕車相關功能設計。本課程根據授課主題搭配實驗單元與期末專題，配合使用Matlab/Simulink、CarSim、Python、AI ToolBox等工具軟體，讓修課同學可應用課堂所學來進行自駕車演算法與技術開發，及透過模擬結果分析與驗證。
This course aims to teach the lessons of autonomous vehicle (AV) theory and practical applications. Moreover, with the experience sharing and cooperative lecturing from industrial experts, students can gain more knowledge about the fundamental concepts of AV research. The course introduces major contents including path planning and tracking control design, advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS), perception data processing and detection algorithms, and AI-based technologies in the applications of AV. The course will arrange some labs and the term project to provide students, through conducted simulation analysis and verification, with an in-depth understanding of the emerging technology of AV.

name: 工程最佳化與應用
syllabus:
The course focuses on the fundamental theory and concept of "Engineering Optimization Methods", "Linear Programming", "Nonlinear Programming", "Multi-objective Function Optimization", "Modern Mathematical Planning Methods", and "Cross-Attribute System Optimization." Hands-on practices using optimization software, and term projects are some key elements. Students will report out their own term project at the end of the semester. 

In this semester, University Social Responsibility (USR) concept is brought into the class. Encourage student to participate the USR project. Guide students to apply the optimization method in the thinking and planning process. Through the study, students can have better understanding about the optimization principle and apply it to the daily activities. It is expected that students can apply what have learned in the classes to their own daily activities, vehicle design, and research applications; and combine USR project into the term projects. (Taught in English)

name: 潔淨動力系統特論
syllabus: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。

name: 工業日文
syllabus:
本課程教授日語基礎語法，以期建立自學興趣與啟發閱讀日文資料之能力。前階段教授五十音、助詞、形容詞及動詞變化等基礎；後半階段將學習句型結構及產業界實務日文。本教學著重日語基礎之語法架構練習,學成後亦能自行取得日本新科技知識，廣泛應用於未來工作及日常生活中.語言是不斷的自我學習.與時俱進。
This course teaches Japanese basic grammar, in order to establish students' ability to read and understand Japanese technical articles. The first half of the course teaches Japanese syllabary, auxiliary words, adjectives and verb conjugations, and then introduces Japanese grammar structure, common sentence patterns, etc… Focusing on the concepts and methods necessary for Japanese reading so that students can still enhance themselves and apply in work and daily life to read instructions and manuals of equipment or products.

syllabus:
教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name: 車輛基礎化學
syllabus:
化學是富挑戰性且具教學難度之科目，使這個複雜的學科讓學生易於接受化學教育家的挑戰，特別是基礎化學。嘗試推展關鍵的化學概念，並以觀察現象為主，再討論理論模式，並用以解釋所觀測的現象是本課程的重點。希望學生實踐"如同一個化學家的思考方式"來仔細觀察，而不是跳入公式或模型中。此外，舉例證明化學在現實生活中的重要性與最新的應用及發展並以簡易明瞭的方式呈現於授課內容。
Chemistry is a fascinating and important subject that is challenging to teach and even more challenging to learn. Marking this complex subject accessible to students without distortion is challenge of the chemical educator, especially at the introductory level.
In this lecture I try to develop key chemical concept in the same way to show the observations first and then discuss the models that have been constructed to explain the observed behavior. I hope students will practice "thinking like a chemist" by carefully studying the observation to see if they can follow the thought process, rather than just jumping ahead to the equation or model that will follow.
In addition, to demonstrate the importance of chemistry in real life, I have incorporated throughout the book a number of applications and recent advances in essay form.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
美學宗師朱光潛《談文學》：「文學是一種與人生最密切相關的藝術」；古希臘哲學家亞里斯多德《詩學》：「人的描寫居於文學的首要地位；而人生，勢必成為文學表現的主要對象，或文學表現的核心問題」。作家透過文字書寫，分享經過歲月積澱的生命經驗，反映時代現實，譜出喜怒哀樂之生命樂章；吾人透過閱讀，徜徉在文學世界當中，與作品中傳達的哲思、情感、人生故事共鳴，開拓視野，增加閱歷，思考生命存在的價值與意義。由此可知，文學與吾人現實人生誠習習相關。
本「國語文實務應用」課程，擬擷選中國古今文學作品，引領修課同學感受文學之美，體悟在塵世的繁華裡，古今情感、哲思的傳遞是有時空隔閡，是可以心心相映。由於是一學年課程，因此上學期課程內容，首先以文字與音樂交會之旅、詩歌的遊戲與創作此二單元，引領修課同學感受文字有何力量，以及詩情、詩意之況味。爾後，將擷選古今文史哲作品，引領同學認識文學中的愛情、文學中的親情。待下學期，接續引領修課同學認識文學中的友情、文學中的家國情、文學中的山水情。由此，再進一步思考如何擁抱幸福美好的人生、如何尋找讓自身幸福的青鳥。課堂中，將以講授與問題討論方式，對上課文本作深度的探討與詮釋。希冀修課同學們能掘發文學作品要義，探討文學與人生的關係，並進一步回歸吾人生命本身意義之探索。此外，並希冀修課同學能藉由閱讀、思考、書寫、討論，內觀自己的生命情境與思路，外觀蒼穹宇宙，自在悠遊於成長之道路。

name: 微積分
syllabus:
本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

name: 物理
syllabus:
本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

超低溫應用
syllabus: 超低溫冷凍通常指進行在-100℃以下特定低溫範圍之冷凍技術應用，高能能物理同步輻射冷卻，生物醫學胚胎冷凍保存，大型超低溫冷能氣化發電廠與中、長程飛彈推進系統冷卻技術等，現代微系統科技多方面高層次應用上之必要技術。故如何進行實質而有效整合超低溫系統技術，是決定未來國力競爭之主要關鍵項目。

name: 離岸風電之熱流與空氣動力學基礎
syllabus: 離岸風力發電是熱流與空氣動力學之基本原理與應用，特別於大四與研究所共同合開這門課。本課程內容主要包括:(1)離岸風電簡介，(2)流體力學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(3)熱傳學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(4)空氣動力學基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(5)電腦輔助離岸風機之氣動分析。

name: 新能源概論
syllabus:
本門課主要簡介各項新能源系統之原理與未來發展，內容包括以下﹕各種再生能源系統之應用與分析，燃料電池之應用與分析，生質能之應用，及新能源之應用效益分析。
This course is an introduction to the principles and future development of new energy system that includes the applications and analysis of different types of renewable energy, fuel cells, and bio-energy, analysis on the benefits of new energy applications.

name: 實務專題（一）
syllabus:
指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成硬體或軟體專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。
Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

name: 太陽能工程
syllabus:
太陽能工程是一門利用太陽之能量來提供人類能源之科學，太陽能為取之不盡用之不絕，且為乾淨又穩定之來源，在油價高漲且地球環境保護需求日益殷切的今日，太陽能之能源應用，已成為今日最熱門之學科。
本科目將由認識太陽、地球與太陽互動關係、地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之利用太陽能源有效裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。

Solar energy engineering is a science that uses the energy of the sun to provide human energy. Solar energy is inexhaustible, and it is a clean and stable source. Today, when oil prices are rising and the demand for environmental protection is increasing, solar energy is an energy source. Application has become the most popular subject today.
This subject will discuss the effective use of solar energy and related system technologies by understanding the sun, the interaction between the earth and the sun, and the basic thermal radiation theory of solar energy on the earth, combining various effective devices for using solar energy sources. It is hoped that in the existing solar energy utilization technology, more efficient solar energy source engineering system design will be used to lay the foundation for the high efficiency of solar energy source utilization in the future 21st century.

name: 科技日文
syllabus:
本課程教授日語基礎語法，以期建立自學興趣與啟發閱讀日文資料之能力。前階段教授五十音、助詞、形容詞及動詞變化等基礎；後半階段將學習句型結構及產業界實務日文。本教學著重日語基礎之語法架構練習,學成後亦能自行取得日本新科技知識，廣泛應用於未來工作及日常生活中.語言是不斷的自我學習.與時俱進。
This course teaches Japanese basic grammar, in order to establish students' ability to read and understand Japanese technical articles. The first half of the course teaches Japanese syllabary, auxiliary words, adjectives and verb conjugations, and then introduces Japanese grammar structure, common sentence patterns, etc… Focusing on the concepts and methods necessary for Japanese reading so that students can still enhance themselves and apply in work and daily life to read instructions and manuals of equipment or products.

name: 空調工程與設計
syllabus:
本門課藉由濕空氣線圖討論空氣調節之過程，分析人體舒適與空氣品質之需求，及各種空調設備系統之設計。本門課在空調負荷計算原理與方法涵蓋輻射熱、熱傳導及熱儲存效應等之分析，系統設計包括送風與送水系統之計算與設計，及室內送風分佈之理論與設計。
Air-conditioning processes are discussed by using psychrometric charts. Thermal comfort and indoor air quality requirements are presented. Design of air-conditioning equipment and systems are introduced. Air-conditioning load analysis includes radiation, transfer, and heat storage effects. System design includes design and calculation air and water moving systems. Air distribution principles and design are also covered.

name: 程式設計(二)
syllabus: 本課程教授一般認為最適合初學者的程式語言「Python」，目標期望修習者於本課程結束後，一方面獲得程式設計與運算思維的基本概念，一方面也能獨立撰寫出能解決運算問題的程式。本課程與一般程式設計課程不同，主要在於解決HVAC&R等領域的運算問題為導向，讓修習者除了學會程式設計的同時，也直接體會程式設計與資訊科技在HVAC&R等領域的各種應用。

name: 能源應用
syllabus:
能源相關之基本科學原理，能源之應用及未來發展趨勢，非再生能源及再生能源概論，電力與動力系統簡介，能源的有效變換，能源管理，有效能源之解析與評估，能源之使用與環保問題。
Basic scientific principles of energy, its applications and future development. Renewable and non-renewable energy will be discussed in general. General introduction to electricity and power generation. This course will also cover topics in effective energy conversion, energy management, evaluation and analysis of energy effectiveness, and related environmental problems.

name: 勞作教育
syllabus:
本課程目標是協助學生透過校園環境整理及打掃體驗活動，認識勞作教育之理念，從勞作課程中養成同學不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的企業家精神，使學生透過實際的勞作課程，培養學生手腦並用，勤勞愛物的觀念，培養學生健全的人格、良好品德、正確的價值觀及刻苦耐勞的工作態度。
課程內容：包含四大階段
（一）勞作教育理念介紹：選取勞作教育相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含勞作教育意義、勞作教育前測作業說明
（二）勞作教育實作階段：勞作課程分三項不同情境施作。
（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須於各實作階段課程進行討論與反思，並撰寫心得報告、完成後測作業。
（四）期末成果分享：勞作教育期末成果分享，並辦理獎勵工作。
The purpose of this course is to introduce the idea of labor service to students. Students who take this course have to participate in the campus cleaning activities. This is to help students building up: (i) the team-work abilities; (ii) the concepts of ethics; (iii) the abilities of concerning the society. In addition, the course would help students to develop the accurate attitudes in the daily life and the healthy personalities. Furthermore, this course would also help students to enrich the sense of humanities. Four stages are included in this course: (i) the introduction of the labor service, (ii) the field work studies, (iii) the class discussions, and (iv) sharing of the experiences of the labor service.
progress:
第一階段：勞作教育理念介紹
由授課教師於課堂上講述勞作教育的意義及學期課程內容。
第二階段：實作體驗及反思
透過校園及外圍環境整理，讓同學們體驗不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的精神，並於體驗後進行討論，啟發同學多元思考。
第三階段：期末成果分享
學期末彙整學期課程剪影，並回顧反思學習成果。
grading: 於各實作階段課程進行討論與反思，並撰寫心得報告

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
微積分
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。

name: 物理
syllabus: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。

name: 物理實驗
syllabus: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行為一學分三小時，內容偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。

name: 化學及實驗
syllabus:
本課程將從基本空調相關之冷媒化學理論入門，藉由各種冷媒系統之氣、液相臨界溫度、壓力與比容積等性質，各純物質成份與混合物之熱力學性質、蒸氣壓與相變化焓值，標準自由能形成，熱容、表面張力、黏度、熱傳導、擴散係數以及相平衡等因素，探討比較各別冷煤系統化學上之外延及內含性質。此外亦配合相關課程進行實驗操作，加深學習效果。
This course presents a critical review of various estimation procedures for a limited number of properties of gases and liquids: Critical and other pure component properties, PVT and thermodynamic properties of pure components and mixtures, vapor pressures, and phase-change enthalpies, standard enthalpies of formation, standard gibbs energies, thermal conductivity, diffusion coefficients, and phase equilibrium. Comparison of experimental and estimated values are normal shown in tables to indicate reliability.

name: 科技英文表達
syllabus:
本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。包含:
1. 此課程主要分成三大部分：(1) 簡報前準備工作和簡報注意要點；(2) 簡報開場、結尾、內容表達技巧；(3) 個人簡歷報告和表達技巧。 2. 課堂中引導學生於課程中探討與分析簡報技巧，比較不同說法的優缺點，同時找出適合自己的表達方式。 3. 除了解說中規中矩的開場簡報說法外，同時分享吸引聽眾注意的開場簡報技巧。 4. 本課程強調「實用性」與「創造性」，為了加強學習過程和效率，將以引導方式讓學生在課堂中有充分練習機會，加深學習印象。

name: 雙相熱對流
syllabus:
本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications. The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

name: 能源管理技術
syllabus:
現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰
1. 能源成本控制
2. 區域型電力能管理策略
3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念
4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析
5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集
6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:
1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.
2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.
3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.
4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.
5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.
6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

name: 實驗與量測方法
syllabus:
實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
Introduction of Experiment and Measurement Method
Experiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.
progress:
1	課程綱要簡介
2-4	各種物理量的量測方法、儀器、量測誤差及其校正追溯方式
5-7	實驗不確定度分析方法
7-8	以冷凍機冷凍能力量測結果為例，介紹如何進行不確定度分析
9-12	針對不同實驗型態使用不確定度分析方法
13-14	多變數實驗規劃方法
15-16	田口品質工程法
17-18	以多變數實驗規劃法進行製程最佳化
19	期末考試
grading:
作業50%
期末考試50%

name: 計算流體力學
syllabus:
本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本有限差分法、流體力學與熱傳方程式的有限差分法應用、有限體積法、格點產生法。
This course comprises four parts. Part one is fundamentals of finite-difference methods. Part 2 is the application of finite-difference methods to the equations of fluid mechanics and heat transfer. Part 3 is finite-volume method. Part 4 is grid generation.

name: 能源工程
syllabus:
ENERGY ENGINEERING is a branch of Engineering science that deals with production, transformation, transmission, storage and use of energy and is the most recent engineering disciplines to emerge. 
This course 'ENERGY ENGINEERING’ is a basic course taught entirely in English. 
The aim of this course is to provide introductory knowledge to students who have not studied Environmental Energy Science as a subject. 
Students can gain basic knowledge about Energy sources, production of energy, Energy Management, Energy Laws and most importantly about Bioenergy Engineering. 
This deals with sustainable methods of producing clean energy and thereby preventing hazardous environmental issues through significant energy efficiency improvements and sustainable use of resources.
This course also has an important objective of motivating non-native English students to improve their English language skills like conversing, discussing and writing assignments in English.
These practices will help them deliver better English presentations and also enhance their thesis and paper writing abilities.
Week 1: Energy Engineering - Introduction and Basics
Week 2: General Energy sources
Week 3: Energy Management Strategies 
Week 4: Bio Energy Engineering 
Week 5: Renewable Energy resources
Week 6: Hydrogen Energy Engineering
Week 7: Energy Farming
Week 8: Environmental Energy Laws and Regulations
Week 9: Midterm Exam 
Week 10: Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
Week 11: Biofuel Engineering
Week 12: Fuel cells and their types 
Week 13: Nuclear Energy
Week 14: Energy and Buildings
Week 15: Sustainable Conversion Technologies
Week 16: Green Architecture
Week 17: Energy Tourism
Week 18: Final Exam
progress:
1. The students of this class will be separated into groups for weekly presentation purposes and every week the Teacher will assign a topic for the presentation.
2. In every class, the Teacher will initially finish the power point presentation
3. Then one person from every group has to give his/her presentation
4.The students can use Powerpoint and YouTube videos to make their presentations interesting
grading:
1.The Teacher will conduct one Midterm exam and one Final exam throughout the semester
2. The questions for the exams will be from the power-point presentation of the Teacher. 
3. The total score of exam will be for 100 marks, in which the Teacher will consider the assignment marks, class attendance and the weekly presentation of every student.
4.The final score will be for 100% and it will be a sum of evaluations as 50% (from the final written exam) 25% (from the Midterm exam score) 15% (from the class presentations) 10% (from class attendance and attentiveness).

name: 真空系統理論與實務
syllabus:
本課程針對目前通用之真空系統原理、設計及實務組裝等議題進行說明與分析。將先針對真空系統進行分類說明，並陳述真空系統實務組裝時所要考慮的事項，以及說明真空系統的抽氣概念與設計。真空腔體的設計原理將會詳細說明，並介紹中低真空、高真空及超高真空的系統設計。
This class explains and analyzes issues concerning the principle, design, and assembly of vacuum systems that are commonly used today. We will begin with the classification of the vacuum system, then goes into the cautions regarding the assembly of the vacuum systems, as well as the concept and design of the air extraction of the vacuum system. We will also discuss the design principles for the vacuum cavity, and the system design for medium-low, high, and super-high vacuum systems.

name: 實驗與量測方法
syllabus:
實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
Introduction of Experiment and Measurement Method
Experiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

7-8	以冷凍機冷凍能力量測結果為例，介紹如何進行不確定度分析
9-12	針對不同實驗型態使用不確定度分析方法

15-16	田口品質工程法
17-18	以多變數實驗規劃法進行製程最佳化
19	期末考試

name: 儲能技術
syllabus:
本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage 
system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water system
and ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,
ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

name: 太陽熱能技術與應用
syllabus:
太陽能熱能工程應用，是一門利用太陽能之能量來提供人類能源之科學，太陽能為取之不盡用之不絕，且為乾淨又穩定之來源，在油價高漲且地球環境保護需求日益殷切的今日，太陽能之能源應用，已成為今日最熱門之學科。本學科之教學目標，在使學生了解基本之太陽能轉換為熱能、電能及照明之基本原理，並且經實際之能量轉換過程,以及熱力學之運用, 使學生對以太陽能為熱源之機械設備,如太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷凍空調設備、太陽能發電機、太陽能電池、太陽能照明設備等之應用，作深入之瞭解與認識，並可對相關產品做能量之計算及規劃設計,以使學生日後能為相關產業提供基礎人才。
本科目將由認識太陽、地球與太陽互動關係、地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之利用太陽能源有效裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。本門課主要為太陽能應用的原理分析及系統設計，課程內容包括太陽熱能系統的熱力熱傳及流體力學分析與系統設計、成本分析(為主)；太陽能光電系統的組成與設計分析(為輔)。

The application of solar thermal energy engineering is a science of using solar energy to provide human energy. Solar energy is inexhaustible, and it is a clean and stable source. Today, when oil prices are rising and the demand for environmental protection is increasing, The energy application of solar energy has become the most popular subject today. The teaching goal of this subject is to enable students to understand the basic principles of the conversion of solar energy into heat, electrical energy and lighting, and through the actual energy conversion process and the application of thermodynamics, to enable students to understand mechanical equipment that uses solar energy as a heat source, such as solar energy. In-depth understanding and understanding of the application of water heaters, solar refrigeration and air conditioning equipment, solar generators, solar cells, solar lighting equipment, etc., and energy calculation and planning and design of related products, so that students can provide for related industries in the future Basic talents.
This subject will discuss the effective use of solar energy and related system technologies by understanding the sun, the interaction between the earth and the sun, and the basic thermal radiation theory of solar energy on the earth, combining various effective devices for using solar energy sources. It is hoped that in the existing solar energy utilization technology, more efficient solar energy source engineering system design will be used to lay the foundation for the high efficiency of solar energy source utilization in the future 21st century. This course is mainly for the principle analysis and system design of solar energy applications. The content of the course includes thermal heat transfer and fluid mechanics analysis of solar thermal energy system and system design, cost analysis (mainly); composition and design analysis of solar photovoltaic system (secondary)

name: 燃料電池概論
syllabus:
本課程使學生對燃料電池的基本原理、關鍵技術、以及商品化發展與應用過程，有所瞭解並加以分析及探討。
燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：
燃料電池簡介、燃料電池之效率、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池之計算實例。
This course enables students to fully understand the basic principles of the fuel cell, key technologies, and the commercialization of the development and the application process, and to analyze and discuss the design of fuel cell system.
Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:
Introduction to fuel cell, Fuel cell efficiency, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Calculation example of fuel cell.

name: 冷凍空調節能技術
syllabus:
本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators and
condensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.
The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and the
technology to improve the systems.

name: 真空設備專論
syllabus:
近年來由於台灣在半導體、平面顯示器、光電、薄膜、低溫冷凍、生物科技及微奈米技術等產業的蓬勃發展，因而帶動了真空設備相關產業，進而對真空科技及其專業人才需求日殷。本課程將針對上述產業所使用的相關真空設備進行講解及討論，包含有真空蒸鍍系統、真空濺鍍系統、真空冷凍乾燥系統、電漿蝕刻真空系統、真空熱處理系統、表面分析技術等，將使學生具備真空設備理論及實務的相關知識與技能。
The vacuum industry is growing fast in the past two decades because of the highly growing of the high-tech industries including semiconductor, optics-electrics, communication, MEMS, and nano-technology. Therefore, a lot of students need to know the vacuum system described previously. This program will introduce vacuum systems including vacuum evaporating system, vacuum sputtering system, vacuum drying system, vacuum plasma etching system, surface analysis.

name: 冷凍空調自動控制
syllabus:
基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
To provide students with the concepts of control actions: two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fluid control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

name: 冷凍工程與設計
syllabus:
本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其設計，內容涵蓋如下：冷凍工程原理，冷凍系統之設備，各種冷凍系統之設計，冷凍負荷計算，冷媒管路之設計與計算，冷凍庫之設計。
This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system design; the contents cover the following topics: the principles of refrigeration engineering, the equipment and designs of different refrigeration systems, refrigeration load calculations, design and calculation of refrigerant piping, and refrigeration storage design.

name: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習
syllabus:
教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name: 空調工程與設計
syllabus:
本門課藉由濕空氣線圖討論空氣調節之過程，分析人體舒適與空氣品質之需求，及各種空調設備系統之設計。本門課在空調負荷計算原理與方法涵蓋輻射熱、熱傳導及熱儲存效應等之分析，系統設計包括送風與送水系統之計算與設計，及室內送風分佈之理論與設計。
Air-conditioning processes are discussed by using psychrometric charts. Thermal comfort and indoor air quality requirements are presented. Design of air-conditioning equipment and systems are introduced. Air-conditioning load analysis includes radiation, transfer, and heat storage effects. System design includes design and calculation air and water moving systems. Air distribution principles and design are also covered.

name: 流體力學
syllabus:
本科目將由不可壓縮流體在各種流動環境所產生之流體分子流動現象之認識，進而利用各種有關因次群，熟習包含可壓縮流體在內之實際應用上所必須具備之基礎方法；如雷諾數．伯努力方程式等。利用流利基礎分析，流體機械之流場與動力，及管路內流場與壓力之變化。
Introduction to flow phenomena of incompressible flow, discussion on the dimensionless groups and their applicants, derive the conservation equations such as the Bernoulli equation, using fluid mechanics to analyze the field and the dynamics of fluid machinery, pipe and duct flow are also discuss.

name: 英文閱讀與聽講練習
syllabus:
課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 微積分
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。

name: 有限元素分析
syllabus:
先修課程：負責教授同意
本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。
1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念
2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式
3. 形狀函數及等參數元素
4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等
5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。
6. 三維問題:一般實體
7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理
8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用
9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.
1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis
2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles
3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements
4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.
5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.
6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids
7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer
8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems
9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

name: 數位化製造特論
syllabus:
全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

name: 彈性力學
syllabus:
彈性力學為固體力學的重要分支，研究彈性物體在外力和其他外界因素（包括外力、溫度、電磁場等）作用下產生的變形和內力。彈性力學廣泛應用於建築、機械、化工、航太等工程領域，是學習有限元素法、複合材料力學、破裂力學和疲勞等的基礎課程，對於培養學生的專業基礎，思維方法和獨立工作能力有著重要意義。
Elasticity is a branch of Solid mechanics that deals with determination of the stress, strain, and displacement distribution in an elastic solid under the influence of external forces. This subject has applications in many engineering and scientific fields such as civil engineering, mechanical engineering, materials engineering, and aeronautical and aerospace engineering. The subject also provides the basis for more advanced work in finite element analysis, mechanics of composite materials, fracture mechanics.

name: 高等機器人與自動化應用
syllabus:
Advanced Robotics and Automation Applications (ARAA) course is offered only for up to 28 graduate students with programming experience. In addition to lectures on robotic manipulation, ARAA requires oral presentations and reports on robotics papers also focuses on projects with mobile robots and manipulators in the topics of interest related to:

1. Spatial descriptions and transformations  2. Manipulator kinematics  3. Manipulator inverse kinematics  4. Paper presentation and report  5. Project topics: manipulator and mobile robot control, and robot control system based on visual sensing

Course handouts will be available via iStudy web. In addition to homework assignments, a number of quizzes will be taken weekly during lectures. The quiz questions are based on problem sets in the textbook. Each student is required to make an oral presentation and submit a report based on a technical paper preferably related to proposed final project in related topics. All projects must be completed and evaluated in class under supervision of Professor and TA with particular attention to equipment operation safety.

name: 電腦運動控制
syllabus:
電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計， (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹， (3)基礎迴授控制器設計， (4)前饋控制器設計， (5)估測器設計，(6)多軸路徑控制， (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體、LCD設備與機器人。學生從這門課程中可學到運動控制的理論與如何利用硬體控制平台去完成一套運動控制系統。

This course is a graduate-level introductory course to the fundamentals of computerized motion control. The topics of this course include: (1) command generation, (2) devices of motion control , (3) feedback control, (4) feedforward control, (5) observer design, (6) multi-axis control, (7) case study. Students can understand the techniques used in the field of computerized motion control. In addition, students will be using the above techniques to implement a real motion control system.
