name: 水情預警系統
syllabus:
課程主軸以實務應用為出發點，擬建立水情與洪氾模擬的整合系統。其系統架構包含下列主要項目：
1.連結雷達降雨QPESUMS與數值氣候模式的資料，用以作為整個系統的主要輸入資料來源；

2.建立模擬計算能量，包含降雨逕流以及二維漫地流淹水模式。空間資料如渠道、下水道、水利設施、以及數值地形模型都會在在二維慢地流淹水模式中建立，且必須保持其資料一致性。

3.動態展示所有資料與計算成果，包含一維與二維的時序列資料；

4.各種轉換處理，包含圖層套疊、空間內插、時間序列補遺等。

學員需要設立水情模擬整體環境以及熟悉各項子架構之間的連結，再者，用此系統來對應評估颱洪事件的應變計畫與治理設計，也是相當課程相當著重的部分。

An integrated system is expected in this class to carry out flood simulation under the configuration close to real practice.  The configuration includes:

1. Connect QPESUMS and NWP as the main force data for the system 

2.Activate the model simulation, including rainfall runoff and 2D overland flow models.  Spatial data like channels, sewers, hydraulic structures, and DEM are considered in the 2D overland flow model with consistency.    

3. Display all the dynamic data and calculation results which are time series of 1D and 2D.

4. Conduct the temporal and spatial processes like map overlay, spatial interpolation, gap filling to time series.

Students are asked to setup the environment and familiar with the links among all the configuration.  In addition, planning and response to a typhoon event with the system are encouraged as well as the system development.

name: 土壤沖蝕與保育
syllabus: 土壤沖蝕與保育課程將深入探討土壤侵蝕的種類、原因、影響和防治方法。學生將了解各種類型的土壤侵蝕、導致其發生的因素以及可採用的保護策略，本課程將特別針對水蝕，探討降雨分佈、土壤性質、地形因素及地表植被覆蓋的重要性，以及介紹為促進土壤保育而制定的政策和計畫。經由此課程，學生將了解土壤沖蝕與保育的原理，並將具備在各類環境中制定和實施有效保護策略的知識和技能。此外，本課程將作為本校實現大學社會責任價值(University Social Responsibility, USR)的一門課，學生除了學習專業知識之外，並將參與賽德克東岸部落的現地訪查服務，實際應用所學知識。本課程將以中文授課，不需要先修課程，且現地訪查的交通費與保險費由USR計畫負擔。請注意選修本課程即自動同意所繳交的資料和報告得為USR計畫所用，無須另外授權。

name: 電腦視覺與影像量測
syllabus:
Compared to the course last year, the course this year includes more materials about recent development of artificial intelligence (AI). The rapid development and population of digital imaging hardware and algorithms bring high potential of computer vision and image measurement on practical applications. These applications can include but not limited to measurement, structural health monitoring, and safety identification. 

This course introduces the theory of computer vision and image measurement, guides students to operate and implement structural experiments and measurement projects. Students are encouraged to bring up the concepts and theories, programming skills, experimental design and implementation, oral presentations, as well as experimental documentation and technical writing ability.
progress:
1. Overview. Python installation. OpenCV installation. Tensorflow+Keras installation.
    Hands-on: Basic Python coding and rapid typing
2. Fundamental 2D single/multi-channel array of images. 
    Image file I/O. Color conversion. Geometric transformation. Edge detection.
    Hands-on: a basic picture-in-picture generator. 
3. General data types of images, matrices, and vectors: Row-wise format of matrix/vector. Channels of data. Memory operations in programming.
    Hands-on: an advanced picture-in-picture generator. 
4. Basic vector and matrix operations. Matrix multiplication/inversion. Fourier transform. Normalization. 
    Hands-on: Fourier transform GUI tool
5. Homogeneous coordinate transformation: Rotation. Stretch. Warping.
    Hands-on: Interactive mouse-control photo warping tool
6. Image tracking. Template match. Optical flow. Enhanced correlation. 
    Hands-on: Interactive mouse-control photo warping tool
7. Camera calibration. Intrinsic and extrinsic parameters.
    Hands-on: Calibration of your mobile phone cameras. 
8. Stereo triangulation. Multi-camera 3D positioning. Un-distortion. 
9. Midterm
10. Fundamentals of deep learning, tensors, gradient. 
    Hands-on: a nonlinear regression problem.
11. Convolutional based neural network (I)
    Hands-on: MNIST exercise
12. Pooling, dropout, overfitting/underfitting
    Hands-on: MNIST exercise 
13. Pre-trained models. Segmentation. Generative Adversarial Network (GAN)
14. Hands-on pre-trained models.
15. Final project proposal.
16. Special topic 1
17. Special topic 2
18. Final project presentation.

name: 不確定性與風險分析
syllabus: 在現代的工程設計與分析中，普遍應用到相關的電腦模式。儘管大部份工程應用電腦模式均以定率式的物理關係作為基礎，但引用電腦模式進行設計，必須考慮隱含在模式輸入與控制參數的不確定性，及其所產生模式輸出的不確定性。因此，適當的評估模式輸出的不確定性應包含在基本的設計當中。

name: 水資源系統分析
syllabus:
This course aims to introduce the configuration of system analysis and water resources system.  Secondly, it elaborate the theoretical bases and operation procedures of common deterministic mathematical programming methods (linear programming, dynamic programming and nonlinear programming).  Finally, several water resources systems based on the characteristics of surface water, reservoirs and cities will be depicted and perform the optimal and most effective planning, development, management and operation of water resources (including water quantity and water quality).
Objectives:
(1)To understand concepts and algorithms for optimization using linear, integer, network, nonlinear, and dynamic programming;
(2)To understand the concepts of optimization as applied to water resources problems.

name: 集水區規劃與管理
syllabus:
In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.
為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。

name: 非點源污染控制
syllabus: 地表和地下水的非點源污染，已經成為全世界各地區相當嚴重的環境問題。非點源污染本身複雜的特性導致集水區內污染物承載推估與污染源之標定非常困難。本課程之目的以介紹非點源污染之污染源特性及傳輸途徑為起點，教導學生學習使用最新的科技與工具，去建立最有效可行的最佳管理作業(Best Management Practice, BMP)之配置計劃，以達到集水區內非點源污染之削減目標。學生們將學習應用與統合地理資訊系統、遙測資料、水文暨水質數理模式、以及專家系統去解決集水區內非點源污染的控制問題。

name: 水文系統監測
syllabus: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

name: 土木與環工之衛星遙測應用與實作
syllabus: The applications of satellite remote sensing data in various fields have been popular with the increase of selections of satellite data sources in recent years. This course will start with basic concepts of remote sensing, then introduce popular satellite data sources. In the end, the course will introduce applications of satellite data in the field of civil and environmental engineering. More than 50% of the class time will be hands-on. Students will have the opportunity to work on actual satellite data. At the end of the semester, students will need to submit a research report on topics chosen by students.

name: 土木法規專論
syllabus:
本學期本課程主要以異議申訴、調解、仲裁、司法判決等案例，探討政府採購法及其他土木建築領域之法律爭議問題，並邀請相關領域專家學者，就公共設施經營、營建產業經營、都市整維政策、營建智慧財產權、永續發展目標、營建人員法律責任及公共工程推動等相關議題進行專題演講。期望透過本課程得以提升同學對於土木與法律交集領域之認識，進一步強化同學閱讀相關論文與期刊文獻之能力，並提供同學在工作及研究上不同角度的思考方向。
The course primarily focuses on cases involving objections, mediation, arbitration, judicial decisions, etc., to explore legal disputes in the government procurement law and other areas of civil engineering and construction. I will invited experts and scholars in relevant fields to deliver keynote lectures on topics such as public facility management, construction industry operation, urban redevelopment policies, construction intellectual property rights, sustainable development goals, legal responsibilities of construction personnel, and promotion of public engineering projects. Through this course, I aim to enhance students' understanding of the intersection between civil engineering and law, strengthen their ability to read relevant papers and journals, and provide them with different perspectives for consideration in both work and research.

name: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
syllabus:
1.為確保工程設計及施工， 以及維護管理之安全，觀測系統之應用日益普遍，更隨科技進步而應用的儀器也越多元化、自動化。所以必須充分了解觀測系統的目的、原理與物性，並根據工程需要適時適地規劃各種適合的儀器， 進而獲得預期之各項觀測效果。
本課程著重於工程之實施和管理方面之關連性、各項目之監測所使用儀 器之整體性與共通性，再對各領域之監測盡量以案例說明，加深對監測之認識及 基礎知識，提供大家在應用方面之使用或開發之參考。
2.為使同學熟悉或精進地工軟體Plaxis 2D 或Plaxis 3D，或透地雷達檢測專業，同學要擇一學習並做期中與期末報告。

name: 建築資訊模型與防救災及工程管理
syllabus:
本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠經由防救災或工程管理之需求分析開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而設計一個BIM在防救災與管理之實務應用，其內容包括：BIM自動化防救災應用，BIM實務應用，國內外BIM案例探討，BIM應用之分析與設計，BIM系統設計與開發，BIM系統在防救災與工程管理之應用等內容。
Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for applications disaster prevention and management recently. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, development, and related applications for disaster prevention and engineering management. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments, a midterm report and a final project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related applications suitable to their own researches to meet disaster prevention or engineering management requirement.

本課程結合有機、紡織、化工等相關領域，邀請業師命題目前業界遇到之瓶頸，由授課教師帶領學生進行分組討論，目的在培養學生解決問題與論文期刊選讀之能力，每組學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。業師命題，由授課老師協助學生資料之準備及練習口頭報告。且一學期至少須報告1次，與期末海報成果展，學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度、報告資料及海報成果展決定。

name: 高分子加工學
syllabus:
本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：
(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。
(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :
(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.
(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane
      Formation.

name: 高等儀器分析
syllabus:
課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

name: 結晶學
syllabus:
結晶學已經是成為當今科學研究領域的一門重要知識與技術。至目前為止至少有20位諾貝爾獎得主其貢獻都與結晶學有關。在這課程，我們將闡述結晶學的相關基本知識，例如: 晶格、對稱、原子散射、結構因子及解結構。此外，這門課程也將涵蓋實際操作解結構。所有基礎知識與實作，涵蓋單晶繞射與粉末繞射。也將涵蓋部分蛋白質結晶學的基本知識。
Crystallography has become an important field in scientific knowledge and technique in physics, chemistry, materials, and biology, which has been recognized by more than 20 winners of Nobel prize. In this course, we will illustrate the fundamental knowledge about crystal lattice, symmetry, atomic scattering, structure factor, and structure determination. In addition, the course also includes practices in structure determination by single crystal x-ray diffraction and powder x-ray diffraction. All fundamental knowledge and practices are mainly in small molecular cases, but part of knowledge of protein crystallography will also be included.
progress:
1. Introduction to X-ray 
2. Diffraction of X-ray
3. Crystals, Symmetry, and Space Groups
4. Intensity Data Collection and Data Reduction
5. Theory of Structure Factors and Fourier Syntheses
6. Phase Problem-Direct Methods, Patterson Methods, and Heavy Atom Methods
7. Refinement and Results
8. Modern ab initio structure determination from powder x-ray diffraction.
grading: Midterm 30% Final 30% Homework 40%
textbook: 1. G. H. Stout and L. H. Jensen, X-ray Structure Determination-A practical guide, 2nd Ed.
note2: 限制7人分子四和高分所合開

name: 蛋白質醣類學特論
syllabus:
Nanomaterials are materials with a single unit small sized between 1 and 100 nm.  They have unique optical, electronic, thermo-physical or mechanical properties. Since some nanomaterials have properties of enzyme-like characteristics.They are artificial enzyme, which can be used for many applications in such as biosensing, bioimaging, tumor diagnosis and so on.  We will also discuss about the safety issues, regulation and public percpetin on nanomaterials. 
Students are expected to learn the types, the basic theory, unique properties of nanomaterials, the syntehsis and characterization of nanomaterials. This class is for upper level undergraduate students, with interested on material science and nanotechnology.
progress:
Week        Title
1      Introduction on nanomarterials- nanotechnology in the ancient days and nature
2.     Different types of nanomaterials - OD, 1D, 2D and 3D
3.     Bulk nanomaterials - nanocrystalline materials, nanocomposites, nanoporous material
4. Bulk nanomaterials- metal-organic frameworks (MOFs), inorganic-organic hybrid nanocomposites
5.    Quantum mechanics and Jellium model
6.    Electrical properties - ballistic transport, Coulomb blockade
7.    Magnetic nanoparticles and superparamagnetism
8.    Surface properties
9.    Midterm Exam
10.  Mechanical properties & Stabilisation 
11.  Optical properties 
12.  Core-shell nanoparticles and gold nanoshells
13.   Carbon nanoworld - fullerenes, graphenes and carbon nanotubes
14.   Synthesis of nanomaterials - vapour and solution phases
15.   Characterization of nanomaterials - SPM, STM, AFM, SEM, TEM, XR
16.    Applications of nanomaterials and nanotechnology
17.    Safety Issues, Regulations and Public Perception
18.    Final exam
grading: Class participation (10%), Homework (20%), Midterm (30%), Final (40%)
textbook:
Nanomaterials: An Introduction to Synthesis, Properties and Applications,  Wiley-VCH, 2nd Edition (2013) by Dieter Vollath

https://www.amazon.com/-/zh_TW/Dieter-Vollath-ebook/dp/B00DWIHYVA/ref=sr_1_3?crid=1TYU55I6Y41F4&keywords=nanomaterials+textbook&qid=1641202272&s=digital-text&sprefix=nanomaterials+textbook%2Cdigital-text%2C227&sr=1-3

(optional)Nanomaterial: Impacts on Cell Biology and Medicine (Advances in Experimental Medicine and Biology Book), Springer, 2014, by David G. Capco (Editor), Yongsheng Chen (Editor)

https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-94-017-8739-0

syllabus:
課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name: 環境規劃與管理(二)
syllabus:
學生將會學習從較宏觀的視野來認識屬於人文與社會層面的環境管理。課程將會透過系統思考及永續創新的角度，來反思地球的現在與未來；闡述新經濟時代的來臨與綠色資本主義的重要性及其四種策略，來緩解氣候變遷及全球暖化的趨勢，創造企業競爭優勢，並開創人類永續發展的新契機。
Students will be guided from a broader and global perspective to learning the social and human aspects of protecting the Earth. Lectures will cover systems thinking and its importance to Sustainable Development, Innovation and emerging technologies for sustainability, Natural Capitalism, and its strategies, and Circular Economy.

name: 污染監測與分析
syllabus: 本課程著重於環境污染物之監測與分析內容，包括空氣品質監測、環境影響評估監測、移動污染源監測、氣象監測、噪音監測、氣液固相物質採樣分析、遙測等，涵蓋基礎化學與物理之採樣分析方法，並安排一次空氣品質監測站參訪，熟悉操作常見的氣膠分析儀器。修習本課程建議有基礎環境物理化學基礎。

name: 企業永續與管理
syllabus:
這門課除了教授傳統企業環境管理及相關實務之外，特別將著重在企業提升如何透過綠色創新來提升綠色競爭力的策略與做法；此外，課程另一重點將會是企業如何透過協助聯合國永續發展目標(UN SDGs)的達成，來創造企業的永續競爭力。學生將會深入探究金字塔底層(BOP)與創造共享價值(Creating Shared Value, CSV)之理論及實務做法，以及成為一個真正永續企業的策略。
In this course, traditional corporate environmental management and the strategies for improving green competitiveness will be taught. In addition, the strategies of corporate sustainability- how the corporate to create sustainable competitiveness by coping with the 17 goals of UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDGs) will also be taught. Theories and practices of Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP) and Creating Shared Value (CSV), as well as the strategies of being a true sustainable enterprise will be emphasized in the class.

name: 溫室氣體管理與實務
syllabus:
氣候變遷儼然已為全球邁入21世紀所面對最嚴峻國際環保課題，對非聯合國氣候變化綱要公約締約國及屬於外銷型新興工業國家的台灣，正處在發展轉捩點上，為維持國家競爭力，國內應擬訂更積極之節能減碳政策，並著手研擬調適衝擊方案，同時加強與國際間合作，進行減碳政策、技術與經驗交流，以推動碳市場之國際接軌，並確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展。
本課程將介紹溫室氣體與氣候變遷之關連性、國際溫室氣體管制相關公約、我國溫室氣體管理現況、溫室氣體減量政策與經濟工具、及溫室氣體衝擊調適與節能新技術等，期藉由本課程使之瞭解全球暖化成因與後果與國內外溫室氣體管理現況與法規要求，以提升我國於氣候變遷因應之認知。
This class introduces scientific, economic, and ecological issues about the threat of global climate change, and the Policy Instruments of greenhouse gas management.  This course examines the interconnections of international politics and climate change.  It includes Green House Gas inventory, carbon tax and emission trading, Voluntary approach and other greenhouse gas management policy tools.  It explores an integrated approach to analysis the benefits of greenhouse gas and air pollution reduction measures, and related model development.

本課程介紹統計學、計量經濟學之基本概念，旨在培養學生理解數據、進而分析數據能力。課程理論與實務並重，採理論講授、上機實作交替方式進行，確保學生在實務上應用統計理論之能力。透過修習本課程，學生可將統計概念應用於自然科學領域之實驗數據整理，或社會科學領域之巨量資料分析，培養具備跨領域問題分析能力之學生。

Both lectures regarding theories and practical lessons on computer are included in this course to make sure students’ ability of application in the future. syllabus:
永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. name: 再生能源與環境
syllabus:
本課程介紹各種再生能源的原理與發展現況，包括太陽能、風能、波浪能、潮汐能、海流能、海洋熱能、鹽差能、生物能、水力能、地熱能、氫與燃料電池等，其有關的主要技術和成本、對環境造成的衝擊、來源的規模潛力及其未來前景。並檢視各種傳統能源如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等之使用現況及其衍生的環境議題。
Knowing the principle and development of each renewable energy, including solar energy, wind energy, ocean energy (wave energy, tide energy, ocean thermal energy, ocean salinity gradient energy), hydro energy, geothermal energy, biomass energy, and fuel cell. Realizing their potential, impact on the environment, and future perspective.

name: 環境觸媒應用
syllabus:
本課程旨在教授學生認識觸媒與催化反應的原理、反應動力學、了解觸媒之製造方法、觸媒性質、鑑定方法與原理、觸媒於環境應用實例，包括環保及能源領域的應用，使學生能透過本課程探討異相觸媒應用於環境領域中之反應原理、反應動力學並進一步分析觸媒製造技術。
This course introduces students to the principles of catalytic reaction, reaction kinetics, synthesis of catalysts, characterization techniques and theories, and applications in environmental engineering and energy fields.

name: 低碳與淨零社會建構
syllabus:
21世紀國際為確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展，國際紛紛採取氣候變遷相關因應措施，低碳與淨零已成為全球之共同趨勢。本課程將介紹能源轉型/節能減碳與低碳經濟及社會之國際趨勢、國際溫室氣體減量與能源安全相關法規、我國溫室氣體減量與節能相關法規等，並介紹碳足跡、碳中和等概念，由國際相關案例看我國邁向低碳經濟與社會挑戰與機會。
To ensure the sustainable development of environment, economy and society, effective measures are gradually adopted by internationals. Low-Carbonization and Net-Zero Emission obviously becomes a global common tendency. This course will be introduced the international tendencies of “energy saving & carbon reduction” and “low-carbon society”. It will also be introduced with related regulations of international greenhouse gases reduction, energy security, Taiwan GHG reduction, energy saving. The above concepts and latter concepts of carbon footprints and carbon neutral will be introduced with international practical cases to refer to challenges as well as chances toward a low-carbon Economy and society in Taiwan.
progress:

Week 4 生命週期評估方法學(四)：不確定性、敏感度分析與結果闡釋
Week 5生命週期評估應用：綠色設計、環保標章、淨水處理、污水處理、廢棄物處理等
Week 6 專題：碳足跡、淨零及碳中和(Carbon Footprinting, Net Zero and Carbon Neutrality)

name: 生物科技產品品質安全與管理法規
syllabus: 由於人口老化、國民所得提高、醫療支出增加與各種流行性傳染病等相關議題，生技相關產業已被世界公認為二十一世紀最具發展潛力之產業。下一波台灣的高科技產業應著重於以發明與創新為主的產業，而生技相關產業正是我國決定要發展之重大新興產業。由於生技相關產業應用範圍廣，附加價值高，故為提升其產業競爭力且加速進入國際市場，國內生技相關產業除了須提升產品品質、加強國際化的管理之外，亦須通過各國所採用的認證制度。此外，政府如何建構一健全完善的法規管理制度，更是生技相關產業發展成功的必要條件。目前國內醫藥產品相關法規，包括藥事法、醫療器材優良製造規範（GMP）及藥品優良製造規範（cGMP）等。由於近年國內外細胞療法之迅速發展，且人體細胞組織物之管理操作與傳統藥品並非完全相同之原因，我國特別訂定人體細胞組織優良操作規範（Good Tissue Practice，GTP），其目的為預防因使用人體細胞組織物而導入、傳播及擴散傳染病，並期望協助機構確保其人體細胞組織物未含有傳染病病原，在製造過程中未受污染，且不致因製造不當而影響人體細胞組織物效用與完整性。

name: 生醫材料
syllabus: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。

name: 精準醫療特論
syllabus:
精準醫療(Precision Medicine)最早於2011年由美國國家研究委員會所提出，意指除了藉由傳統診斷方法，如病患症狀描述以及常規生化、影像檢查之外，加上新式生物醫學檢測，如基因檢測等，並整合個人資料，如性別、身高、體重、種族、基因特異性、過去病史、家族病史等綜合信息，透過人體基因資料庫進行比對及分析，藉以選出最適合病患的治療方法及藥物治療，如細胞治療、基因治療和標靶治療等。精準醫療最終的目的是希望透過個體差異性的深入診斷，來找出治療效果最大化及副作用最小化的最佳個人化醫療方案。
2015年美國前總統歐巴馬在國情咨文演講中提出「精準醫學計畫 (Precision Medicine Initiative)」，率先投入二億美元以建立百萬人次的醫療記錄、基因、生活習慣等數據資料庫，並找尋誘發癌症的基因及相應新藥開發，訂定相關法規並研究如何保護隱私與個資安全。此後各國無不競相投入精準醫療之發展，精準醫療也是當前台灣生技重點產業之一。
開課綱要：本課程希望增進同學對精準醫療領域發展的認識與理解，上課內容涵蓋精準醫療紹介、基因檢測發展及其應用、基因晶片發展及其應用、次世代定序發展及其應用、基因治療發展及其應用、伴隨診斷及標靶治療、幹細胞培養及其應用、細胞治療發展及其應用等，最前緣的精準醫學知識與生物資訊等應用範例。

name: 仿生工程特論
syllabus:
「仿生工程」是生物學到工程技術的觀念轉移，生物系統在上億年的演化驗證後已經達到高效且永續的精緻成果，本課程將介紹仿生工程之最新發展，師法自然將其應用於工程上將帶來革命性的突破。課程內容包含四大主題: (1)仿生概述、(2)生物製造技術、(3)生物高分子與(4)生物材料於仿生技術上的應用。
“Biomimetic Engineering” is a kind of knowledge transferring from biology to engineering technology. After billions of years of evolution, it has been proven that the biological system is highly efficient and sustainable. In this course, the latest progress in Biomimetic Engineering will be introduced. It will bring us revolutionary breakthroughs if we learn from nature and apply it to technology. The topics covered in this course will include (1) an introduction to bioinspiration, (2) biofabrication, (3) biomacromolecules, and (4) biomaterials and their application in bioinspired engineering.

name: 化學與生醫感測器
syllabus:
本課程涵蓋了基於各種檢測模式(如化學修飾、電化學、光學與半導體科技)的化學與生醫感測器的基礎知識以及利用穿戴軟性電子元件感測生理訊號。 主題包括感測原理、常見的化學感測器、軟性電子元件、生物感測器、元件設計以及醫療保健、環境監測和工業等領域的應用。課程安排除了感測器文獻之相關課堂討論之外，也會安排學者講座與幾周的穿戴元件實驗課程。
This course covers the fundamentals of chemical sensors and biosensors based on chemical modifications, electrochemistry, spectroscopy, semiconductor technologies, and physiological electrical signal measurements. Topics include sensing principles, commonly used sensors, strategies for achieving selectivity and adequate limits of detection, design of devices, and applications in health care, environmental monitoring, industry, and military areas. Articles from the current literature are discussed. We will also invite researchers to introduce current research. Active student participation is expected as an integral part of the course.

name: 科技英文
syllabus:
本課程的目的是提升學生的科技英文技能和協助他們進階職場的實用英語需求. 此課程著重於科技英語之閱讀、聽力、口語、寫作、理解、語法規則、詞彙,發音,對話,商務溝通,和專業演講技巧. 本課程包括撰寫履歷, 面試技巧, 軟技能如溝通技巧, 職場禮節; email及電話技巧,出差英語, 判斷力,了解國際科技職場環境及工作需求,專業項目策劃及執行.輔導學生如何展現自己優勢及作好個人職業規劃,從而順利邁向成功目標.
This course aims to educate students in Information Technology English and prepare students for their career advancement. This course focuses on IT science and technology English reading, listening, speaking, writing, comprehension, grammar rules, vocabulary, pronunciation, conversation, communication, and professional presentation skills. This course also covers soft skills such as interview tips, communication, business etiquette, travel English, email English, decision making, understanding international business, global working environment, project management planning and execution. In addition, this course offers personal development for students to discover their personal advantage and perform their career planning for achieving career goals.

name: 英文科技論文寫作
syllabus:
本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段，避口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. name: 綠能產業政策與經濟分析
syllabus:
在推動國家經濟發展，提升環境保護和創造國家競爭力，政府對於科技政策之擬定，及科技經費之持續支持十分重要，並以此培植科技人才、將科技研發成果加以推廣。為確保有限之科技資源能夠發揮其最高之效用，建立客觀及公正之績效評估制度實屬必要。本課程擬以最近影響人類生活環境甚巨之全球暖化現象( Global Warming )，及其引發之綠能科技投資為例，探討綠能科技政策之擬訂，以及綠能產業經濟分析。
綠色能源包括風能、太陽能、生質能、氫能與燃料電池、地熱能、海洋能與淨煤技術，發展綠能產業即具備「3E」平衡發展之功效，已成各國追求之目標。
本課程預計將涵蓋以下主題：
替代能源介紹（包括生質能源，如生質柴油與酒精汽油，以及氫能與燃料電池等）
再生能源介紹（包括太陽能、風能、水力發電、地熱及海洋能等）
二氧化碳捕捉與封存、淨煤專題
LED專題等
Many scientists conclude that the increased greenhouse effect is already accelerating global warming and leading to the climate change. Worldwide government are taking measures to tackle this issue and outlining strategies to bring the greenhouse effect under control.
Greenhouse gas emissions in Taiwan are mainly from burning fossil fuels such as crude oil, coal and LPG and the energy imports have reached 99.22%. Therefore, the sustainable development in any country is to increase the proportion of self-generation of energy, reduce the emission of GHGs, and balance among Economic Growth, Environment Protection and Energy Supply.
Green energy (Renewable energy) covers the fields of solar and wind energy, biofuels which includes biodiesel and bioethanol, hydrogen energy and fuel cell, geothermal and ocean energy as well as clean coal combustion technologies (IGCC). Balancing development of '3E' can be achieved by developing green energy industries and which is also the goal every count

name: 創業與品牌智財管理
syllabus:
本課程為培育學生創業與品牌智財管理能力的課程。課程規劃一系列主題講座，邀請不同領域的專家學者組成授課團隊，分享自己的創業與品牌智財管理經驗，著重培養學生的創業管理能力，品牌管理能力與智財管理能力。
The objective of this course is to develop the management abilities of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property for students. The curriculum is designed to include the special lectures given by the experts in various fields. The lecture will focus on the experience sharing and case studies.

The course is divided to two parts:

name: 企業實務講座-先進材料智慧製造
syllabus:
觀摩學習各企業以研發、創新、工安、環保為企業文化之核心元素，為台灣率先引領石化、科技產業邁向高值化的典範企業集團。以真實具體的企業經驗為教材，進而激發學生追求化工科技創新的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
The course will invite the domestic business to share their success experiences and new technologies. By offering the real design of chemical process equipments, research and innovation in development, industrial safety and hygiene, environmental protection and specific examples. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievements of chemical engineering to strengthen their innovation wills to plan the future.

name: 半導體構裝技術
syllabus:
半導體構裝技術是將積體電路和其它電元件，依設計聯結在一系統中，再以構裝材料將晶片、基座及釘架封包。本課程將介紹陶瓷構裝和高分子構裝、及其相關技術、與工業現況。
Semiconductor packaging facilitates the chips be incorporated into an individual protective package, mounted with other components in hybrid or multi-chip modules, or connected directly onto a printed circuit board. This course will introduce both ceramic packaging and polymer packaging and their corresponding technology. It covers the topics in any electronic system, including electrical design for power, signal, and EMI; thermal design by conduction, convection, and radiation heat transfer; thermo-mechanical failures and reliability; advanced packaging materials at micro and nano-scales; ceramic, organic, glass, and silicon substrates.

Week 18 Final examination

name: 光電化學與太陽能電池
syllabus: The concept of photoelectrochemistry is to utilize the solar energy and other light sources to drive a complete electrochemical oxidation-reduction reaction where the photocatalytic electron reaction has been converted into electrical energy. Photovoltaic cells which also known as solar cells composed of organic and inorganic materials and electrolytes are the great example for the photoelectrochemical reactions. Here the proposed course is constructed to introduce and implement the basic photoelectrochemical principles, measurements, photoelectrocatalysis, photoelectrical charge transfer and the storage of chemical energy. Further the remaining section of this course will be focused on the detailed studies about the development of different inorganic, organic materials for the fabrication of dye-sensitized solar cells.

name: 尖端科學材料
syllabus:
Course Description: This course is designed to provide graduate students an advanced materials synthesis, understand different synthetic technique and analytical application to promote success in their graduate carriers. Core concepts will be presented by both students and course instructor via presentations, discussions and with real time experiments. The curriculum will be wide in scope incorporating aspects of trouble shooting, experimental result discussion, chemical measurements, modern analytical instrumentation, and determination of chemical structure via analytical techniques. Special emphasis will be put on the appropriate preparation, and meaningful presentation, of scientific results. The student is expected to dedicate significant effort both in and out of lectures to be successful.

Objectives:
Specific goals for the course include the student learning:
1) To understanding the innovative materials for wider application
2) To improve the synthetic technique to find attractive materials
3) To discuss properties and mechanism of the innovated materials
4) To apply the advanced materials for current scientific challenges
Texts and Materials: Available in lab, you can read at any time in lab

name: 吸附與離子交換
syllabus: 本課程深入探討吸附與離子交換的基本原理及相關理論分析，進而了解如何設計改進相關之分離技術。內容包括吸附原理、吸附之數學模式、吸附分離技術之應用、離子交換原理、離子交換之數學模式、離子交換分離技術之應用。

name: 生物電化學
syllabus:
生物電化學可以獲得更多先進的訊息，其中包括生化反應、形態學，以及物理、化學和電學等相關性質。運用相關的技術方法，例如電化學工具，可用以研究異相與均相反應，亦可獲得諸多界面間的化學活性和圖譜以利用於微裝置的發展。對生物分析而言，生物電化學感測器具有最大的再現性，並能夠成功的引用於電活性生化物種、母體材料，以及其規格上。生物電分析方法包括最先進和有用的方法，其中大部分皆建立在此領域的的基礎上。
Bioelectrochemistry can be investigated to get more and more advanced information about biochemical reaction, morphology, and physical, chemical, and electric properties. The techniques have been used in a variety of ways, for example, as an electrochemical tool to study heterogeneous and homogeneous reactions, for high-resolution imaging of the chemical reactivity and topography of various interfaces, and for microfabrication. For bioanalysis, bioelectrochemistry sensors have maximum reliability and can be successfully employed in electroactive biomaterials, matrix materials, and their size. Bioelectroanalysis include descriptions of the most advanced and successful methods, which in large part build on the fundamentals will be described.
progress:
第一週課程簡介
第二週 CV(cyclic voltammetry): Theory & examples,  Reversible,irreversible, quasi-reversible system.
第三週 Scanning probe microscopy & Electrochemistry,SEM,STM & Electrochemistry
第四週 AC voltammetry, AC impedance, EIS
第五週 ISE & potentiometry sensors & pH sensors
第六週 Bulk Electrolysis.  Controlled-Current Techniques
第七週 Chemically modified Electrodes and applications.
第八週 Spectroelectrochemistry and Other Coupled Characterization Methods.
第九週 期中考

第十一週 Polarography and applications.

第十四週 Photoelectrochemistry and electroanalytical application
第十六週 Liquid/liquid interfaces, solid/liquid interfaces
第十七週 Analytical applications of electroactive polymers
第十八週 期末考

name: 化工類專利分析與策略運用
syllabus:
專利文件是最具價值的技術研發資訊。課程除了介紹專利相關基礎知識之外，並以有效的專利檢索分析技藝洞悉未來技術趨勢，特別是針對化學工程、生物科技、生醫材料、智能程序工程、綠色能源、光電半導體、奈米材料等系所研究發展領域的專利文件。透過有系統的分析及視覺化的圖示呈現企業有用的專利情報(intelligence)，並找到其中潛在的商業利益。
Patent documents are the most valuable technology research and development information. In addition to introducing the basic knowledge of patents, the course also uses effective patent retrieval and analysis techniques to gain insight into future technological trends. The technical fields of patent documents are especially aimed at chemical engineering, biotechnology, biomedical materials, chemical process and intelligent engineering, green energy, optoelectronic semiconductors and nanomaterials. Present the useful patent intelligence of enterprises through systematic analysis and visual diagrams, and try to find the potential commercial benefits.
progress:
Course Syllabus
1 week：Scope of intellectual property rights 智慧財產權的範圍
2 week：Introduction to basic concepts of patents 介紹專利基本概念
3 week：How to read the patent specification and patent claims如何閱讀專利說明書&申請專利範圍怎麼看
4 week：Patent requirements for substantive examination實體審查之專利要件
5 week：Patent Search Techniques, Strategies and Processes專利檢索技巧、策略與流程
6 week：The Importance and Purpose of Patent Analysis專利分析的重要性及其目的
7 - 8 weeks：Patent map analysis practice專利地圖分析實務
9 -14 weeks：Patent analysis case 專利分析案例分享(化學工程、生物科技、生醫材料、智能程序工程、綠色能源、光電半導體、奈米材料、電動車、電池…..)
15 week：Patent Application Strategies and Strategy Applications專利申請策略與策略運用
16 week：Quality and value of patents專利的品質與價值
17 week：Enterprise patent management strategy and execution企業之專利管理策略與執行
18 week：Final Exam期末測驗

name: 薄膜技術
syllabus:
薄膜科技是當今各式高科技製造業最不可或缺的技術之一，相關技術影響範疇包含電子、光電、半導體製造業、表面工程、高硬度高強度、耐磨抗腐蝕、裝飾與保護等等。薄膜技術種類與相關配合技術繁多，隨產業發展各項技術亦不斷進化，本課程涵蓋相關薄膜成長概論與原理，並搭配實作課程，期望讓學生認識薄膜在科技產業上的應用，並了解其重要性及未來的發展。
本課程包含以下主題：
1.	薄膜沉積 (Thin film deposition)
2.	薄膜材料表面能、擴散行為、應力等介紹 (Review of surface energy, diffusion, and stress in thin films)
3.	薄膜的化學能與表面動態行為 (Chemical potentials and surface kinetic processes)
4.	同質磊晶與異質磊晶 (Homogenius epitaxy and heterogenius epitaxy growth)
5.	互擴散 (Interdiffusion)
6.	蕭基能障 (Schottky barrier)
7.	矽化物薄膜形成 (Silicide formation and thin film reaction)
8.	電遷移機制 (Electromigration)
9.     薄膜分析技術 (Thin film characterization)


Thin film science and technology have gone through a thorough development which results in numerous new materials and advanced applications. Thin film research shares the knowledge from multi-disciplines, such as materials science, chemistry, solid state physics, mechanics and etc.. This course is an introductory class for students who are interested in thin film technology. Lab or tour session(s) will be provided to promote teaching and learning.

The topics will cover:
1.	薄膜沉積 (Thin film deposition)
2.	薄膜材料表面能、擴散行為、應力等介紹 (Review of surface energy, diffusion, and stress in thin films)
3.	薄膜的化學能與表面動態行為 (Chemical potentials and surface kinetic processes)
4.	同質磊晶與異質磊晶 (Homogenius epitaxy and heterogenius epitaxy growth)
5.	互擴散 (Interdiffusion)
6.	蕭基能障 (Schottky barrier)
7.	矽化物薄膜形成 (Silicide formation and thin film reaction)
8.	電遷移機制 (Electromigration)
9.     薄膜分析技術 (Thin film characterization)
progress:
1) Overview of thin film technology
2) Thin film deposition and layered structure
3) Surface energies
4) Diffusion in solids
5) Stress in thin films
6) Surface kinetic processes
7) Homo-epitaxy and hetero-epitaxy growth
8) Midterm exam
9) Interdiffusion in the films
10) Electromigration
11) Silicide formation and film reactions
12) Reaction in bulk material, thin films and nanowires
13)Term paper presentations
14)Special topics in thin films applications
15)Final review and Q&A

Thin Film Lab Sessions (thin film deposition and property measurements)

name: 金屬表面處理
syllabus:
本課程以介紹各種金屬表面被覆之基本原理，特性測試及其工程上之應用。內容有擴散被覆、PVD、CVD、電鍍及陽極處理等方法；基本真空技術，被覆層特性，以及表面被覆層之應用。
This course introduces the basic principles of metals surface coating，properties test and its engineering applications.The contents include Diffusion Coatings、PVD、CVD、Electroplatings and Anodic Coatings treatment；Elementary Vacuum Technologies，coating layer properties and its applications.

name: 凝固製程解析
syllabus:
本課程將討論凝固組織之控制因子，平衡及非平衡狀態下金屬凝固
現象，凝固界面之溶質分佈，單晶成長技術，凝固之過冷界面穩定
理論，共晶型組織之成長，凝固之熱流分析，凝固之成核成長及粗
性及均質處，理凝固理論之應用及鑄造工程簡介。
The subject area covers the following topics: Control variable of solidification structure and its application; Single crystal growths from the melt and solid; Heat flow in single crystal growth; Solute distribution in solidification, various cases will be treated in detail; Constitutional 
undercooling and interface stability; Solidification of castings and ingots; Lamellar eutectic growth; Nucleation growth and coarsening; Foundry engineering; Defects analysis in cast construction.

name: 儀器分析特論
syllabus:
由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.
progress:
Material Chemistry
Allotropes of carbon-fullerene (C60), 1D, 2D, and 3D carbon nanostructure, and graphene. Boron materials: borophene, and borospherene, Metals alloys, delafossite material, zeolites, Microporous, and mesoporous materials: Structure, properties, and application. semiconductors, superconductors, insulators, ceramics, and glass. 
Electrochemistry
Voltammetry: Cyclic voltammetry, linear sweep voltammetry, differential pulse voltammetry, amperometry, chronopotentiometry, oxidations, and reductions. Types of electrode and electrode reactions: Standard Electrode Potentials, Standard Hydrogen Electrode, Calomel electrode, Carbon electrodes, Microelectrodes, Ultra-micro electrodes, Ion-selective electrodes, porous electrodes, Semiconductor electrodes, Hydrodynamic/Rotating disk electrodes. Electrolytes, classification of electrolytes, liquid, solid electrolytes. Reversible, quasi-reversible, and Irreversible electrode processes, Characteristics of commonly used working electrodes such as glassy carbon, pyrolytic graphite, platinum, and reference electrodes. Liquid junction potential, salt bridge, conductometric and potentiometric titrations (acid-base).
Modified electrodes and their application, Electrochemical sensor: Fundamentals of electrochemical sensors, Electrochemical sensor for food and water analysis, Electrochemical DNA sensors. Design of third-generation electrochemical sensors. Electroanalytical chemistry in neuroscience. Electrochemistry sensors of biological molecules like glucose, insulin, and cholesterol. Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy and their application. Electrochemical quartz crystal microbalance and its applications. Electrochemical cell-redox reaction, electrode potential, EMF. Corrosion: Basics, chemical, and electrochemical principles corrosion, and electrodeposition. Electrochemical CO2 reduction, Electrochemical detection of environmental pollutants.
Electrochemical devices and techniques: Fundamental concepts of electrochemical energy conversion and storage, irreversible systems. Supercapacitors and their working principle. Electrochemical energy systems, lithium batteries, photocathode.  Fuel cells: Electrode materials, fuel cell research. Batteries: Principles of operation of cells and batteries; Electrochemical principles and reactions; Factors affecting battery performance; Battery design; Fundamentals of Primary cells and batteries, secondary batteries, Advanced lead-acid, Ni-based and lithium-ion batteries, next-generation batteries, materials for batteries, batteries electrode preparation, cell assembly, electrochemical performance analysis. Fuel cells: Introduction to fuel cells: working principle, direct methanol fuel cells, proton exchange membrane fuel cells, alkaline fuel cells, phosphoric acid, solid oxide, molten carbonate Fuel cells. 
Debye - Huckel - Onsager Equation, Kinetics- over-potential, Butler Volmer equation, Tafel equation, Nernst equation. Electrochemical cells: Galvanic cell, Daniel cell, Half-cell, Overpotential, Oxidation potential, Reduction potential. The rate of charge transfer, Current density, Ionic equilibria, Electro Kinetic Phenomena, Electrical double layer potential, Zeta potential, electro-osmosis, and sedimentation potential.
grading: Exam, Report and Seminar

name: 計算材料科學
syllabus:
本課程目的在了解「為何」與「如何」以電腦模擬方式進行材料科學研究。課程內容提及量子化學、固態物理與密度泛函理論(DFT)。而後將實際演練基本的材料模擬計算，內容包括結構最佳化、電子性質、光學性質、機械性質等，並將透過Python進行資料處理。學生可透過此課程學到材料模擬的基本原理、工作流程與實際操作，得以以理論觀點/微觀尺度評估材料議題。
The main purpose of the course is to understand “why to do” and “how to do” researches in materials science by using computer simulations. The background theory of quantum chemistry, solid-state physics and density functional theory (DFT) will be briefly introduced. The common tasks of materials simulations, including structural optimizations, electronic properties, optical properties, mechanical properties, etc., will be then demonstrated and employed. Basic commands of Python will also be introduced in doing data processing for analyses. Students will learn about basic principles, workflows and practices of materials simulations, being capable to evaluate materials’ issues from theoretical and microscopic viewpoints.
progress:

1. 量子化學簡介

5. 材料電子性質

7. 分子動力學
8. 材料光學性質 (optional)

4. Geometry optimization

8. Optical property (optional)

name: 科技英文寫作(二)
syllabus: 本課程有系統的教授英文寫作技巧，藉由課堂活動及回家作業等給予學生們實際去練習備忘錄、信件以及論文寫法並試著報告。
progress:
Instructions and procedures are documents that help either developers or end users operate or configure a device or program.
 
Proposals. Most projects begin with a proposal—a document that describes the purpose of a project, the tasks that will be performed in the project, the methods used to complete the project, and finally the cost of the project.

Emails, letters, and memoranda are some of the most frequently written documents in a business.
 
Press releases. When a company wants to publicly reveal a new product or service, they will have a technical writer author a press release, a document that describes the product's functions and value to the public.
 
Specifications are design outlines that describe the structure, parts, packaging, and delivery of an object or process in enough detail that another party can reconstruct it
. 
Descriptions are shorter explanations of procedures and processes that help readers understand how something works.
 
Rsums and job applications are another example of technical documents. 
Technical reports are written to provide readers with information, instructions, and analysis on tasks. 

Case study is a published report about a person, group, or situation that has been studied over time; also : a situation in real life that can be looked at or studied to learn about something.
 
White papers are documents that are written for experts in a field and typically describe a solution to a technological or business challenge or problem.

name: 水文地質學
syllabus:
本課程介紹水文地質的一般原理、概念和分析方法及地下水在實用上的一些問題。主要內容有: 水的來、源分、佈與循環、地下水的賦存、地下水的物理性質及化學成分、地下水運動的基本規律、地下的地質作用、地下水的補給、排泄與徑流、地下水資源概況，與地下水有關的環境問題，地下水與工程開發的工程地質問題，水文地質調查概要等。
The content of this class includes general principles, concepts of hydrological geology and analyzing methods for practical problem related to this subject. It includes: origin of water, distribution and circulation, reserve of underground water, physical and chemical properties of underground water and the relationship between hydrology and engineering geology.  It also discuss environmental concerns of engineering to the hydrology system.

name: 電化學工程
syllabus:
電化學的領域包羅萬象，舉凡電泳作用與腐蝕現象的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了講述基本的電化學原理外，將著重於電化學分析方法在化學系統研究上的應用。
The field of electrochemistry includes many different phenomena (e.g., electrophoresis and corrosion), devices (electro analytical sensors and batteries), and technologies (the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electrochemical methods to the study of chemical systems.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
微積分
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。

name: 供應鏈管理
syllabus:
本課程旨在探討供應鏈管理相關之基本議題。供應鏈管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，對整個製造與配銷通路的整合性管理策略。本課程內容包含供應鏈管理之策略發展、供應鏈管理之相關功能、及供應鏈管理之主要困難點。本課程將同時探討與供應鏈管理相關之議題，如存貨理論、資訊系統整合、及供應契約等。本課程理論與實務並重、案例研討也將為本課程重要之一環。
This course intends to introduce fundamental issues regarding supply chain management. Supply chain management is an integrated approach to manage the total flow of manufacturing and distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The contents of this course include the development of supply chain management strategies, supply chain management functions, and major challenges of supply chain management. Certain topics related to supply chain management, such as inventory policy, information system integration, and supply contract will also be addresses. This course focuses on both theoretical and practical issues. Real world case study will be an important part of this course.

name: 機器視覺原理與應用
syllabus:
本課程為程式語言之延伸，主要以python為程式語言，學習以下之相關主題
1. CPU 及 GPU-based DIP(影像處理)  - CV2 及 Kornia: 為PyTorch之延伸 ，主要介紹: Image Load/Save/Display、enhancement、Filtering、Edge detection、Morphology、Warp * Geometry Transformation、Color、Segmentation、Data augmentation等

2. 深度學習: 以PyTorch、TorchVision為主，介紹基本Torch語法，再深入介紹CNN網路架構 (LeNet、ResNet、DenseNet、EfficientNet)，Object Detection網路 (FRCNN、Mask RCNN、Yolo)、AutoEncoder、UNet(Semantic Segmentation)、Anomaly Detection、GAN等應用 (視課程進度)

主要工作包括：課堂作業、期末考、期末競賽 (Project)、Paper Reading

syllabus:
智慧製造意旨透過資通訊及數位技術（例如數位控制、智慧機器人、自動光學檢測、雲端運算、人工智慧與物聯網等）的輔助，讓生產系統更具智慧，減少生產成本、提升產品品質與增加客戶滿意。本課程透過問題導向學習(PBL)方法，引導學生學習關於智慧製造之核心技術。

name: 工程經濟
syllabus: 任何計畫、產品或服務之壽命週期起始自需要分析，其次為決定需求和規格，接著為設計和執行，最後經由使用階段，在支援和維護下完成此計畫。而在進行經濟分析，應對貨幣之時間價值、投資報酬率、損益平衡、公司債券、現金流量、有效利率、最小成本壽命、通貨膨脹、成本估計、折舊、所得稅、資金成本、更新分析、敏感性分析和風險決策分析等要點，以求估計值之準確性、方案抉擇決策之正確性。

name: 人因工程
syllabus:
Human factors and ergonomics is dedicated to discover and survey human beings’ capability, limit, behavior and other features. And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity. This course includes research and scientific approaches, physical design, human beings' sensory process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.
The aim of this course is to inspire students for human factors science through evidence-based approaches in improving products and systems by considering human capabilities and needs (also socio-technical factors) when interacting with products & systems. In this course we step from theory to practical implementation.

name: 物流運籌管理
syllabus:
本課程的主要目的在學習物流管理的基本觀念與應用。課程內容包括：(1) 物流管理基本概念、(2)物流系統設計、(3)物流資訊科技、(4)物流運輸作業、(5)存貨管理、(6) 倉儲作業、(7)配送作業、(8)物流委外管理、(9)全球物流管理、(10)永續物流管理。
This course will introduce basic concept and application of logistics management. The topics addressed in this course include: (1) Basic concept and application of logistics management, (2) Logistics system and network design, (3) Logistics information technology, (4) Transportation management, (5) Inventory management, (6) Warehouse management, (7) Distribution management, (8) Logistics outsourcing management, (9) Global logistics management, (10) Sustainable logistics management.

name: 人工智慧跨域製造及物流之應用
syllabus:
本課程旨在概述人工智慧的應用及其對製造業和物流業的影響。 隨機器學習、深度學習、啟發式演算法和其他人工智能方法的發展，相關新興技術的應用越來越多地被應用於製造和物流行業以提高決策能力。本課程將通過介紹人工智慧的基礎知識和實際應用之案例研究闡述使用人工智慧技術對於產業決策之幫助。學生將深入了解人工智慧技術及其在製造和物流領域如需求預測、生產計劃、調度、質量控製或運輸的潛在應用，課程內容亦將應用ChatGPT做為開發製造物流問題求解方法之輔助工具。通過本課程，學生將了解人工智慧對製造和物流系統之影響及現況，評估使用人工智慧之益處和局限性，並了解人工智慧對於相關產業之改善。
This course provides an overview of AI application and its impact on manufacturing and logistics. Emerging technologies like machine learning, deep learning, heuristics are being utilized to enhance decision-making capabilities. The course covers the fundamentals of AI, practical case studies, and its benefits. Latest AI technologies and their potential applications in manufacturing and logistics such as demand forecasting, production planning, scheduling, quality control, or transportation will be introduced. ChatGPT will be used as an auxiliary tool for developing problem-solving methods. The course develops the ability to analyze the impact of AI on manufacturing and logistics systems, assess benefits and limitations, and evaluate AI improvement for related industries.

name: 網路創業
syllabus:
隨著網路技術的發展，蓬勃的網路創業挑戰了傳統的實體店面，並在現代商業環境中提供了巨大的機會。新的數位技術和移動設備不僅改變了我們的生活，也改變了消費者的行為和溝通管道。本課程結合了創新創業與數位時代的商業環境，包括商業策略、創新思維和創業家精神。
With the development of internet technology, vigorous internet entrepreneurship has challenged traditional physical stores and provided huge opportunities in the modern business environment. new digital technologies and mobile devices do not only change our lives but also change consumers' behavior and communication channels. This course combines innovation and entrepreneurship with the business environment in the digital age, including business strategy, innovative thinking, and entrepreneurship.

name: 統計數據分析
syllabus: This course is an introduction to statistical computing and will be taught in Python. Python is widely used not only in the engineering but also in natural science, medicine, biology, physics, and business. This course will introduce you to a vibrant and growing community of open source data analysts that is pushing the state of the art in data analysis and presentation. (Another benefit to you as students is that open source software is free!) This course’s main objective is to: learn how to take raw data, explore it, and present the results in a useful way. Thus, in this course, you will learn all of the basic skills needed to do each of these steps with the statistical language Python.

name: 工程經濟
syllabus: 任何計畫、產品或服務之壽命週期起始自需要分析，其次為決定需求和規格，接著為設計和執行，最後經由使用階段，在支援和維護下完成此計畫。而在進行經濟分析，應對貨幣之時間價值、投資報酬率、損益平衡、公司債券、現金流量、有效利率、最小成本壽命、通貨膨脹、成本估計、折舊、所得稅、資金成本、更新分析、敏感性分析和風險決策分析等要點，以求估計值之準確性、方案抉擇決策之正確性。

name: 人因工程
syllabus:
Human factors and ergonomics is dedicated to discover and survey human beings’ capability, limit, behavior and other features. And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity. This course includes research and scientific approaches, physical design, human beings' sensory process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.
The aim of this course is to inspire students for human factors science through evidence-based approaches in improving products and systems by considering human capabilities and needs (also socio-technical factors) when interacting with products & systems. In this course we step from theory to practical implementation.

The purpose of this course is to train the students who can be familiar with the statistics approaches and theories. Besides, they will be able to employ the collected data to analyze the unknown environments. The main focus of the class will be on statistical analysis and graphics in Minitab. Students will cover basic statistical concepts and various statistical methods such as estimation, hypothesis tests, regression analysis, and ANOVA.

有鑑於電子商務的迅速發展，本課程在幫助此課程學習者能夠應用費的軟體和網路服務，製作一個電子商務的商業網站，無論同學自行創業或到公司服務，都可以因應電子商務的業務需求。

name: 資料庫應用實務
syllabus:
本課程介紹資料庫與資料分析的工具與方法，包括如何以精確的模式來描述資料、利用各種指標與圖形來探索給定資料的特性、特徵、或是規律性，並且可以根據所建立的資料模型來進行估計與預測。此外，我們也將探討如何產生各種機率分布的隨機樣本，以及各種最佳化問題求解。本課程將以MS ACCESS與R程式語言為工具。
This course introduces tools and methods for database and data analysis. The main topics include models that are used to describe data, indices and plots for exploring data characteristics and patterns, and estimation and prediction based on the data models. In addition, we discuss how to generate random sample from probability distributions and how to solve optimization problems. The selected tool for this course is MS ACCESS and R.

name: 學院指定向度-社會與法治
學院指定向度-自然與科學
統計學(二)實習
syllabus:
本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等實做與統計工具使用。
The purpose of this course is to train students to familiarize themselves with the statistical methods and theories that are often used. They can use collected data to  analyze unknown phenomena and lay the foundation for other related disciplines. Course content includes: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis, analysis of variance and statistical tool use.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

name: 勞作教育
syllabus:
本課程目標是協助學生透過校園環境整理及打掃體驗活動，認識勞作教育之理念，從勞作課程中養成同學不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的企業家精神，使學生透過實際的勞作課程，培養學生手腦並用，勤勞愛物的觀念，培養學生健全的人格、良好品德、正確的價值觀及刻苦耐勞的工作態度。
課程內容：包含四大階段
（一）勞作教育理念介紹：選取勞作教育相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含勞作教育意義、勞作教育前測作業說明
（二）勞作教育實作階段：勞作課程分三項不同情境施作。
（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須於各實作階段課程進行討論與反思，並撰寫心得報告、完成後測作業。
（四）期末成果分享：勞作教育期末成果分享，並辦理獎勵工作。
The purpose of this course is to introduce the idea of labor service to students. Students who take this course have to participate in the campus cleaning activities. This is to help students building up: (i) the team-work abilities; (ii) the concepts of ethics; (iii) the abilities of concerning the society. In addition, the course would help students to develop the accurate attitudes in the daily life and the healthy personalities. Furthermore, this course would also help students to enrich the sense of humanities. Four stages are included in this course: (i) the introduction of the labor service, (ii) the field work studies, (iii) the class discussions, and (iv) sharing of the experiences of the labor service.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
微積分
syllabus:
本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

name: 人工智慧導論與程式語言 (二)
syllabus:
本課程之目的在訓練大學部學生於撰寫程式之能力，程式語言(二)以Python 為實踐主體，課程內容包含: 複習Operators and Expression、流程控制、函式、module、data structure；並學習 input/output、OOP (Class 概念)、及exception；並將介紹廣泛使用之標準程式庫，包括: sys、os、numpy、pandas、matplotlib、pillow、pyqt、scipy 等；並將配合學期之project，訓練同學團隊合作及系統開法之經驗。
The objective of this course is to cultivate the programming ability for undergraduates. Python is the language used in this course since its simplicity and widely applicable. The content of this course includes: reviewing operators and expression, flow control, functions, module, data structure, and extensively learning input/output, class (OOP), and exception. Besides, this course will introduce the commonly used packages, such as os, numpy, sys, pandas, matplotlib, pillow, pyqt, etc.  There will be a term project to let student experience team-working and system design and management.

name: 零售管理
syllabus:
零售業包含百貨業、連鎖店、超市、超商等，與人們的關係極切‧本課程主在探討如何經由零賣出使顧客滿意的商品‧
內容：零售業概論、配銷通路、行銷研究、產品管理策略、定價策略、促銷策略、賣場規劃、零售業經營策略、顧客滿意
Retail management is mainly to discuss to sell goods through channels and satisfy them. The content of the course: Retail concept, physical distribution, market research, product management strategy, pricing strategy, promotion strategy, retail strategy and customer satisfaction.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skills by giving explanations of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name: 勞作教育
syllabus:
本課程目標是協助學生透過校園環境整理及打掃體驗活動，認識勞作教育之理念，從勞作課程中養成同學不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的企業家精神，使學生透過實際的勞作課程，培養學生手腦並用，勤勞愛物的觀念，培養學生健全的人格、良好品德、正確的價值觀及刻苦耐勞的工作態度。
課程內容：包含四大階段
（一）勞作教育理念介紹：選取勞作教育相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含勞作教育意義、勞作教育前測作業說明
（二）勞作教育實作階段：勞作課程分三項不同情境施作。
（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須於各實作階段課程進行討論與反思，並撰寫心得報告、完成後測作業。
（四）期末成果分享：勞作教育期末成果分享，並辦理獎勵工作。
The purpose of this course is to introduce the idea of labor service to students. Students who take this course have to participate in the campus cleaning activities. This is to help students building up: (i) the team-work abilities; (ii) the concepts of ethics; (iii) the abilities of concerning the society. In addition, the course would help students to develop the accurate attitudes in the daily life and the healthy personalities. Furthermore, this course would also help students to enrich the sense of humanities. Four stages are included in this course: (i) the introduction of the labor service, (ii) the field work studies, (iii) the class discussions, and (iv) sharing of the experiences of the labor service.

二、勞作教育實作階段：勞作課程分三項不同情境施作。

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 人工智慧導論與程式語言 (二)
syllabus:
本課程之目的在訓練大學部學生於撰寫程式之能力，程式語言(二)以Python 為實踐主體，課程內容包含: 複習Operators and Expression、流程控制、函式、module、data structure；並學習 input/output、OOP (Class 概念)、及exception；並將介紹廣泛使用之標準程式庫，包括: sys、os、numpy、pandas、matplotlib、pillow、pyqt、scipy 等；並將配合學期之project，訓練同學團隊合作及系統開法之經驗。
The objective of this course is to cultivate the programming ability for undergraduates. Python is the language used in this course since its simplicity and widely applicable. The content of this course includes: reviewing operators and expression, flow control, functions, module, data structure, and extensively learning input/output, class (OOP), and exception. Besides, this course will introduce the commonly used packages, such as os, numpy, sys, pandas, matplotlib, pillow, pyqt, etc.  There will be a term project to let student experience team-working and system design and management.

name: 企業倫理與永續管理
syllabus:
課程旨在帶領學生於全球化多元的商業環境下，思維倫理在複雜的企業決策過程中所扮演之重要角色。引導學生認識企業倫理的內涵，並透過自編教材、教科書內容與個案探討，啟發學生對相關主題的興趣，體認企業倫理確實於日常生活中頻繁出現，而不僅為形而上的哲學觀。本課程擬藉由課堂的情境移轉，培養具有企業倫理的企業經理人。
本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

name: 機器學習
syllabus: This course introduces students to the process of data science, covering problem formulation, data acquisition, modeling and analysis, and presentation and integration into action. Students will learn useful skills as well as basic statistical methods by completing several hands-on problems focused on real-world data. This course starts with a brief introduction to multivariate data analysis and data summarization including visualization. Then it extends to focus on using data to develop predictive capabilities using supervised and unsupervised machine learning models (regression, classification, clustering, PCA, etc.).

Week 15-17	Unsupervised learning (Clustering, k-means)
Week 18	Exam or assignment

name: 人機互動
syllabus: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。除此之外，也介紹人機互動知識的相關應用案例，透過分享國際刊物論文，了解人機互動前沿研究。透過規劃小組實驗實作，藉此了解人因工程實驗的進行與後續應用，將人機互動基本的原則與方法應用於評估當中。

name: 機器視覺原理與應用
syllabus:
本課程為程式語言之延伸，主要以python為程式語言，學習以下之相關主題
1. CPU 及 GPU-based DIP(影像處理)  - CV2 及 Kornia: 為PyTorch之延伸 ，主要介紹: Image Load/Save/Display、enhancement、Filtering、Edge detection、Morphology、Warp * Geometry Transformation、Color、Segmentation、Data augmentation等

2. 深度學習: 以PyTorch、TorchVision為主，介紹基本Torch語法，再深入介紹CNN網路架構 (LeNet、ResNet、DenseNet、EfficientNet)，Object Detection網路 (FRCNN、Mask RCNN、Yolo)、AutoEncoder、UNet(Semantic Segmentation)、Anomaly Detection、GAN等應用 (視課程進度)

主要工作包括：課堂作業、期末考、期末競賽 (Project)、Paper Reading

name: 機器人整合製造
syllabus:
本課程主要分成三部分。第一部分介紹自動化設備包含工業機器人的結構，分類和其工作空間等基礎，第二部分介紹PLC可程式控制器的基本概念及各硬體架構、性能、特點及工作原理。最後再介紹機器人如何與系統相整合，以執行功能性的製造單元(或製造系統)。
This course basically is composed of 3 parts. First, configuration, classification and work cell of the industrial robots will be introduced. Secondary, end-of-tooling, programming & instruction, control system controller and safety is covered. Finally, the robot and system integration to execute a functional manufacturing cell (or system) will be provided.

name: 進階應用英文
syllabus:
本課程引入生活性的學習方法來誘發學生學習動機，並培養可在社會與職場運用的四項英文基本技能。課程目標在幫助學生在生活實境習得英文，為他們裝備可溝通表達於日常、社交活動，並提升職涯的整合性英文技能。每堂課程都注重在以學生為中心的學習活動中帶入全真、應用性高的英文技巧。課程設計涵蓋的功能包括課堂分享與作業、日常互動英文以及專業英文練習。主要課題包括溝通，簡報與談判技巧，應用閱讀與寫作，聽力技巧運用，語言與文化。
This course introduces real-world based learning approaches for students to raise their learning aspirations and to develop four essential English skills that are applicable in social and professional encounters. This course aims to help students practice English in most real-life settings and to equip them with integrated skills to advance their careers. Every class session focuses on bringing authentic and applied English in student-centered leaning activities. The class design covers the functions like information sharing and task-based activities, social interactions, and professional English practices. Essential topics include communication, techniques of negotiation and presentation, applied reading and writing, strategies for developing listening skills and language learning across cultures.

name: 時間序列分析與製程控制
syllabus:
本課程主要目的在於教導學生如何利用時間序列分析、品質製程管制、工程製程控制等方法來達成先進製程控制的目的。課程講述之內容包含下列課題:製程監控、製程調整、離散動態製程、時間序列模型、轉換方程模型、最佳回饋控制器、指數加權移動平均控制、遞迴式估計與自適應控制等。
The purpose of this course is to provide students a modern treatment of discrete-time advanced process control (APC) methods based on time series analysis, statistical process control (SPC) and engineering process control (EPC) for Quality Engineering in manufacturing. From an engineering perspective, process control is gaining recognition in the semiconductor industry as a means to compensate for equipment changes due to inconsistent operation, process drifts and process shifts. So, practical and theoretical components that comprise the foundation for the APC will be addressed as well.

name: 網路可靠度
syllabus:
本課程著重於隨機流量網路(stochastic flow network)的可靠度評估、分析和決策。在整個課程中，我們將介紹與隨機流量網路相關的數值分析方法、模擬技術和最佳化問題。此外，我們將在隨機流量網路模型的框架內深入探討最快路徑、多商品、路由政策和負載管理問題等主題。學生將有機會將這些方法和模型應用到實際系統中，包括電腦網路、電信、城市交通系統、電力傳輸網路和製造系統。
This course emphasizes the reliability evaluation, analysis, and decision-making aspects of stochastic flow networks. Throughout the course, we will introduce analytical methodologies, simulation techniques, and optimization problems related to stochastic flow networks. Furthermore, we will delve into topics like quickest path, multi-commodity, routing policies, and load management issues within the framework of stochastic flow network models. Students will have the opportunity to apply these methodologies and models to practical systems, including computer networks, telecommunications, urban traffic systems, power transmission networks, and manufacturing systems.

name: 多目標決策分析
syllabus:
決策行為是人們每天在做的活動。然而，除非至少有兩個準則存在，否則不需要做決策，也因此這類問題被稱為多準則決策問題（MCDP）。當替代方案已知時，最終的決定就會被做出，這種類型的問題被稱為多屬性決策問題（MADP）。當替代方案未知，我們必須在某些外部條件下找到它們時，問題被稱為多目標決策問題（MODP）。多準則決策分析（MCDA）是一個通用術語，包括兩類問題的技術，即多屬性決策分析（MADA）和多目標決策分析（MODA），其中目標規劃是它的特殊情況。在這門課程中，我們將介紹這些MCDA方法，從確定性到不確定性。
Making decisions is a daily activity for all of us. However, no decision making occurs unless at least TWO criteria are present, thus this type of problems is called Multi-Criteria Decision Problems (MCDP). When the alternatives are known, the final decision is made and such type of problems is called Multi-Attribute Decision Problems (MADP). When the alternatives are unknown and we have to find them under some external conditions, and the problems are called Multi-Objective Decision Problems (MODP). Multi-Criteria Decision Analysis (MCDA) is a general term that consists of techniques for two types of problems with Multi-Attribute Decision Analysis (MADA) and Multi-Objective Decision Analysis (MODA) in which Goal Programming is its special case. In this course, we will introduce these MCDA methods from certain to uncertainty.

name: 迴歸分析
syllabus:
這是一門研究所課程，內容包括多元數據分析和高等回歸應用。本課程的目標是確保工業工程與管理領域的研究生能夠解釋、實現和操作幾種不同類型的基本回歸分析。本課程主要致力於高等回歸分析。重點是發展一個嚴格的微積分計算及矩陣代數為基礎的最小平方法(OLS)、違反回歸假設、假說檢定及一般線性模型。此外，本課程的重點是協助學生理解分析技術這部分的領域知識，如:統計的基本概念(描述和推理統計，概率分佈)，簡單線性回歸、多元線性回歸、邏輯回歸及對數線性模型之應用。
This course covers multivariate data analysis as well as advanced regression applications. The course is primarily devoted to advanced regression analysis. Th? emphasis is on developing a rigorous calculus and matrix algebra-based understanding of ordinary least squares (OLS), violations of regression assumptions, hypothesis testing, and the general linear model. In addition, the emphasis of this course is on the acquisition and understanding of analytical techniques such as basic concepts of statistics (descriptive and inferential statistics, probability distributions), simple linear regression, multiple linear regression, logistic regression, and log-linear model.

name: 供應鏈管理
syllabus:
本課程旨在探討供應鏈管理相關之基本議題。供應鏈管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，對整個製造與配銷通路的整合性管理策略。本課程內容包含供應鏈管理之策略發展、供應鏈管理之相關功能、及供應鏈管理之主要困難點。本課程將同時探討與供應鏈管理相關之議題，如存貨理論、資訊系統整合、及供應契約等。本課程理論與實務並重、案例研討也將為本課程重要之一環。
This course intends to introduce fundamental issues regarding supply chain management. Supply chain management is an integrated approach to manage the total flow of manufacturing and distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The contents of this course include the development of supply chain management strategies, supply chain management functions, and major challenges of supply chain management. Certain topics related to supply chain management, such as inventory policy, information system integration, and supply contract will also be addresses. This course focuses on both theoretical and practical issues. Real world case study will be an important part of this course.

name: 工程經濟
syllabus:
任何計畫、產品或服務之壽命週期起始自需要分析，其次為決定需求和規格，接著為設計和執行，最後經由使用階段，在支援和維護下完成此計畫。而在進行經濟分析，應對貨幣之時間價值、投資報酬率、損益平衡、公司債券、現金流量、有效利率、最小成本壽命、通貨膨脹、成本估計、折舊、所得稅、資金成本、更新分析、敏感性分析和風險決策分析等要點，以求估計值之準確性、方案抉擇決策之正確性。
Engineering / management analysis of the economic aspects of public and private project proposals. Decisions involving the expenditure of capital funds. Alternative sources of funds; time value of money; methods of evaluating alternative project.

name: 人因工程
syllabus:
Human factors and ergonomics is dedicated to discover and survey human beings’ capability, limit, behavior and other features. And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity. This course includes research and scientific approaches, physical design, human beings' sensory process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.
The aim of this course is to inspire students for human factors science through evidence-based approaches in improving products and systems by considering human capabilities and needs (also socio-technical factors) when interacting with products & systems. In this course we step from theory to practical implementation.

The topics addressed in this course include: (1) Basic concept and application of logistics management, (2) Logistics system and network design, (3) Logistics information technology, (4) Transportation management, (5) Inventory management, (6) Warehouse management, (7) Distribution management, (8) Logistics outsourcing management, (9) Global logistics management, (10) Sustainable logistics management.

name: 人工智慧跨域製造及物流之應用
syllabus:
本課程旨在概述人工智慧的應用及其對製造業和物流業的影響。 隨機器學習、深度學習、啟發式演算法和其他人工智能方法的發展，相關新興技術的應用越來越多地被應用於製造和物流行業以提高決策能力。本課程將通過介紹人工智慧的基礎知識和實際應用之案例研究闡述使用人工智慧技術對於產業決策之幫助。學生將深入了解人工智慧技術及其在製造和物流領域如需求預測、生產計劃、調度、質量控製或運輸的潛在應用，課程內容亦將應用ChatGPT做為開發製造物流問題求解方法之輔助工具。通過本課程，學生將了解人工智慧對製造和物流系統之影響及現況，評估使用人工智慧之益處和局限性，並了解人工智慧對於相關產業之改善。
This course provides an overview of AI application and its impact on manufacturing and logistics. Emerging technologies like machine learning, deep learning, heuristics are being utilized to enhance decision-making capabilities. The course covers the fundamentals of AI, practical case studies, and its benefits. Latest AI technologies and their potential applications in manufacturing and logistics such as demand forecasting, production planning, scheduling, quality control, or transportation will be introduced. ChatGPT will be used as an auxiliary tool for developing problem-solving methods. The course develops the ability to analyze the impact of AI on manufacturing and logistics systems, assess benefits and limitations, and evaluate AI improvement for related industries.

name: 統計數據分析
syllabus: This course is an introduction to statistical computing and will be taught in Python. Python is widely used not only in the engineering but also in natural science, medicine, biology, physics, and business. This course will introduce you to a vibrant and growing community of open source data analysts that is pushing the state of the art in data analysis and presentation. (Another benefit to you as students is that open source software is free!) This course’s main objective is to: learn how to take raw data, explore it, and present the results in a useful way. Thus, in this course, you will learn all of the basic skills needed to do each of these steps with the statistical language Python.

name: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習
syllabus:
ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

In this course, the basic concepts and applications of Nonlinear Programming Models in Operations Research. It includes Integer Programming、Dynamic Programming、Game Theory、Markovian Chains、Queueing Theory、Inventory Theory、Project Management and Simulation Modeling﹒

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

微積分
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。

name: 管理數學
syllabus:
本課程之目的在於教導學生能夠以線性代數中所提供之各種方法來求解線性連立方程組，並奠定研習線型規畫，作業研究，等課程之基礎。由於本系分兩組教學，因應之課程內容分別為：管理組：矩陣、方程式之解、行列式、向量、微分方程式及應用問題等。工程組：矩陣方程式之解、行列式、向量及向量空間等。
The objective of this course is to introduce the linear algebra by using several different methods to solve the linear dependent equations and to build up the fundamental knowledge of linear programming and Operation Research. Two groups instruct the contents of this course. For the engineering group the array, solution of combinatory equations, vectors, differential equations and its implementation are included. For the management group the array, solution of combinatory equations, vectors and vector spaces are included.
