name: 3D創作與空間動畫
syllabus:
*建議上學期有修3D課的同學選課，本課程為延續課程，不會從基礎開始教；假設沒有，建議寒假自行將基礎建模、材質和燈光的部分自修
(課程內容以實際第一堂課現場說明為主，下方僅供參考)

**本課程有搭配 [教育部教學實踐計畫]，所以內容會依照計畫內容，導入VR體驗與課程問卷撰寫，無法接受的同學請勿選課，謝謝同學。

本教學計畫主要的教學方法為應用虛擬實境技術建構數位製造教學環境的情境，並應用PBL的教學策略，導入學生在數位製造設計課程的教學內容和課後自行複習與練習各種實際專案的過程中，達到解決學生對於數位製造設備的低動機與低興趣和學習焦慮問題，以及提升數位製造實作設計課程學習和課後自我複習與練習應用的效果，進而讓學生真正的學習到應用數位製造設備解決真實問題的能力。

a. 提升工業設計系學生對於數位製造實作設計課程學習的效果
b. 提升工業設計系學生對於數位製造實作設計課程課後複習的效果
c. 培養工業設計系學生對於數位製造設備操作的動機與興趣
d. 降低工業設計系學生對於數位製造設備操作因受到挫折產生的學習焦慮
e. 提升工業設計系學生應用數位製造設備解決真實問題的能力

This course content is about 3D creation and space design software through theoretical and practical cases: 3DS MAX - the concept and application scope, and then the teacher introduces the methods of 3D environment construction into practical case practice operations, and finally creates students' own creation project. The course aims to train students to use the 3DS MAX software to construct 3D models, character modeling, space, and related objects, and use the result and performance to space display.

name: 設計溝通
syllabus:
設計的溝通扮演著如何將設計理念成功地傳達以及讓使用者清楚的理解設計本意的重要角色。
本課程將透過設計思考過程藉由文字、口說、圖面等達到設計溝通之目的及訓練，經由了解設計領域應用之文字搭配口說及圖面進而增進設計者說明設計概念的溝通能力。
課程內容包含設計溝通的基本原則、技巧及策略，以及如何利用不同的溝通媒介及工具來傳達設計理念。
課程操作包含案例分析搭配實際的簡報演練及口說訓練讓同學們累積應用經驗。
Design Communication plays an important role in how to successfully deliver design concepts and have users understand the design intention clearly. 
This course will practice and reach the goal of design communication through design thinking by vocabulary uses, verbal speeches, and image presentations.  From understanding the proper application of design language including vocabularies and diagrams in various design fields, designers may improve their skills of concept presentation and communication.  
The course content includes basic principles, techniques, and strategies in design communication as well as how to use different media and tools to deliver design concepts.
Course activities include case studies with presentation practice and oral speech to help students have experiences in actual application.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus: The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. The course will be focusing on reading strategies, communication skills and vocabulary building. Class activities include class discussion, group discussion, presentation and so on. Students are required to express their thoughts in English during the class.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 設計史
syllabus:
本課程教授以設計為主軸，同時亦對當時設計運動所影響的設計相關領域，包括產品、室內與建築設計風格，做關聯性的介紹。透過設計發展主要運動的介紹，建立學生對於設計史的知識與設計文化涵養的紮根，並學習思考設計運動時代下的美學思潮脈絡與發展關係。
This course introduces students to design as well as the influence of design movement in the fields of products, interior and architecture design that shaped the twentieth century in design. Through the introduction of the twentieth century in design, this course advances student’s understanding of design history and cultural enrichment. Students take an in-depth look at the context and development of movements that are significant in the history of design.

Students explore product aesthetics and basic formal issues as they pertain to industrial design. This course integrates the principles of three dimensional design, drawing and prototyping as they apply to the generation of product form. Emphasis is placed on issues that dictate the form of products and their creation. Students develop basic prototyping, conceptual drawing, and presentation skills for the purpose of exploring, analyzing, refining and communicating design concepts.

name: 人因工程(F)
syllabus:
介紹人體之形態特徵、心理期望、動作行為等人因知識，研究人因資訊應用於工業設計實務上之設計方法或準則以獲得具安全、效率與舒適之產品或環境設計。

This course is for students, researchers, and practitioners who design or evaluate products for their target user. It covers evaluation methodology for supporting human factor design for products, human-machine systems, software applications, games, and specialized appliances intended to be used by people. This field contains a substantial body of knowledge with regard to human factor design and the more narrowly scoped field of usability engineering (UE). Within these areas of practice, and the related research field of HCI, a host of methods are available for evaluating interactive products for user. This course provides an overview of a new and vibrant research field and exposes gaps in current methodologies that future research must address. We also hope it conveys our enthusiasm for this research area, where so much interesting work is taking place and so much still needs to be done.

1. 增加設計者能以使用者為中心的角度去思考產品問題，以及對於其使用行為與認知能力的了解。
2. 了解設計者、使用者之間的認知對於設計過程之影響。
3. 透過使用者經驗的研究方法，幫助設計者擬定設計策略。

name: 立體設計(F)
syllabus:
以傳授設計原理、立體設計觀念、美的形式原理、立體的構成練習、對各種材料特性的應用經驗以及造形與色彩的研究達到設計感覺的養成並提高計畫性創造能力，是發展實用性及機能性以前之設計訓練的基礎。
This course aims to develop the ability of students to meet specific sensory needs through the creation of abstract visual order in the form of three-dimension. The visual organization of design elements including line, plane, volume, and the analysis of their abstract relationships and principles of order are studied.

練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸
進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法
；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖
板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

name: 程式設計入門
syllabus:
本課程將介紹程式設計的基礎，透過腳本式語言及基礎程式語言的應用，培養學生程式設計的基本能力。本課程除加強技術開發能力外，也將導引學生，如何透過獨立思考來面對問題及分析問題，並透過程式的撰寫來解決問題。
This course will introduce the fundamental of computer programming design. Student will learn the capability of programming design using script language and basic programming language. This course will also provide the knowledge and methods for students to realize and analyze specific problem independently. So that they can using computer program to solve the problems.
progress:
第01週 Arduino 環境設定與安裝
第02週 Arduino 快速入門與 C 語言介紹
第03週 C 語言 與 Arduino 硬體介紹
第04週 Arduino 的數位輸出/輸入
第05週 Arduino 的類比輸出/輸入
第06週 用序列埠(Serial Port)與 PC 通訊
第07週 三色 LED 的控制
第08週 LED 排燈顯示
第09週 期中測驗
第10週 LED 排燈展示
第11週 光線感知-做一個自動照明系統
第12週 溫度感知-使用熱敏電阻監測水溫
第13週 潮溼感知-做一個花草澆水警示系統
第14週 使用七段顯示器-做一個按鈕計數器
第15週 整合應用
第16週 專題製作-1
第17週 專題製作-2
第18週 期末測驗或展示
grading:
作業(20%)
小考(20%)
課程參與(10%)
期中考試(25%)
期末考試或展示(25%)
textbook: 稍後公告。

name: 商業攝影

name: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習
syllabus:
課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name: 家具設計
syllabus:
透過國際家具品牌實際的設計提案流程來引導學生進行設計專案，先從了解客戶及品牌風格開始，並限制設計發展的物件避發散，可更聚焦於物件的特性、使用情境與設計上的延伸，進而朝品牌家具的方向發展，讓學生在課程結束後能對實務上的家具設計流程有更多的了解。

We will guide students to design projects using the actual design proposal process by international furniture brands. First to understand the customer and brand style. And limit the design development. Can more focus on the characteristics of the object. Use context and design extension. Follow the brand furniture design direction. It is hoped that students will have a better understanding of the practical furniture design process after the course.

name: 電腦輔助製造(二)
syllabus:
本課程著重介紹電腦輔助製造技術的概念與實作。內容包含圖面繪製、圖面匯入、刀路設定、刀路轉存G代碼、設備介紹及數位設備上機實作等等，落實了CNC從無到有的步驟。課程包含介紹兩套熱門CAD/CAM軟體，降低了未來接軌數位製造的門檻。
This course focuses on the concepts and implementation of computer-aided manufacturing techniques. The content includes drawing practicie, drawing import, toolpath setting, toolpath transform G-code, digital manufacture introduction and computer implementation of digital equipment, etc., implementing the steps of CNC from scratch. The course includes the introduction of two popular CAD/CAM software, which lowers the threshold for connecting with digital manufacturing in the future.

name: 企業資源規劃初階
syllabus:
本課程由ERP概論談起，介紹完整的ERP架構及涵蓋的模組，以及企業規劃及導入ERP的過程，最後結合案例介紹、並探討從ERP到企業的e化等主題，期許同學完成本課程後能了解並運用ERP。
This course begins with a brief introduction of ERP, followed by a comprehensive discussion on the system architecture, functions, and modules of ERP. Also covered in the course is the process of planning and introducing ERP in enterprises. Real-world cases of ERP and e-Business will be provided in the course.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 試作技術(二)
syllabus:
包括製作模型所需用之各種機械設備操作、使用工具、紙模型、工業油土等之加工技術
Training students to operate some basically equipment such as bench work, sheet metal, machining, and welding machines safely and correctly, giving them the primary skills in model making.
progress:
第一階段　（1-5週）
1. 學生進行家具試作預備課程與木工基礎訓練。
2. 實際在教學現場（實習工廠）製作手工木工產品，經由老師現場講解，並經由操作示範後，學生自行操作木工機械：包括鋸切、鉋削、鑽孔與砂光等進行家具製作程序。


第二階段　（6-9週）
藉由口授、講義之影片、圖像與文字等詳述木製家具製程與實務，培養訓練學生對家具製造之程序、生產速度及各種工廠設備與製造系統之整合觀念，並配合教學進度至工廠實務操作與流程走位的方式進行理解加工生產線的環境狀況。


第三階段　（10-18週）
分為兩項考核方式進行
一、以場域實作與測驗的方式進行加工知識面向之考核：
1. 透過家具加工操作任務去測驗學生是否能夠充分理解各生產線流程之加工方式與用途，請學生實際的操演與示範講解。
2. 請學生實際透過分組規劃與討論去對應不同家具類型安排出正確之生產加工步驟與程序。
3. 另出應用題類型之不同家具產品所需的生產加工方式安排為何，請同學規劃並詳述之。
4. 業師的評估與觀察搭配產業實習的經驗回饋。

二、以實際操作機具的方式進行實務操作面向之考核：
操作內容包括：平刨機、裁切機、鑽孔機、砂磨機等，以本系實作工廠之現有機台為主，測驗學生是否能熟練運用木工加工所需之機具與了解生產線之間的關係與相關注意事項。

name: 家具塗裝工程
syllabus:
傢俱塗裝為傢俱外觀重要的製程，本課程教導學生了解傢俱塗裝專業知識與生產規劃，主要包括: 1.傢俱塗料的種類。例如: 刷塗、噴塗、滾筒塗佈、簾幕式塗佈 2.傢俱塗裝方式的選擇。 3.傢俱塗裝作業方式，塗料乾燥、固化及硬化方法。 4.不同塗裝方式在外觀與維護上之影響。 5.塗膜缺陷與對策。 6.塗裝線規劃。
Furniture finish is an important part of appearance, This course will help students to understand furniture finishing and Manufacturing process, include 1. Furniture coatings category. ex: brushing、spraying、roller coating、curtain coating… 2. How to choose best way of coating process. 3. Coating process, curing, drying and hardening of paint. 4. The appearance and maintain in different finish. 5. Coating defects and solution. 6. Production planning.

name: 家具生產管理
syllabus:
本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control. In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided. This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

name: 建築專題設計
syllabus:
本課程(Thesis Design)以研究式設計(Research Design)為核心，於設計中對空間、環境、構築進行反思，提出不同之空間想像與落實方案，並積極參與實質空間之運作過程，促進與實務領域之相互參考。 
本課程除了做為畢業生的空間技術專業的總體檢，也透過畢業設計中以自由意識主動發現空間機會的具體設計作為，以培養學生未來邁入職場的倫理觀與態度，包含邁向專業實踐應具備的毅力，對空間、環境與社會的關懷與理解力，以及探索空間契機與挖掘技術問題解決方案之能力。課程期盼學生畢業後具備創造美好而正義的空間的能力，朝向空間專業者與行動者。
課程之成果為具備建築或空間意義之設計作品，其格式不限某種既定框架。內容應包含時空脈絡分析、議題探討、設計策略、研究或方法論、特定媒材之設計成果。
Taking Research Design as the core, the course, Thesis Design, revisits space, environment, and construction, for proposing different imagination for places and relative implementation, so as to help students participate in the operation of physical space, as well as enhance cross-reference between the field of practice and academic training. 
In addition to a final examination of spatial techniques in professional program, this course breeds ethics and passionate attitudes into students for further professional practice, through the specific form of thesis design in which freedom of conscious initiative is provoked to find opportunities for certain spaces. Those that should be equipped with students through this course are the perseverance towards professional practice, the ability to program the space, to understand the society and environment, as well as to explore spatial opportunity and strategies for problem solving.

name: 建築與景觀都市主義研究
syllabus:
都市主義(Urbanism)最早可追溯於十九世紀末建築工程師對於空間組織與城市關係的討論，其真正的崛起始於二十世紀初對於集中生產，空間組織網絡與政治經濟市民等都市中新興現象的討論。因日趨複雜化的都市發展與環境巨變的挑戰，九十年代開始陸續出現一系列以都市主義為基盤的跨學科整合性討論，而景觀都市主義(Landscape Urbanism， 1997)則在其中扮演相當關鍵的角色。不論是庫哈斯早期在 ?S/M/L/XL ?中的批判或瓦爾德海姆在 ?都市景觀主義讀本 ?中的宣言，皆引指建築、景觀建築、都市設計與都市計畫學門，已逐漸形成一種彼此跨越亦彼此更新的領域狀態。這般 ?跨 ?都市主義架構，使各學門在理論發展與專業實踐上具有更開展性的方法，介入當代與未來的都市環境與城市生活。然而此跨都市主義的學理多在景觀學門的教學範疇內，但在建築專業教育中卻鮮有足夠的涉及與含括。
本課程則基於此前提，欲將當代景觀都市主義學理，配合建築與都市主義思作為架構，一方面將景觀都市主義相關論述引入建築學習，另一方面欲擴充建築專業知識之本體，培養學生具有主體性的跨域知識建構。本課程結構以景觀與建築兩學門做為學理核心，同時為強化都市主義的實踐本質，將協同專家與景觀學人共同進
The term "urbanism" originated in the late nineteenth century with a focus on
spatial organization of the city. The emergence of urbanism in the early twentieth century was associated with the rise of industrial distribution, spatial networks and citizenship etc. in the city. After 90’s, there were a series of new academic terms referring to this idea which created a base for interdisciplinary studies amongst related spatial terrains. Landscape Urbanism is regarded as one of the significant design and planning ethos especially in the twenty-first century. In Koolhaas’ early work S/M/L/XL and Waldheim’s representative collection The Landscape Urbanism Reader, they both shared account that architecture, landscape architecture, urban design and planning are moving toward shared form of ?emerging ‘practice. The body of knowledge about Landscape Urbanism has been largely developed within landscape discipline, yet merely in the architectural discourse especially in Taiwan.

name: 當代城市中都市社會基礎設施再思
syllabus:
由於九零年代後，城市急速擴張與超越領域性(de-terrorization)的連結等新興狀態萌生，基礎設施(infrastructure)的定義逐漸開始難以精確認定，而身為城市興衰論述的經常主體，基礎設施自身的論述與再定義卻在空間學門中成為那缺落的一塊。

基於此，本課程期望透過幾項特定學門角度，提供一個對於基礎設施為研究主題的論述框架，進而連結建築學門與相關空間學門間對於當代全球城市論述中之縫隙，能在跨學門田野研究中提出他種可能性(alternatives)。 本課程將以兩種方項進行基礎設施當代性的"實踐"; 部分課程內容將邀請德國杜賓根大學台灣研究中心，以空間社會學角度提供授課交流。另一部分將透過雙邊學生，以共同主題進行台北與德國城市的實際田野調查並以比較分析的方式進行合作討論。課程架構則以建築學與空間社會學為主軸剖析，分為五個部分:全球城市與多尺度論述，當代基礎設施與建築/地景對話，社會基礎設施的物質性與再生產，看不見的基礎設施與田野調查為總結。預計學生能透過不同學門角度的切入、於不同文化背景學生間合作討論、多種教學方式的引導，培養基礎辯證思考之能力並進一步對當代都市基礎設施的空間性研究之興趣。
In the contemporary word, especially in globalized cities, infrastructure is hard to define for many reasons and at some points infrastructure is also often invisible to its users.

This class will therefore seek to rethink the subject of infrastructure from particular perspectives which frame the structure of this module. We then proposed a join-class with Taiwan study centre at University of T?bingen, Germany for wider debates and teaching possibilities as well. There will be two academic discourses-Architecture and sociology involved and formed into five sessions which can be seen in course syllabus. In so doing, it will focus on firstly by reading theory; secondly, by examining specific case studies that illustrates how these theories manifests themselves; and thirdly, by considering how these infrastructures may be changing the understanding of contemporary globalized cities and reproducing urban networks in different fields and countries.

name: 建築專題討論（一）
syllabus:
本課程主要以對於當代建築具有啟發性和創新性的經典著作 (包括建築理論、文學、電影、哲學) 為範圍，透過修課者的精讀、研討交流、對話，以窺探形塑當代建築的重要觀念與內涵，並結合與之相對應的建築作品進行作品的閱讀與詮釋。

本課程希望修課者以研究者、創作者和建築學者的三種身份，從(形而下)到非物質面(形而上)的互文關係，且具有相互指涉互為一體的角度來理解、洞察和探索建築，培養建築學上的抽象性思考和創作觀點，並藉此建構建築視野的哲思；另一方面，做為創作型論文的設計方法論的基礎養成。

課程以非授課形式進行，修課者每周進行指定、和延伸性閱讀，於上課時間進行閱讀報告與心得之討論，授課老師進行導讀，並就討論內容提出分析比較與歸納。

透過整學期的多重指定文本交叉比較和探討，期望修課者最終能提出具有個人意識的主題性書寫。

name: 台灣近現代建築發展
syllabus: This course mainly discusses the development of modern Taiwanese architecture since the Japanese colonial period. The historical development of Taiwanese architecture could be divided into traditional Han architecture and modern architecture with Japanese and western influences. Based on the timeline, three themes will be introduced: (1) the background of Taiwanese modern architecture, (2) Taiwanese architecture during the colonial period, (3) Taiwanese architecture after the Second World War.

2.	Detail of "Participation"
Each participant needs to prepare a brief introduction to the (non-architectural) social background of one cultural period of time. This will be the tuned in of the class of the day for 20 minutes.
(Week 02) Dutch and Spanish Empires in the 17th Century (relationship with the world)
(Week 03) 17th. C. to 19th. C. China (relationship with the rest of the world)
(Week 04) Japan before 1895 (westernization)
(Week 05) Japanese colonial power in Taiwan and China 
(Week 10) social background in the first half of the 20th-century China
(Week 11) Japanese architecture after WWII 
(Week 12) global modernist architecture esp. after WWII
(Week 13) ideology of Chinese origin before and after 1945 (from 1940s to 1960s)
(Week 14) global trends of architectural regionalism
(Week 16) from postmodern architecture to Deconstructivism in the world

3.	Detail of "	Mid-term presentation": proposal for the final report 20%
In the first half of the courses, students have to outline their interests of Taiwanese architecture in certain approaches. They might be architectural styles (ex. Regionalism, modernism, etc.), structural systems, materials (ex. Brick, RC, etc.), particular types of architecture, one or two individual architects, etc. Students should present their plans of their final reports in the mid-term class about 10 minutes, in order to collect some feedback from colleagues and class instructor for further develop to achieve the final report.

4.	Detail of "	Research thesis": 30%
One should submit his/her thesis by 6/15 12:00pm to Dr. Wu. The words of the thesis should not be less than 3000 words. It should be in thesis format (word) instead of brief presentation format (power point).
The final report should present the development and influences from the past to the present (or particular period).

name: 建築設計
syllabus:
本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：
第一學年課程視為建築設計之基礎課題，從建築美學之觀點培養基本素養、建築模樣體驗、設計實作再造，達到建築設計基本知識之體態。並結合一年級橫向課程之實作、圖學、設計理論、全能住宅改造等課程，課程規劃以多元建構為主，其養成要點如下:
1. 美學再創造：基本美學素養養成，將感知中的聽覺、視覺、觸覺等與美學體驗再度結合，用思考轉換形式。奠定日後進入空間美學基礎。
2. 建築繪圖與表現技巧：建築相關圖學與識圖展現養成，體驗空間感受與空間掌握，美學與繪圖思考整合。
3. 空間構成與思維邏輯：將2D轉為3D，藉由點、線、面、體之基本元素，將環境觀察或是感知等邏輯分析，呈現空間的比例、尺度或透過實作技術等理論，重構思維進一步與環境共構將空間再塑。
4. 設計實務養成：為因應環境友善，與環境共存之議題如何運用在設計之中，探討行為模式、機能、線安排空間組織等等，將環境之感受能力，以空間再改造展現能力，由於重於綠材料之實作特色，因此實作養成之重要關鍵之一，需配合全能改造課程。達到創作性實務，可說是實驗性實作的特色課程。
5.材料與構築實驗：體驗材料之特性，將材料之特性發揮到極限。
This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. 
The course as the fundamental of architectural design aims to foster basic knowledge from the perspective of architectural aesthetics, experience, and design execution. Combined with the lateral curriculum of construction, drawing, design theory, and housing renewal projects, the program built upon diversified exposures in 1. aesthetics, 2. architectural drawings and rendering techniques, 3. spatial constructs and logics, 4.  Professional training, 5.  materials and experiments, 6. communication and presentation.

name: 建築環境控制系統(二)
syllabus:
本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 建築防火避難與消防設備2. 給排水衛生化糞設備3. 升降機設備系統4. 智慧型建築概論5. 垃圾處理設備6.物理環境衝擊影響評估與對策
This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the second step of a series course, its content including:1. Architecture Fire Safety. Fire Escape and Fire Fighting Equipment2. Plumbing Equipment3. Elevator Equipment4. Introduction about Intelligent Building5. Refuse Treatment Equipment6. Physical Environmental Impact Assessment and Resolution.

name: 實務專題（一）
syllabus:
實務專題課程為建築專題設計（畢業設計）的輔助課程，分二學期：第一學期為前置課程，主要訓練學生具備獨立思考和建立自主觀點的能力，依教師專長指導學生探討和發展設計議題、收集相關資料和進行案例分析、自訂設計方法與流程、並提出畢業設計的研究方向；第二學期旨在加強學生在建築實務工作各領域的能力，結合設計課程的操作，對特定之實務課題（例如：空間計畫、結構分析、細部設計與大樣圖模、施工圖、機電配置、材料實驗、構築實作、綠建築檢討、CFD模擬、施工管理、法規檢討、BIM模型、競圖報告書、設計方法論、參數演算、動畫製作、專業rendering等項目）進行深入探討並提出專題報告。
The course works together with Special Topics on Architectural Design (Thesis Design) in two semesters. The first semester is preparatory course which trains students to think independently and establish independent perspective. Teachers of different fields guide students to explore design issues, collect data, have case study, develop design methodology, and propose future direction for thesis design . The second semester aims to enhance students' abilities in practice, such as planning, structural analysis, detail drawing, shop drawing, electrical and mechanical system, materials experiments, tectonic construction, green building evaluation, CFD simulation, construction management, regulatory review, BIM modeling, competition reports, design methodology, parametric algorithms, animation, rendering and so on.

name: 循環經濟之建築設計
syllabus:
本課程論述工業生產演進與全球綠色設計方法、趨勢，以及規範與法規需求，定義出創新、高品質和優秀的設計。引導學生多元領域學習，在建築設計中提出兼具環境、社會與經濟平衡之構想，藉以奠定我國未來勞動力市場的循環建築創新能量。
This course discusses the evolution of industrial production and global green design methods and trends, as well as the requirements of regulations and regulations, and defines innovation, high quality and excellent design. Guide students to study in multiple fields, and put forward the concept of environmental, social and economic balance in architectural design, so as to lay the energy of circular architectural innovation in China's future labor market.

name: 建築保存與再利用
syllabus: 本課程為建築史專題的進階課程。上課方式以演講為主，輔以課後調查實作，與古蹟修復實例的參觀，藉由保存理論、實際案例的介紹，概述建築保存論述下的實踐課題。一方面介紹國外近年有關歷史建築的保存與再利用觀念，另一方面則以本地近期案例的討論，期使同學對建築史的理論與實踐有一初步的概念，並培養其對身處環境的關心與文化涵養。

name: 數位構築
syllabus:
本課程訓練運用數位科技能力，以進行建築領域中的複雜幾何設計形體的發展、描述、資訊擷取，並透過系統化流程加以合理化，以至建造完成。本課程授課方式為演講及實作並行，課程預期修課者發展出一套有創意的數位構築系統。

The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in digital technologies for extracting, developing, and analyzing data of complex geometries while facilitating the production of a systematic workflow for rationalization and constructability. The course will be conducted through lectures and tutorials and expects students to develop unique and creative digital fabrication systems.

name: 城鄉空間再造
syllabus:
本課程預計結合本校USR大學社會責任實踐計畫，透過專題式學習與案例分析調研，帶領學生盤點社區議題並研擬對策，建構城鄉空間的形成與社會族群的關係，並進行城鄉空間再造的提案，包括：社會計畫、設施計畫、營造計畫、執行措施等階段工作內容，並著手進行計畫實踐之實務操作等。從城市中的空間變革到地方創生，強化學生對建築專業之社會實踐/社會責任的體認，以期培養學生博雅的品格，開拓生命視野。
This course is aimed to involve the students into the project of University Social Responsibility. By means of inventory on issues in communities and through project-based learning, this course will provide students an opportunity to understand the relationship between formation of urban spaces and social groups, then to draft a social plan, a facility plan or even a strategic guidance for further execution. From urban space reconstruction to place-making (regional revitalization), the students are expected to explore the diverse values of architectural profession and to practice the social responsibility by applying their expertise to solve real-world problems.

name: 設計溝通
syllabus:
設計的溝通扮演著如何將設計理念成功地傳達以及讓使用者清楚的理解設計本意的重要角色。
本課程將透過設計思考過程藉由文字、口說、圖面等達到設計溝通之目的及訓練，經由了解設計領域應用之文字搭配口說及圖面進而增進設計者說明設計概念的溝通能力。
課程內容包含設計溝通的基本原則、技巧及策略，以及如何利用不同的溝通媒介及工具來傳達設計理念。
課程操作包含案例分析搭配實際的簡報演練及口說訓練讓同學們累積應用經驗。
Design Communication plays an important role in how to successfully deliver design concepts and have users understand the design intention clearly. 
This course will practice and reach the goal of design communication through design thinking by vocabulary uses, verbal speeches, and image presentations.  From understanding the proper application of design language including vocabularies and diagrams in various design fields, designers may improve their skills of concept presentation and communication.  
The course content includes basic principles, techniques, and strategies in design communication as well as how to use different media and tools to deliver design concepts.
Course activities include case studies with presentation practice and oral speech to help students have experiences in actual application.

name: 學院指定向度-社會與法治
學院指定向度-創新與創業
建築設計
syllabus:
本課程分四年（八學期）教授， 四學年課程培養的核心專業能力如下: 
■	第一年 : 以建築設計的基礎為範疇。
訓練造型基礎，包括尺度、比例﹑秩序與韻律、實虛、量體與空間等造型的基本設計能力。                                                                                                                                        
■	第二年 ：以人與空間為範疇，並學習建築的內部構成要素。
在具備設計基礎能力之後，進一步接觸建築的基本向度與原理的設計練習，包括身體與空間、使用行為模式、建築物理環境、構造與結構系統、建築構成系統、建築的類型與形態。  
■	第三年 ：都市建築為主要範疇。
將建築的關注聚焦到與其連結的環境系統或城市紋理，學習從外部環境或都市理論回饋到建築的規劃設計。
第四年：即畢業設計，培養學生針對特定建築問題之探究能力，鼓勵以建築思索如何關注社會、文化與自然的課題，最終以設計方案回應之。
This four-year course will be taught within eight semesters and aims to train students in the core competencies as follows:
■ First year: foundations of architectural design
Training of fundamental modeling, including basic designing concepts such as scale, proportion, order and rhythm, solid and void, volume, and space
■ Second year: people and space, and internal elements of architecture
Beyond competency in elementary design, further practicing basic aspects and principles of architecture design, including human body and space, user behavior model, physical environment of buildings, construction and structure system, architectural composition system, architectural type and form, etc.
■ Third year: Urban architecture
Focus of environmental system or urban structure relating to architecture, which helps students apply what they have learned from the external environment or urban theory to the planning and design of buildings
■ Fourth year: Graduation project

name: 中國建築史
syllabus: 本課程為大二以上修習”中國建築史”的概論課程。上課方式以演講為主，藉由文獻、圖片、畫作、文物等史料，介紹中國建築史論述下的實踐課題，一方面呈現主流體系下的漢民族建築系統的介紹，另一方面也涵括中國各地域建築系統的討論。使同學了解中國住居文化及培養其對身處環境的關心與文化涵養。

name: 建築表現實務
syllabus:
本課程為輔導學生在建築設計操作過程的不同階段，以適切且具創造力的表現媒材與技法呈現階段性的成果，從空間觀察與記錄、問題分析、概念發想、方案演化，直至具體方案的模擬與傳達性的說明，養成具備創意競賽實力與實務接軌能力的設計師。
As an integral part of the process of designing and understanding architecture, the course is structured to introduce advanced representational and fabrication techniques applied to architecture. Through experiential learning and exploring, students are expected to able to use different media to develop analytical, critical and representational skills and as generative design tools.

name: 建築設計競賽設計實務
syllabus:
透過鏈結教育部設計戰國策之計畫，本課程以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。

By linking with the Ministry of Education’s IDC program, this course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.
progress:
本課程將包含「教師講演」、「課堂分組討論」以及「分組競賽成果 」，以下為各項說明：

．「教師講演」包含設計方法、表現法與繪圖、渲染軟體操作示範，內容安排會與建築設計課程與競賽主題扣合，相輔相成。
．「課堂分組討論」為各組選擇授課老師給定競賽其一參與，並與授課老師討論安排競賽發展進度、設計產出。
．「分組競賽成果」則除了須包含最終繳交圖說與文件外，亦須將發展成果整理成報告書。

name: BIM建築資訊系統概論
syllabus:
目前建築工程營建產業多賴以圖文資料溝通，文件易有失誤，會提高成本、工期延長、甚至於爭議之狀況。BIM 工具之運用，可有效提升營建產業生產力。各國政府已紛紛推出 BIM 的審照制度，我國近年來於公共工程招標已要求BIM技術之整合運用。本課程針對BIM運用於建築生命週期中各產業間的介紹及效益、實例分享，並於課程中指導同學針對BIM軟體基礎工具使用。
Architectural engineering construction industry on which 2D graphic data communication, the file is easy to form mistakes, will increase the cost of the extension of time, even controversial situation. The use of Building Information Modeling (BIM) software tools, which can effectively enhance the productivity of the construction industry. Governments around the world have now launched the BIM audit system.
In recent years, Taiwan has asked the public works bidding integrate and use of BIM technology. This course focuses on the introduction and effective life cycle of BIM for architectural industry, examples of sharing.  Guidance to students in courses based tool for BIM software.
progress:
week 01-02: Intro: a basic understanding of the construction process and a closer look at the ArchiCAD interface and working environment setting (task 1)
week 03-04: toolbox (1): wall, column, beam, and roof + introduction to editing (task 2)
week 05-06: toolbox (2): door, window, and curtain wall + precise placement and measurement (task 3)
week 07-08: toolbox (3): slab, stair, and railing + construction documentation (1): defining views, layers, and adding annotations (task 4)
week 09: practice I
week 10: QA and feedback 
week 11-12: toolbox (4): shell and morph + construction documentation (2): layout sheet and construction documentation (task 5) 
week 13-14: toolbox (5): mesh and objects + isometric and diagram (task 6)
week 15: basic rendering 
week 16-18: practice II
grading:
participation 20%
tasks 30% (5% each)
practices 50% (25% each)
textbook: https://www.youtube.com/@nalituts

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
建築設計
syllabus:
本課程分四年（八學期）教授， 四學年課程培養的核心專業能力如下: 
■	第一年 : 以建築設計的基礎為範疇。
訓練造型基礎，包括尺度、比例﹑秩序與韻律、實虛、量體與空間等造型的基本設計能力。                                                                                                                                        
■	第二年 ：以人與空間為範疇，並學習建築的內部構成要素。
在具備設計基礎能力之後，進一步接觸建築的基本向度與原理的設計練習，包括身體與空間、使用行為模式、建築物理環境、構造與結構系統、建築構成系統、建築的類型與形態。  
■	第三年 ：都市建築為主要範疇。
將建築的關注聚焦到與其連結的環境系統或城市紋理，學習從外部環境或都市理論回饋到建築的規劃設計。
第四年：即畢業設計，培養學生針對特定建築問題之探究能力，鼓勵以建築思索如何關注社會、文化與自然的課題，最終以設計方案回應之。
This four-year course will be taught within eight semesters and aims to train students in the core competencies as follows:
■ First year: foundations of architectural design
Training of fundamental modeling, including basic designing concepts such as scale, proportion, order and rhythm, solid and void, volume, and space
■ Second year: people and space, and internal elements of architecture
Beyond competency in elementary design, further practicing basic aspects and principles of architecture design, including human body and space, user behavior model, physical environment of buildings, construction and structure system, architectural composition system, architectural type and form, etc.
■ Third year: Urban architecture
Focus of environmental system or urban structure relating to architecture, which helps students apply what they have learned from the external environment or urban theory to the planning and design of buildings
■ Fourth year: Graduation project

name: 設計實作
syllabus:
掌握形式從屬機能旨意，熟悉施作技術限制與創意可行性，學習從設計到實作的落實，透過各種機械設備操作、加工技術學習，實際接觸及操作真實材料，了解材料種類、性質、加工過程、組裝知識、技術與美學等，以呈現設計作品之原型與成品。
Based on “Form follows Function”, student will learn interacts and limitations among technology feasibility and creative application, in order to master sequential implementations form design ideas to real works. Students are required to operate various mechanical equipment and processing technologies, thus to realize the types and nature of the materials, processing procedure, as well as the assembly of knowledge, technologies and aesthetics to format intended design prototypes and establishments.

name: 電腦輔助繪圖
syllabus:
本課程內容分二部分進行授課，第一個部份以小組進行校園建築進行實測後，繪製平、立、剖面圖，以加強學生團隊合作，並透過實際量測與繪製建築平、立、剖面圖，使學生感受實體與練習之關係；由於目前臺灣多以集合住宅建照申請居多，且住宅為空間尺度之根本；因此，第二個部份之課堂操作，依序為浴廁、臥室、廚房、餐廳、客廳單元等不同空間尺度練習後，聚焦於住宅平面圖之練習；接著，透過住宅平面圖之練習，衍伸至立面圖與剖面圖與透視圖練習。課程亦將藉由同學上述二個部分之練習，延續第一學期建築製圖基本常識、觀念與技法之傳授，以確實增進學生建築製圖能力。 本課程符合系教育目標如下： 1. 訓練學生建築設計與工程基礎專業能力； 2. 透過實作方式彙整建築設計與建築構造之技能； 3. 引導建立建築專業道德倫理態度； 4. 整合建築理論與實務提升就業競爭力。

name: 西洋建築史
syllabus: 本課程主要在教導學生對西方(歐洲及西亞)認識歷史建築之演進過程與思考涵構，並使學生具備西方文化歷史與思想的相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--自古埃及、西亞、而收至古典建築、基督教建築、中世紀的大教堂時代以至文藝復興及17、18世紀的建築歷史。2.在思想上--自希臘的文化與哲學思想談起，以至各時代之政治、宗教與社會文明之演進，瞭解歷史涵構及其對建築的表現。3.在建築上─針對每一時期的建築表現，瞭解其構造方法、材料應用及相關細部特徵。

name: 設計理論概論
syllabus:
前言: 本課程主要為介紹現今主要名家與重要學派之設計理念與其實踐狀況，授課採講演與研討方式進行。內容: 瞭解設計相關理論與方法。 瞭解設計之方法與課題。 瞭解設計研究之寫作與閱讀方法。 方式: 由授課老師依不同時期，介紹所屬領域之理論、方法及參考文獻。授課方式，採講義、討論、參觀及邀請演講等方式綜合進行。為
he content of this course is to introduce the design philosophy and implementing skills of contemporary noted architects and major schools. This course will be carried on by lecturing and seminar.

name: 建築設計 (二)
syllabus:
總課程目標： 在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非 實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研二課程目標： 透過設計課題培養自實質至非實質環境與實踐之總體操作能力 ，其深度與廣度將是評價判準。 課程概要： 就各學員所選定課題完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程 書面資料，以接受目標檢驗。
Goal for the Course : Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. 2nd Grade Through different design topics, the disciples accomplish the course goal－enhancing the ability of general manipulation and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete presentation, which includes design result and a report of the process of ascertainment, will be required for evaluation. The evaluation will emphasize on the depth and width of ascertainment and practice.

name: 都市設計與實習(二)
syllabus:
本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一)大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二)都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三)都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四)新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken depend on when and how it is appropriate:(1) Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(2) Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(3) Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design (4) Exercise on urban design for new development area

name: 專題設計與實習（二）
syllabus: 本課程為工程技術組必修，分為綠建築、建築構法、數位媒體、建築生產、建築在利用、環境控制等專題，每學期視任課老師專長輪流開設兩至三個專題，採用分組方式個別指導，每位學生必須修習兩個不同專題。本課程將針對建築實務中所面對之技術課題進行個案研究並模擬操作其設計至細部設計階段。

name: 當代城市中都市社會基礎設施再思
syllabus:
由於九零年代後，城市急速擴張與超越領域性(de-terrorization)的連結等新興狀態萌生，基礎設施(infrastructure)的定義逐漸開始難以精確認定，而身為城市興衰論述的經常主體，基礎設施自身的論述與再定義卻在空間學門中成為那缺落的一塊。

基於此，本課程期望透過幾項特定學門角度，提供一個對於基礎設施為研究主題的論述框架，進而連結建築學門與相關空間學門間對於當代全球城市論述中之縫隙，能在跨學門田野研究中提出他種可能性(alternatives)。 本課程將以兩種方項進行基礎設施當代性的"實踐"; 部分課程內容將邀請德國杜賓根大學台灣研究中心，以空間社會學角度提供授課交流。另一部分將透過雙邊學生，以共同主題進行台北與德國城市的實際田野調查並以比較分析的方式進行合作討論。課程架構則以建築學與空間社會學為主軸剖析，分為五個部分:全球城市與多尺度論述，當代基礎設施與建築/地景對話，社會基礎設施的物質性與再生產，看不見的基礎設施與田野調查為總結。預計學生能透過不同學門角度的切入、於不同文化背景學生間合作討論、多種教學方式的引導，培養基礎辯證思考之能力並進一步對當代都市基礎設施的空間性研究之興趣。
In the contemporary word, especially in globalized cities, infrastructure is hard to define for many reasons and at some points infrastructure is also often invisible to its users.

This class will therefore seek to rethink the subject of infrastructure from particular perspectives which frame the structure of this module. We then proposed a join-class with Taiwan study centre at University of T?bingen, Germany for wider debates and teaching possibilities as well. There will be two academic discourses-Architecture and sociology involved and formed into five sessions which can be seen in course syllabus. In so doing, it will focus on firstly by reading theory; secondly, by examining specific case studies that illustrates how these theories manifests themselves; and thirdly, by considering how these infrastructures may be changing the understanding of contemporary globalized cities and reproducing urban networks in different fields and countries.

name: 都市空間分析與再現
syllabus:
This course aims to introduce students to key theoretical and methodological approaches in urban design. The main content will be delivered through a series of case study discussion and project-based research practice. In specific, the case study is to review and identify key factors shaping the physical environment of cities; while through independent research projects, students are expected to engage in a step-by-step process of on-site observation and computational analysis, examining how the factors are interacting with each other.

Note: Competency in the basic use of computer is required. In class, the instructor will provide tutorials about how to use the computational analysis tool (Space Syntax).

Office Hour: Tuesday 16:00-17:00

name: 台灣近現代建築發展
syllabus: This course mainly discusses the development of modern Taiwanese architecture since the Japanese colonial period. The historical development of Taiwanese architecture could be divided into traditional Han architecture and modern architecture with Japanese and western influences. Based on the timeline, three themes will be introduced: (1) the background of Taiwanese modern architecture, (2) Taiwanese architecture during the colonial period, (3) Taiwanese architecture after the Second World War.

Each participant needs to prepare a brief introduction to the (non-architectural) social background of one cultural period of time. This will be the tuned in of the class of the day for 20 minutes.

(Week 14) global trends of architectural regionalism
(Week 16) from postmodern architecture to Deconstructivism in the world

3.	Detail of "	Mid-term presentation": proposal for the final report 20%
In the first half of the courses, students have to outline their interests of Taiwanese architecture in certain approaches. They might be architectural styles (ex. Regionalism, modernism, etc.), structural systems, materials (ex. Brick, RC, etc.), particular types of architecture, one or two individual architects, etc. Students should present their plans of their final reports in the mid-term class about 10 minutes, in order to collect some feedback from colleagues and class instructor for further develop to achieve the final report.

4.	Detail of "	Research thesis": 30%
One should submit his/her thesis by 6/15 12:00pm to Dr. Wu. The words of the thesis should not be less than 3000 words. It should be in thesis format (word) instead of brief presentation format (power point).
The final report should present the development and influences from the past to the present (or particular period).

name: 建築專題討論（一）
syllabus:
本課程主要以對於當代建築具有啟發性和創新性的經典著作 (包括建築理論、文學、電影、哲學) 為範圍，透過修課者的精讀、研討交流、對話，以窺探形塑當代建築的重要觀念與內涵，並結合與之相對應的建築作品進行作品的閱讀與詮釋。

本課程希望修課者以研究者、創作者和建築學者的三種身份，從(形而下)到非物質面(形而上)的互文關係，且具有相互指涉互為一體的角度來理解、洞察和探索建築，培養建築學上的抽象性思考和創作觀點，並藉此建構建築視野的哲思；另一方面，做為創作型論文的設計方法論的基礎養成。

課程以非授課形式進行，修課者每周進行指定、和延伸性閱讀，於上課時間進行閱讀報告與心得之討論，授課老師進行導讀，並就討論內容提出分析比較與歸納。

透過整學期的多重指定文本交叉比較和探討，期望修課者最終能提出具有個人意識的主題性書寫。

name: 都市與文化再生專題
syllabus:
本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. 
The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

name: 世界風土建築
syllabus: 台灣原住民為南島語系（Austronesian linguistics）的一支，其他所屬地域包括南太平洋幾個小島，如Austrelia、Indonesia、Malaysia、Borneo、Melanesia、Micronesia、New Guinea、Philippine、Polynesia、New Zealand等所謂南島族群。本課程的設計，擬以風土建築的學理分析開始，並由宗教學、人類學及建築學等跨領域學科理論，分就原住民所屬的原始社會予以介紹，依信仰、象徵、儀式行為、儀式空間、儀式建築的表徵分別討論，期使修課同學對於原初建築形式的出現及來由，有一深刻的認識。其次，由修課同學就世界風土建築進行資料收集，除介紹世界不同地域所生產的建築文化外，亦就其社會組織、生活文化特色及象徵系統進行討論。

name: 電影城市專題
syllabus: While cinema has been invented over a hundred years and getting influential in shaping people’s perspectives to our environments, the studies of cinematic urbanism have only initiated since 1990s. During the past decades, this interdisciplinary field has developed upon the scholarships of various disciplines, including film and media studies, cultural studies, history, geography, urban studies, etc. This course intends to introduce this still young field through chronologically examining the relationships between cinema and cities, from both being used to celebrate and mediate the modern feelings to film noir playing a crucial role to criticize and depict urban problems, and to cinematic urban imaginaries boosting tourism and intervening in urban process. Students will learn the theories and methodologies of cinematic urbanism studies, comprehending cinema and different urban spaces as powerful medium that could be manipulated to create, transmit, and perceive certain ideologies.

name: 室內環境品質
syllabus: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一.健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二.建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三.生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四.診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。

name: 室內環境品質專題
syllabus:
為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。
本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一、疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與疫之關聯。二、家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三、醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四、日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。

name: 文化遺產防災學
syllabus:
我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。
本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。

name: 建築碳足跡
syllabus:
國際能源署(IEA)呼籲全球國家訂定淨零碳排路徑，國內也發佈「台灣 2050 淨零路徑及策略」，具體宣告了淨零碳排的目標期程與行動方案，針對建築部門納入低碳(低蘊含碳)建築評估(Low Embodied-carbon Building Rating System, LBERS)，藉由標準化、透明化的建築資訊來剖析建築生命週期各階段對環境的影響，以培養永續淨零概念並具備評估整棟建築生命週期的碳足跡、甚進一步提出減碳熱點，了解建築物的節碳潛力所在。了解國內外淨零碳排路徑策略、具備建築物生命週期的整體流程概念、具備建築碳足跡計算操作能力。
IEA (The International Energy Agency) proposes to set a global net carbon emission roadmap, and domestically launch a net target and action plan, targeting the building sector, the Low Embodied-carbon Building Rating System(LBERS) a simple and effective assessment tool to evaluates the carbon footprint of a building's life cycle through standardized and transparent building information, the impact of various stages of the building life cycle on the environment is analyzed step by step. This course not only evaluates the carbon footprint of the entire building life cycle but also further identifies carbon hotspots and provides carbon reduction strategies, hence understanding carbon savings potential of buildings.

name: 健康建築環境學（二）
syllabus: 健康建築環境與設計方式，透過建築設計達成永續發展目標(SDGs)與永續報告書(ESG)之健康福祉。課程包含探討國際發展健康建築認證系統與項目，關鍵影響人員健康之環境因子：空氣、水、熱舒適、光、聲學、水、材料、運動、營養、心靈、互動等項目，從中探討健康建築與人之健康關連，並具體呈現於設計規範策略，作為深度研究議題，滿足學生學習核心能力。

name: 傳統與未來的建築構法
syllabus:
本課程從建築物構築方法和材料特性出發，介紹構法的歷史以及創新應用。內容包括現行工法的運用，以及先進工法的突破。藉由課程引導和案例介紹，培養學生構法知識與應用能力，提升學理與實務上的知能。
This course starts from building construction methods, introduces the technical history, innovative applications of construction methods. The content includes the application of current construction methods, as well as the breakthrough of advanced construction. Through course guidance and case study, students will cultivate their knowledge of construction method, and enhance their ability in academic theory and practice.

name: 永續與韌性城市專題
syllabus:
韌性城市是回應環境變化以尋求新穩定狀態的住宅建築與聚落。由於氣候變遷逐漸影響居住環境，加以城市發展，消耗的能源與資源，促使碳排放增加，破壞自然界的循環，加劇氣候變遷；台灣位處自然災害脆弱帶，將近3/4面積與人口處於地震、颱風與洪患之複合性災害地區，宜積極強化住宅建築與都市設計之減緩與調適作為。研究顯示藉由建構永續與韌性機制，有助於建築及都市基盤設施系統，有效因應環境變化。
本課程將研究在全球化與氣候變化下的永續與韌性城市發展策略與行動方案；內容包括永續宜居與韌性調適的理論與實務；以實際案例借鑒不同住宅、社區與城市之韌性規劃，減少社會失序和提高應變災害能力的積極策略和實踐方法。

name: 建築專題討論（一）
syllabus:
本課程主要以對於當代建築具有啟發性和創新性的經典著作 (包括建築理論、文學、電影、哲學) 為範圍，透過修課者的精讀、研討交流、對話，以窺探形塑當代建築的重要觀念與內涵，並結合與之相對應的建築作品進行作品的閱讀與詮釋。

本課程希望修課者以研究者、創作者和建築學者的三種身份，從(形而下)到非物質面(形而上)的互文關係，且具有相互指涉互為一體的角度來理解、洞察和探索建築，培養建築學上的抽象性思考和創作觀點，並藉此建構建築視野的哲思；另一方面，做為創作型論文的設計方法論的基礎養成。

課程以非授課形式進行，修課者每周進行指定、和延伸性閱讀，於上課時間進行閱讀報告與心得之討論，授課老師進行導讀，並就討論內容提出分析比較與歸納。

透過整學期的多重指定文本交叉比較和探討，期望修課者最終能提出具有個人意識的主題性書寫。

name: 都市與文化再生專題
syllabus:
本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. 
The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

name: 世界風土建築
syllabus: 台灣原住民為南島語系（Austronesian linguistics）的一支，其他所屬地域包括南太平洋幾個小島，如Austrelia、Indonesia、Malaysia、Borneo、Melanesia、Micronesia、New Guinea、Philippine、Polynesia、New Zealand等所謂南島族群。本課程的設計，擬以風土建築的學理分析開始，並由宗教學、人類學及建築學等跨領域學科理論，分就原住民所屬的原始社會予以介紹，依信仰、象徵、儀式行為、儀式空間、儀式建築的表徵分別討論，期使修課同學對於原初建築形式的出現及來由，有一深刻的認識。其次，由修課同學就世界風土建築進行資料收集，除介紹世界不同地域所生產的建築文化外，亦就其社會組織、生活文化特色及象徵系統進行討論。

name: 都市土地使用計畫與成長管理
資訊蒐集與論文寫作
syllabus:
資訊蒐集技術是研究生在從事研究工作與論文寫作時必須具備的工具。本課程主要目的在協助研究生在眾多的資訊來源中，如何搜尋正確及高品質的資訊。課程內容涵蓋資訊蒐集技術的原則及應用，並探討多種的實用工具及電子資訊來源，以滿足研究生在作研究及論文寫作上對資訊的需求。
Information gathering skills are essential to the studying of graduate students and the development of their subject knowledge on dissertation/thesis writing. The course is designed to help graduate students to find the right kind and the right quality of information from the vast amount available.  The content of the course will deal with the broad principles and practices underlying information gathering techniques which explore the many practical tools and electronics sources of information that will help graduate students find the information they need when doing research or writing the dissertation/thesis.

name: 室內環境品質專題
syllabus:
為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。
本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一、疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與疫之關聯。二、家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三、醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四、日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。

name: 文化遺產防災學
syllabus:
我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。
本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。

name: 智慧建築專題
syllabus:
藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 
1、智慧建築之發展及構成。
2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。
3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。
4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。
5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。
6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 
7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。
8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 
1.The development and composition of intelligent building 
2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 
3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings
4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 
5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 
6.Facilities management of intelligent building
7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building
8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

name: 健康建築環境學（二）
syllabus: 健康建築環境與設計方式，透過建築設計達成永續發展目標(SDGs)與永續報告書(ESG)之健康福祉。課程包含探討國際發展健康建築認證系統與項目，關鍵影響人員健康之環境因子：空氣、水、熱舒適、光、聲學、水、材料、運動、營養、心靈、互動等項目，從中探討健康建築與人之健康關連，並具體呈現於設計規範策略，作為深度研究議題，滿足學生學習核心能力。

name: 人因設計(P)
syllabus:
本課程著重於實踐人因設計，讓學生通過操作眼動儀、3D掃描儀、膚電阻感測器、慣性測量元件等先進設備，直接體驗人因科學如何融入產品設計。學生將學會如何藉由這些工具收集、分析、並運用數據來優化產品設計，從而提高設計的實用性與創新性。
This course focuses on practical human factors design, allowing students to experience the application of human factors science in product design through the use of advanced equipment such as eye trackers, 3D scanners, galvanic skin response sensors, and inertial motion units. Students will learn how to collect, analyse, and apply data with these tools to enhance the efficacy and innovation of product design.

name: 逆向工程研究
syllabus: 逆向工程已成為電腦輔助產品開發技術重要的一環，透過三次元量測或掃瞄技術，取得工件表面的點資料，據以建構3D CAD幾何模型(Geometric model)，以供後續設計、電腦輔助工程分析(CAE)與電腦輔助製造(CAM)之應用。逆向工程的程序分為三個階段：(1)擷取工件表面的點資料；(2)點資料的前置處理；以及(3)建構或更新幾何模型。依此流程，本課程首先講述各類運用於逆向工程中的量測與掃瞄技術，並以設計應用觀點為基礎，討論其間的差異與優缺點，隨著運用領域的不同，而採取不同的量測技術；其次介紹點資料前置處理的理念與方法，從現有文獻中，解析的相關的技術，因量測技術與策略的差異，而發展出不同的處理技術；至於，重建或更新原有的幾何模型的部分，將著重設計實務的應用，並與現有的CAD系統整合的策略。課程之目標，為使修習本課程之學生能對逆向工程的相關理論與技術，有全盤的認識與瞭解，並透過實際案例的操作，訓練學生能具備實務作業能力。

name: 統計學
syllabus:
本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：SPSS資料輸入、資料視覺化、常態分配、假設檢定、型I 誤與型II誤、T 檢定、因素分析、區別分析等。

課程目標為:

01. 如何選擇正確(合適)的統計方法來回答研究問題與假設？

02. 如何使用SPSS 與 AMOS 統計軟體進行分析？

03. 如何正確的解釋與呈現統計分析的結果在學術期刊上？

name: 仿生設計專題討論
syllabus:
本課程適合所有對於如何向自然取經的創新設計策略有興趣的學生。學生將探索這個將功能、性能和美學從生物學轉換成科技的過程，及如何增進設計創造力和產生比傳統技術更好的解決方案，包括講授從原始科學突破到創業初創企業的仿生設計過程，從壁虎式粘合劑到可跑步、飛行和游泳的機器人等案例分析，以及跨領域學生團隊合作進行原創的生物啟發設計專題。
Bioinspired design views the process of how we learn from Nature as an innovation strategy translating principles of function, performance and aesthetics from biology to human technology. This course gives an overview of how bioinspired design can lead to more design creativity and to better solutions than with conventional technology. Lectures will address the biomimicry design process from original scientific breakthroughs to entrepreneurial start-ups using cases studies that include gecko-inspired adhesives and robots that run, fly and swim, Interdisciplinary teams of students will collaborate on, create, and present original bioinspired design projects.

name: 以數據為本的設計
syllabus:
This course immerses industrial design students in the world of generative AI. Each week, students will explore a different aspect or tool of generative AI, understanding how to integrate artificial intelligence into the design process to create innovative, data-driven solutions. Through hands-on experience, collaborative projects, and peer teaching, students will become adept at leveraging AI for design ideation, development, and execution. By the end of the course, students will have a comprehensive portfolio showcasing their proficiency in using generative AI to push the boundaries of industrial design.

這門課主要探索生成式人工智慧的不同面向和工具對工業設計的影響，透過實際操作和教學觀摩，學生將更深入了解如何將生成式人工智慧整合進設計過程中，創造數據驅動的創新解決方案。

name: 設計原理
syllabus:
Design is a quite multiplex domain, technical incarnation, esthetics performance and cultural symbol. And it is the union of the social, economics, technology, arts, psychology, and physiology. The course aims to structure students’ knowledge about the principles and theories of design, improve their abilities to appreciate the aesthetic sense and design works, and provide them with professional terminology. This knowledge constitutes the core which helps young practitioners to attain their artistic objectives and perform project work on a high professional level. This course is based on an overview of the modern design industry, expect to establish a panorama perspective on the subject of design thinking.
設計是一個相當多元的領域，是技術的化身、美學的表現和文化的象徵。它是社會、經濟、技術、藝術、心理學和生理學的結合。本課程旨在構建學生對設計原理和理論的認識，提高學生對美感和設計作品的鑑賞能力，並為他們提供專業術語。這些知識構成了幫助年輕從業者實現其藝術目標並在高專業水平上執行項目工作的核心。本課程基於對現代設計行業的概述，期望建立一個關於設計思維主題的全景視角。

BBC 室內設計規則 Design.Rules.
'Design Rules' - the ultimate back-to-basics design programme explored the perceptions and facts of true design. Demonstrating that there should be no relationship between personal style and basic design rules, the programme explored the living spaces that we have inherited - real homes with all their character and shortcomings.

關於色彩 Colour
Llewelyn-Bowen scoffs at the varieties of cream used in decorating, and uses a mix of bold colours to bring a Victorian house to life. Meanwhile, colour consultant Annabel Alton proposes that when choosing the shades to paint their houses, the nation's DIYers are reflecting collective moods of hope, sorrow or optimism.

4th Week In-depth exploration of Design elements
設計元素的深度探索

With humans spending more time indoors than ever before, use of light has become a series issue. Laurence shows how to transform a room by maximising its natural light, and what effects can be achieved by atmospheric and moody lighting.

5th Week In-depth exploration of Design elements
設計元素的深度探索
關於圖案及材質 Textures and Pattern
Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen explains how bold motifs and textural interplay are important factors to consider for successful interior design.

設計元素的深度探索
關於陳設Balance and Order
What are the principal focal points within a room and how can they be used to best effect? In episode 5, Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen applies ancient rules of design that use focal points as energy lines.

name: 產品服務系統設計
syllabus:
本課程幫助學生(1)增進解決複雜設計問題的專業知識，(2)提升發展創新營運模式的企劃能力與(3)建立當前科技、經濟與社會文化等變遷下的前瞻設計意識。本課程融合相關理論與實務，透過未來劇本工作坊與校外專業者分享經驗，提供學生全方位的產品服務系統設計體驗。
The course is to help students develop an awareness of the implications of current technological, economical and socio-cultural changes to design professional discipline by expanding their expertise for solving complex problems and sharpening their planning capability for business modeling in creative and systematic ways. Integrating theories and design related to Product-Service System, the course provides the students with a comprehensive experience of designing a product and a service in scenario design workshops. Lectures from external professionals will be invited to share their experience with the students.

This course will focus on the design research methods of innovative products and mixed reality. Through the core concepts of virtual-real integration and user experience, it is expected to apply research methods to deeply explore design problems and pain points in user experience and explore physical product design and virtual reality. We will integrate various possibilities of service design with innovative concepts. Then, we intend to utilize the implemented innovative concept by design methods, software, and hardware technologies to achieve the design services and experiences that meet and satisfy users in the future.

name: 生活環境設計專案研究
syllabus:
本課程之目標在於藉由專業養成，累積實務技能，期能在室內裝修設計及材料技術之各面向，並展現生活環境設計實務操作能力。藉由國內外設計競賽主題與各項產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、需求分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒。因本所結合設計、藝術、人文、木工等各領域的學生，整合培育創新設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具各種專長的研究生，協同完成生活環境設計的專案設計研究，或是透過生活環境設計專案執行的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專案執行為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
The objective of this course is to accumulate practical skills through professional development,to be able to demonstrate the practical operation ability of interior decoration design and material technology,to demonstrate the practical operation ability of living environment design.Through the theme of design competitions and various industry-university cooperation design projects,practical exercises are carried out,focusing on data collection,demand analysis,innovative ideas and achievement expression advanced ability cultivation,hoping to let students show their brilliance on the stage of design competitions.Another objective is to construct a multi-field interactive learning environment,which is a project-oriented learning mode,and graduate students with various specialties can be combined to collaborate on the project design research of living environment design,or through the implementation of living environment design projects.

name: 逆向工程研究
syllabus: 逆向工程已成為電腦輔助產品開發技術重要的一環，透過三次元量測或掃瞄技術，取得工件表面的點資料，據以建構3D CAD幾何模型(Geometric model)，以供後續設計、電腦輔助工程分析(CAE)與電腦輔助製造(CAM)之應用。逆向工程的程序分為三個階段：(1)擷取工件表面的點資料；(2)點資料的前置處理；以及(3)建構或更新幾何模型。依此流程，本課程首先講述各類運用於逆向工程中的量測與掃瞄技術，並以設計應用觀點為基礎，討論其間的差異與優缺點，隨著運用領域的不同，而採取不同的量測技術；其次介紹點資料前置處理的理念與方法，從現有文獻中，解析的相關的技術，因量測技術與策略的差異，而發展出不同的處理技術；至於，重建或更新原有的幾何模型的部分，將著重設計實務的應用，並與現有的CAD系統整合的策略。課程之目標，為使修習本課程之學生能對逆向工程的相關理論與技術，有全盤的認識與瞭解，並透過實際案例的操作，訓練學生能具備實務作業能力。

name: 仿生設計專題討論
syllabus:
本課程適合所有對於如何向自然取經的創新設計策略有興趣的學生。學生將探索這個將功能、性能和美學從生物學轉換成科技的過程，及如何增進設計創造力和產生比傳統技術更好的解決方案，包括講授從原始科學突破到創業初創企業的仿生設計過程，從壁虎式粘合劑到可跑步、飛行和游泳的機器人等案例分析，以及跨領域學生團隊合作進行原創的生物啟發設計專題。
Bioinspired design views the process of how we learn from Nature as an innovation strategy translating principles of function, performance and aesthetics from biology to human technology. This course gives an overview of how bioinspired design can lead to more design creativity and to better solutions than with conventional technology. Lectures will address the biomimicry design process from original scientific breakthroughs to entrepreneurial start-ups using cases studies that include gecko-inspired adhesives and robots that run, fly and swim, Interdisciplinary teams of students will collaborate on, create, and present original bioinspired design projects.

name: 設計原理
syllabus:
Design is a quite multiplex domain, technical incarnation, esthetics performance and cultural symbol. And it is the union of the social, economics, technology, arts, psychology, and physiology. The course aims to structure students’ knowledge about the principles and theories of design, improve their abilities to appreciate the aesthetic sense and design works, and provide them with professional terminology. This knowledge constitutes the core which helps young practitioners to attain their artistic objectives and perform project work on a high professional level. This course is based on an overview of the modern design industry, expect to establish a panorama perspective on the subject of design thinking.
設計是一個相當多元的領域，是技術的化身、美學的表現和文化的象徵。它是社會、經濟、技術、藝術、心理學和生理學的結合。本課程旨在構建學生對設計原理和理論的認識，提高學生對美感和設計作品的鑑賞能力，並為他們提供專業術語。這些知識構成了幫助年輕從業者實現其藝術目標並在高專業水平上執行項目工作的核心。本課程基於對現代設計行業的概述，期望建立一個關於設計思維主題的全景視角。

'Design Rules' - the ultimate back-to-basics design programme explored the perceptions and facts of true design. Demonstrating that there should be no relationship between personal style and basic design rules, the programme explored the living spaces that we have inherited - real homes with all their character and shortcomings.

Llewelyn-Bowen scoffs at the varieties of cream used in decorating, and uses a mix of bold colours to bring a Victorian house to life. Meanwhile, colour consultant Annabel Alton proposes that when choosing the shades to paint their houses, the nation's DIYers are reflecting collective moods of hope, sorrow or optimism.

4th Week In-depth exploration of Design elements
設計元素的深度探索
關於照明 Light
With humans spending more time indoors than ever before, use of light has become a series issue. Laurence shows how to transform a room by maximising its natural light, and what effects can be achieved by atmospheric and moody lighting.

設計元素的深度探索

Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen explains how bold motifs and textural interplay are important factors to consider for successful interior design.

設計元素的深度探索
關於陳設Balance and Order
What are the principal focal points within a room and how can they be used to best effect? In episode 5, Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen applies ancient rules of design that use focal points as energy lines.

7th Week In-depth exploration of Design elements
設計元素的深度探索
關於個性 Personality
In the final programme of the series Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen demonstrates how the design rules can be applied to make a room that's completely individual.

name: 生活環境設計專案研究
syllabus:
本課程之目標在於藉由專業養成，累積實務技能，期能在室內裝修設計及材料技術之各面向，並展現生活環境設計實務操作能力。藉由國內外設計競賽主題與各項產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、需求分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒。因本所結合設計、藝術、人文、木工等各領域的學生，整合培育創新設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具各種專長的研究生，協同完成生活環境設計的專案設計研究，或是透過生活環境設計專案執行的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專案執行為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
The objective of this course is to accumulate practical skills through professional development,to be able to demonstrate the practical operation ability of interior decoration design and material technology,to demonstrate the practical operation ability of living environment design.Through the theme of design competitions and various industry-university cooperation design projects,practical exercises are carried out,focusing on data collection,demand analysis,innovative ideas and achievement expression advanced ability cultivation,hoping to let students show their brilliance on the stage of design competitions.Another objective is to construct a multi-field interactive learning environment,which is a project-oriented learning mode,and graduate students with various specialties can be combined to collaborate on the project design research of living environment design,or through the implementation of living environment design projects.

textbook:
（一）一般教材
1. 各類教材優劣分析
（1）室內設計：一般室內設計介紹圖書
此多為針對室內設計科系學生所編教材，深入淺出，著重全盤整合式學習，學生學習易掌握狀況，且易了解，適合初學者使用。然室內設計尚無設計題目之相關教材出版，故可以此上述教材作為參考。
（2）造型、空間與秩序—王德生/唐真真譯 (六合)
對空間架構之描述著墨頗多，對欲向設計表現之同學助益頗大。
◎其他教材之缺點：
(1)教授重點，內容不夠詳實。
(2)部分單元、章節與其他課程有所重疊。
(3)內容過於繁多，若依上課週數安排，無法於一年內上完全部內容。
(4)省略部份重要的基礎概念，學生學習上無法銜接，易造成學習障礙。
(5)內容無法與縱橫向課程銜接，影響學習效果。
2. 補充教材
 (1)空間之構成∕蘆原義信著∕王錦堂譯∕臺隆書店出版
 (2)室內雜誌∕室內雜誌出版社
（3）空間雜誌∕空間雜誌出版社
（4）雅砌月刊
（5）建築技術規則∕營建雜誌社
（6）設計研究成果發表會論文集∕中華民國設計學會編∕年度主辦學校
（7）其他相關室內方法論書籍

（二）參考資料
1. 一般參考資料：書籍包括相關設計方法及各類論文集。
2. 期刊：各大學及技術學院出版的相關學報及設計類雜誌。
3. 網路資料：各大學學院及研究機構、圖書館之網頁設計資訊網等網站。

參考教材可由學生自行借閱或購買，各大書局與圖書館均有藏書，可自由閱覽，或在圖書館借閱，網路資料可上網取得，以網路書店、圖書館、藝術、設計等關鍵字搜尋即可尋獲相關資料。

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.
progress:
第1週  課程說明、反思及構想
第2週  閱讀寫作討論
第3週  生命設計：本週將介紹生命設計思考理論，幫助同學創造理想人生，並進行自我深度探索。
第4週  訪談及溝通表達：本週將介紹訪談寫作，透過訪談以充分了解他人處境，打造生命原型體驗。
第5週  履歷自傳寫作：本週將介紹履歷及自傳寫作方法，以及相關原則。
第6週  影片討論
第7週  職涯探索：本週將運用遊戲進行自我深度探索；同時針對未來工作進行資料蒐集。
第8週  應徵活動：本週將於課堂進行小組應徵活動及團隊遊戲，體驗自我表達與交流。
第9週  履歷自傳討論：本週將採取一對一修改討論，協助同學修改整潤履歷自傳。
第10週  企畫發想：本週將介紹設計發想技巧，並以工作坊形式進行實作練習。
第11週  企畫結構與評估：本週將介紹企畫書內容結構、書寫要點，以及可行性評估原則，並以工作坊形式進行實例討論。
第12週  企畫小組討論：本週為小組討論時間，協助同學準備期末企畫專題。可備筆電，以利作業。
第13週  企畫書撰寫：本週將說明企畫書的內容結構，並進行實作討論。可備筆電，以利作業。
第14週  企畫提案設計：本週將說明企畫提案設計及演說技巧，並進行實例討論。可備筆電，以利作業。
第15週  小組提案報告1
第16週  小組提案報告2
第17週  端午節放假
第18週  自主學習與諮商

syllabus: 基本設計 II 為創設班大二分流前的階段設計整合課程。本學期的課程在技術成面上將利用設計圖學課導入數位製造技術，配合程式設計入門課程，培養學生軟硬體整合設計的能力。在設計能力養成上則透過案例分析題，與各組別的設計自由題，讓學生能藉由不同尺度的設計操作來體認不同領域的設計。

name: 設計圖學
syllabus: 數位技術的應用已成為設計與視覺化溝通上重要的一環。然而數位輔助工具的使用，仍需操作者能以立體的方式去形容所要建構的物件或空間。因此培養學生三維觀察、思考、與想像視覺化的能力依舊是現在設計教育所不可或缺的。本課程便是藉由徒手繪與數位操作的平行訓練，來培養學生在設計上所需要的三維思考想像與傳達呈現的能力。

name: 設計實作
syllabus: 掌握形式從屬機能旨意，熟悉施作技術限制與創意可行性，學習從設計到實作的落實，透過各種機械設備操作、加工技術學習，實際接觸及操作真實材料，了解材料種類、性質、加工過程、組裝知識、技術與美學等，以呈現設計作品之原型與成品。

name: 程式設計入門
syllabus:
本課程將介紹程式設計的基礎，透過腳本式語言及基礎程式語言的應用，培養學生程式設計的基本能力。本課程除加強技術開發能力外，也將導引學生，如何透過獨立思考來面對問題及分析問題，並透過程式的撰寫來解決問題。
This course will introduce the fundamental of computer programming design. Student will learn the capability of programming design using script language and basic programming language. This course will also provide the knowledge and methods for students to realize and analyze specific problem independently. So that they can using computer program to solve the problems.

name: 電腦輔助繪圖與設計
syllabus:
本課程以Creo Parametric(Pro/E) 2.0為教學載具，針對實體造型功能(包括擠出、旋轉、掃瞄、混成、使用曲面、邊界曲面、圓角、倒角…)，且加入拔模、薄殼等進階特徵，綜合應用範例介紹。
本課程為延續性課程，應有先修前學期電腦輔助繪圖與設計基礎者為宜，且以設計學院學生優先。

name: 設計專題討論（二）
syllabus:
互動設計專注於使用情境相關課題，包括多元感覺的產品語意、資訊與功能的整體設計。顧及使用者的需求、使用者的心理和使用者的認知特性；將所有參與互動的操作及顯示單元，透過視覺、觸覺及聽覺等多元感覺的整合設計。使得使用者容易理解。
This course provides study of interaction design related topics on Product Semantics, Information and Function. With emphasis on User Interface integration and Usability Testing, psychology and cognitive proactive, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary on multi-median. This is where the user easy understanding applies and interacts with the product.

name: 設計領導與策略
syllabus:
本課程旨在教授學生，尤其是創業/設計經理，尋找商業案例研究和技術，以快速將創新產品或服務推向市場並收集可操作的客戶見解。它適用於從中小型企業到企業以及一系列工業領域的一系列組織。本課程有助於解決經理面臨的持續壓力，要求他們進行創新並為客戶推出新穎的產品和服務。我們打算引導他們進行整體思維，以推進商業戰略和創業精神。

This course is designed to instruct students, as well as entrepreneurial and design managers, in search of business case studies and techniques for swiftly launching innovative products or services to the market while gathering actionable customer insights. Applicable to a diverse range of organizations, from small to medium-sized enterprises to corporate entities across various industrial segments, the course serves to assist managers in meeting the ongoing demand for innovation and the introduction of novel products and services. Our goal is to guide participants in adopting a holistic approach to advance business strategy and entrepreneurship, addressing the constant need for innovation in their roles.

name: 電子音樂與聲音設計
syllabus:
This course mainly introduces sound design and electronic music production tools and skills. Through the introduction of audio editing technology and the use of related sound design tools, students can learn creative sound design. In the course, students are taught to use the Ableton Live sequencer software, combined with its sound design tools in Max for Live, to design their own software synthesizers and digital effects to be used in the sequencer. These skills may be used in multimedia design, game audio, new media performances, and etc. In addition, this course will also cover the concept and technology of "adaptive music", integrating the middleware FMOD into the game engine Unity to establish a prototype framework of adaptive music for interactive design.

本課程提供給對於電子音樂、聲音藝術、數位音樂、遊戲配樂、以及聲音相關研究等有興趣的學習者們一系列有效工具的介紹與實務練習，並為學習者建立數位音樂、遊戲配樂、聲音設計的基本概念。本課程透過介紹音訊編輯的技術、相關聲音設計工具的使用，學習創意的聲音設計與電子音樂製作。課程當中，除了聲音設計的工具介紹之外，並教導學生使用 Ableton Live 序列器軟體，搭配 Max for Live 的聲音設計工具，讓使用者可以在序列器中使用自己所設計的軟體合成器與數位位效果器，進而可延伸至多媒體、遊戲、新媒體展演等之音樂與音效應用。此外，本課程亦將結合「自適性音樂」的技術，透過中介軟體 FMOD 與遊戲引擎 Unity 進行結合，建立自適音樂的雛形架構，作為互動設計的音樂設計依據。

name: 分析性速寫
syllabus:
Seeing is a creative process that involves our eyes and mind to transform what we see into what we know, but sometimes the process is reversed—we rely on what we know to interpret what we are seeing. To draw what we see can, therefore, be a process of the interaction of seeing and understanding. The goal of this course will focus on this seeing, thinking, and drawing interaction while drawing architecture on location. This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.

1. Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 
2. Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 
3. Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

name: 設計思考
syllabus:
Design thinking is a powerful approach to new product development that begins with understanding unmet customer needs. It’s a human-centered design process that approaches problem-solving with understanding the user needs. Design thinking encompasses concept development, applied creativity, prototyping, and experimentation. When design thinking approaches are applied to business, the success rate for innovation has been seen to improve substantially.

Design-driven companies such as Apple, Coca-Cola, IBM, Nike, Procter & Gamble, and Whirlpool have outperformed the S&P 500 over the past 10 years by an accumulated 211% in what's called the Design Value Index—a portfolio of 16 publicly traded companies that integrate design thinking into corporate strategy. According to a 2016 report from the Design Management Institute, this marks the third consecutive year the index has shown an excess of 200% over the S&P 500.

The Design Thinking course will lead participants through a step by step, design thinking process. To be considered successful, innovations have to solve the three key dimensions of Desirability, Feasibility, and Viability.

Desirability: Is this product or service addressing a real customer need?
Feasibility: Can we develop a solution that is technically feasible and better than competitors?
Viability: Is there a viable business model around this product or service?

This course will use Problem-based Learning (PBL) method to teach the five kernel steps of design thinking including the following: Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, and Test. It will also help students in knowing the interdisciplinary innovation methods of interaction design by case studies and real case operation. The main course goals include the following: gain an understanding of the methods and steps of interaction design; explore the methods and operation models for the interdisciplinary innovation of interaction design; and gain the experiences of interaction design by real cases analysis and operation.

本課程將以問題導向學習(Problem-based Learning)的模式，學習設計思考的五個核心步驟：同理心分析、問題定義、創意發想、雛型發展、驗證評估。並透過實際案例的分析與操作，學習互動設計跨領域創新的方法。本課程的主要目標在於提供學生：1. 了解互動設計的方法與步驟；2. 探討互動設計跨領域創新的方法與操作模式；3. 透過實務案例的操作累積互動設計的執行經驗。

name: 智慧城市互動
syllabus: The main theme of the course is theories, methods, technologies, and case studies for the development of future smart interactive cities where humans and proactive, reactive, autonomous, and social platforms communicate and cooperate to reach goals. The student will acquire knowledge about main research themes and experimental practices in the field of smart interactive cities as well as develop her/his skills in constructing smart interactive cities. Different paradigms will be introduced and discussed, primarily from an interaction and design perspective such as ubiquitous computing, ambient intelligence, augmented and virtual reality, intelligent and adaptive user interfaces, tangible interfaces, persuasive technology, decision-support systems, Internet of Things, smart homes, social norms, and spatial awareness. Different societal challenges will also be addressed through cross-disciplinary collaboration in student projects. The course is divided into theoretical parts and practical parts. Course topic response reports, a midterm project proposal report, and a 4000 words final project report should be submitted in this course.

Unit Six: Human-Centered City with Human Behavior Observation.

Unit Nine: City Intelligence for planning, management, and decision making.
grading:
1. Attend all class sessions. (10%)
2. Actively engage in class discussions.
3. Submit a written assignment: During the semester, you are responsible for writing four 500-750 word reflection that responds to the course section topics and 
presentation. You must include an analysis of the topic (not simply summarizing the talk), including questions you may have or future areas of research that you would like to be involved with. (30%)
4. Design and complete an independent research project throughout the semester, such as providing a detailed case study of a smart city; conducting informational interviews with a smart city practitioner or researcher; or producing a literature review exploring aspects of the smart city. Prepare a midterm paper describing your research topic and proposal. (20%)
5. Write a 4,000-word paper (in Chinese or English,15 pages, double-spaced) and give a brief presentation about your research project to the class. (40%)

name: 專題設計(M)
syllabus:
本課程旨在以專題設計方式，訓練學生確認並建立需求、發展設計選擇方案、製作設計的互動形式、設計評估的專業知能，並以設計專案方式演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組合作或獨自創作完成一媒體設計主題。上學期課程以題目釐定、資料蒐集、分析調查、設計定義、構想發展、程式設計、雛型製作等活動為教學內容；下學期則進行觀察測試、使用性評估、程式調校、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容，以培養學生具備互動設計專題製作之專業知能。
Through project design, the course prepares students to confirm the needs of design, develop alternatives of media design projects, create interactive modes, and evaluate design performance through independent study or cooperative learning. In the first semester, learning materials of the course include subject clarification, data collection, analysis and investigation, design definition, concept development, programming, and prototyping. In the second semester, learning materials of the course include observation and testing, usability evaluation, programming debug, report editing, exhibition and design report submission. Accordingly, students will be ready for professional competencies of interaction design projects.

name: 專題設計(V)
syllabus:
本課程旨在以專題設計方式，訓練學生確認並建立需求、發展設計選擇方案、製作設計的互動形式、設計評估的專業知能，並以設計專案方式演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組合作或獨自創作完成一媒體設計主題。上學期課程以題目釐定、資料蒐集、分析調查、設計定義、構想發展、程式設計、雛型製作等活動為教學內容；下學期則進行觀察測試、使用性評估、程式調校、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容，以培養學生具備互動設計專題製作之專業知能。
Through project design, the course prepares students to confirm the needs of design, develop alternatives of media design projects, create interactive modes, and evaluate design performance through independent study or cooperative learning. In the first semester, learning materials of the course include subject clarification, data collection, analysis and investigation, design definition, concept development, programming, and prototyping. In the second semester, learning materials of the course include observation and testing, usability evaluation, programming debug, report editing, exhibition and design report submission. Accordingly, students will be ready for professional competencies of interaction design projects.

name: 互動科技與數位學習
syllabus:
本課程旨在培養學生了解數位媒體的基本概念、演變歷史、發展趨勢，並掌握現代媒體技術的重要性。本課程將使學生了解和學習生成人工智慧技術的工作原理。 學生將進一步了解人工智慧的定義、特徵和發展趨勢，探索人工智慧在不同領域的創意應用，並進行實踐。

This course aims to train students to understand the basic concepts, evolution history, and development trends of digital media and to master the importance of modern media technology. This course will enable students to understand and learn how generative artificial intelligence technologies work. Students will further understand the definition, characteristics, and development trends of artificial intelligence, explore the creative applications of artificial intelligence in different fields, and practice it.

• Explore image-generating AI technology and practice its application in artistic creation
• Students start to do assignments related to implementing AI technology for generating images.

Week 8: Music Generation and Music Composition
• Learn music generation techniques and explore their applications in music creation
• Carry out music generative AI implementation work

Week 9: Generative AI and Smart Buildings
• Research the application of generative AI in the field of smart buildings&l
