name: 英語授課與學科教學
syllabus:
本課程將針對英語授課 (English as a medium of instruction, EMI)及學科與語言整合教學 (Content and Language Integrated Learning , CLIL)兩大領域範疇進行深入探究，本課程將探討不同主題包含：EMI/CLIL不同的理論架構、EMI/CLIL於不同學科上之應用、以及EMI/CLIL於不同教育階段的應用等主題，並透過課堂討論、小組活動、個案研究以及專題提案討論，提升學生對相關主題的知識建構與教學能力，建立其對EMI/CLIL主題於文獻探討之掌握及相關研究方法，並期將所學之知能應用在課堂教學中。
This course in an introductory course for English as a Medium of Instruction (EMI) and Content and Language Integrated Learning (CLIL). This course aims to cultivate students’ knowledge about EMI and CLIL and their applications in different disciplines across different educational levels. The elements of teaching subject areas in English will be discussed in class to equip students with the basic concepts and techniques for EMI and CLIL. Through various class activities such as lectures, discussions, case studies, group work, and larger projects, students will explore not only the theorical foundations for EMI and CLIL but also classroom pedagogy and methodological approaches related to EMI and CLIL. The promises and challenges of EMI and CLIL and emerging issues will also be discussed in this course.

name: 英文傳奇故事：電影動漫及遊戲
syllabus: In literary studies, when we encounter the term "legend", it is often understood as stories that center on human protagonists rather than supernatural beings - as differentiated from "myth" - such as the stories of King Arthur and his knights, the search for the Holy Grail, and the dragon-slaying in medieval literature. This course, however, will not be limited by the scope of the Middle Age and will extend the definition of "legend" by examining the prominent archetypes in Western literature. The course will explore how these archetypes not only form the basis of classic literature, but also pervade and enrich our popular culture including films, operas, anime, and video games.

name: 民事訴訟法
syllabus:
不論是一般之契約或車禍事件，或者是跨國之高科技侵權案件，我們生活中之大小事均與民事訴訟程序息息相關，無論是否從事法律業，皆有學習民事訴訟法之必要，以維護自己的權益。本課程即旨在以淺顯易懂之方式，介紹民事訴訟法之基礎理論及規範，並輔以案例來加以說明，俾使修課同學能對於民事訴訟建立基本之了解，並進而能作初步之實務應用。
本課程除了民事訴訟法的規定本身外，也會教授相關的民法規定，故即使無民法基礎的同學亦歡迎修課。

name: 智慧財產權案例講座
syllabus:
本課程旨在透過案例研析介紹智慧財產權之理論與實務問題，授課內容將以貼近生活和商業活動的「商標法」為主軸，並針對相應主題補充著作權、專利權及營業秘密等智慧財產法律知識，進行個案報告及分析，並於學期中邀請學界或實務界專家學者，以專題講座方式講授實務案例，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。

This course aims to introduce the theory and practical issues of intellectual property rights through case studies. The course will primarily focus on "Trademark Law," which is closely related to everyday life and business activities. Additionally, it will supplement the knowledge of intellectual property laws, such as copyright, patent rights, and trade secrets, on relevant topics. Throughout the semester, several experts and scholars from academia or the industry will be invited to give special lectures on practical cases, aiming to achieve a complementary effect between theory and practice.

name: 科技法律
syllabus: 近年由於j科技發展，衍生許多議題，例如網路資訊、基因科技、能源科技等，莫不對現行法律制度提出挑戰。主要原因在法律無法預先為未來科技所生問題先為提出規範標準，造成法律只得事後防補。因此，本課程擬分別探討科技發展對現行社會產生的影響，期望學生能對科技發展所生問題有所認識，能依既有法律找出適用可能，並展望未來法律的訂訂方向。將於每週指定討論主題與閱讀內容，修課同學需於上課前閱讀，並於課堂中參與討論。

name: 商標法案例研究
syllabus:
商標法係為保障商標權及消費者利益，維護市場公平競爭，促進工商企業正常發展所制定之法律。商標得以文字、圖形、記號、顏色、聲音、 立體形狀或其聯合式所組成，並應足以使商品或服務之相關消費者認識其為表彰商品或服務之標識，藉以與他人之商品或服務相區別。凡因表 彰自己之商品或服務，欲取得商標權者，應依該法申請註冊。本課程將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於商標法的瞭解。事實上，本課程之進行，30%以英文講授、70%以中文講授，而且課堂教材以中文為主。
Trademark Act is formulated to safeguard trademark rights and consumers' interest, maintain fair competitions of markets, and facilitate normal development of industries and commerce. A trademark may be composed of a word, design, symbol, color, sound, three-dimensional shape or a combination thereof. A trademark as defined above shall be distinctive enough for relevant consumers of the goods or services to recognize it as identification to those goods or services and to differentiate such goods or services from those offered by others. A person who wishes to obtain trademark rights in order to distinguish its goods or services shall apply for trademark registration as provided under this Act. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples to enhance a deeper understanding of Trademark Act for the students. In fact, the class lectures will be in English 30% and in Chinese 70%, and the class materials are in Chinese.

name: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
syllabus: 本課程從中美貿易戰美方指控中國竊取營業秘密及強制技術移轉談起，再以我國營業秘密法與公平交易法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；除重視營業秘密法與公平交易法之基礎內涵外，將以國際比較法的視野，論述二法律與智權行使密切相關的課題，並輔以專題探討或案例分析的方式進行之。
progress:
第1週：介紹授課理念、課程綱要、上課方式與評分標準，並依多數同學需求進行調整---從中美貿易戰至台積電赴美、日設廠談營業秘密保護與強制技術授權及合作技術移轉
第2週：營業秘密法與公平交易法的立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢。
第3週：營業秘密法的法理基礎。
第4週：營業秘密的標的、歸屬與應用。
第5週：營業秘密的侵害、保全程序、救濟與保護（台積電海外投資合作案之營秘保護、區塊鏈與營秘保護等）。
第6週：營業秘密與競業禁止（台積電跳巢案、美光科技挖角案）。
第7週：侵害營業秘密之刑事處罰（穩懋半導體公司營秘遭竊案、英業達公司營秘案、美光控訴聯電及中國晉華竊取半導體DRAM營秘案）。
第8週：侵害營業秘密之損害賠償（先進光賠償大立光15.22億元案）。
第9週：侵害營業秘密案件的審理與秘密保持命令。
第10週：公平交易法與智慧財產權法規範的對象、方法及競合。
第11週：公平交易法對獨占、結合及聯合行為之規範。
第12週：公平交易法對不公平競爭行為之規範。
第13週：違反公平交易法之民事、刑事及行政責任。
第14週：公平交易法與專利(授)權之行使（警告函、高通案）。
第15週：公平交易法與專利(授)權之行使（標準必要專利(SEP)、公平及合理非歧視條款(FRAND)）。
第16週：公平交易法與商標權之行使（攀附著名商標、仿冒商標〈表徵〉）。 
第17週：公平交易法與著作權之行使（電視節目版式、AI創作及AI+大數據）。 
第18週：兩岸及國際公平交易法與營業秘密之保護。


※ 實際授課內容將依同學之興趣、程度，擇要或增修主題後進行之。

※ 本課程重視問題意識之引導及積極參與式的學習，2/3以上的主題將以案例探討或業師協同教學方式授課。
grading:

name: 網路法律專題研究
syllabus: 網際網路興起，牽涉到許多的法律爭議與問題，主要原因係網際網路的發展變化很快，且多元化。而這些法律問題，有些雖有既有法律解決，但多半存有爭議，且相當高比例的議題仍在演化，故有需對這些議題先為瞭解，以找出合適業策。本課程除將說明一般常見的網路問題外，也將對新興議題提出說明，期使同學對這相關問題，能夠瞭解、分析，最終能具有探討與解決的能力

name: 國際智財法
syllabus:
本課程最主要之目的，乃是讓修課之學生瞭解國際智財權重要的組織與條約文件，藉由課程之教授，使得學生能夠確實掌握這些基本之概念與議題。透過本課程之教授不僅使學生瞭解國際智財法之最新發展趨勢外，更從國際智財法與我國智財法之比較及鑑鏡，來瞭解未來現行法所需修改之方向。其實，本課程之進行，30%以英文講授、70%以中文講授，而且課堂教材以中文為主。
Main proposes of this course are to let enrolled students understand international intellectual property organizations and treaties and make them understand these basic concepts and issues. Students will know new trends of international intellectual property law through teaching of this course and understand amendments of future Taiwan intellectual property legislation compared with international intellectual property laws and Taiwan intellectual property laws. In fact, the class lectures will be in English 30% and in Chinese 70%, and the class materials are in Chinese.

name: 智慧財產權經濟分析
syllabus:
本課程將介紹經濟分析的理論與研究方法，除了探討近年來為何經濟分析的研究方法如此受到重視外，還會討論到該如何從經濟之角度，來分析各類型之智慧財產權。而課程之內容則從基礎之經濟學理論開始談起，更以經濟分析之研究方法，來具體檢視各領域之智慧財產權，包括：著作權、專利權、商標權、營業秘密，藉以達到理論與實際並重之教學目的。事實上，本課程之進行，30%以英文講授、70%以中文講授，而且課堂教材以中文為主。
This course will introduce theories of economic analyses and research methods. Not only does this course introduce why economic analyses are important in recent years, but also does how economic analyze all types of intellectual property rights. Contents of this course are started to discuss basic economic theories and research methods of economic analyses to further examine all fields of intellectual property rights, including copyright, patent, trademark, and trade secrets. Thus, these will achieve teaching purposes for balancing theories and practices. Students who do not have economic backgrounds are welcome to enroll this class. In fact, the class lectures will be in English 30% and in Chinese 70%, and the class materials are in Chinese.

name: 創新創業智財法律專題研究
syllabus:
本課程呼應技職再造的創新創業趨勢，以具體個案討論為中心，讓同學有機會運用所學、解決實際的法律問題。適合對如何透過智財法律推動知識經濟、創新創業有興趣的同學。同學可以透過本課程，進一步了解創新創業現實中可能面臨的問題、並練習提供解決策略。
This course will focus on the intellectual property legal issues regarding innovation and entrepreneurship by drawing real cases for analysis and discussion. Students will have opportunities to further understand the legal practice in IP area by taking part in solving real cases with the help of the course tutor. It is recommended for those who are equipped with a general understanding of IP laws or are strongly interested in this subject.

syllabus: 本課程主要著重台灣專利申請的程序。相關的主題包括發明人身份、專利權人（專利申請權人）身份、優先權、申請格式、審查意見的答覆寫作、修正、更正等等。其中並給予學生對專利申請書與說明書撰寫的的實際演練，並說明如何使用電子申請來完成專利申請。期許學生於完成此課業後，能了解相關申請程序，並能獨力完成相關專利申請說與說明書的文件準備。

name: 創新、競爭與公平交易法
syllabus:
公平交易法是經濟憲法，也是維持市場交易秩序的根本大法。當現代企業與市場的結構愈趨複雜，公平交易法的角色也愈顯重要。本課程將以案例分析，帶領學生了解公平交易法的基本原則。最後，本課程將規劃呈現不正競爭部分及科技發展下的新興議題。
The Fair Trade Act is often considered as the economic constitution also a set of fundamental rules to maintain the order of market. This Act is getting more and more important in the modern economy while the market is getting more and more chaotic and complicated due to the technology advancement. This course is designed for students who intend to understand the principles of the Fair Trade Act both in books and in action, and who are interested to learn about the interplay of innovation and competition with particular emphasis on technology industries and digital economy.

name: 商標法案例研究
syllabus:
商標法係為保障商標權及消費者利益，維護市場公平競爭，促進工商企業正常發展所制定之法律。商標得以文字、圖形、記號、顏色、聲音、 立體形狀或其聯合式所組成，並應足以使商品或服務之相關消費者認識其為表彰商品或服務之標識，藉以與他人之商品或服務相區別。凡因表 彰自己之商品或服務，欲取得商標權者，應依該法申請註冊。本課程將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於商標法的瞭解。事實上，本課程之進行，30%以英文講授、70%以中文講授，而且課堂教材以中文為主。
Trademark Act is formulated to safeguard trademark rights and consumers' interest, maintain fair competitions of markets, and facilitate normal development of industries and commerce. A trademark may be composed of a word, design, symbol, color, sound, three-dimensional shape or a combination thereof. A trademark as defined above shall be distinctive enough for relevant consumers of the goods or services to recognize it as identification to those goods or services and to differentiate such goods or services from those offered by others. A person who wishes to obtain trademark rights in order to distinguish its goods or services shall apply for trademark registration as provided under this Act. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples to enhance a deeper understanding of Trademark Act for the students. In fact, the class lectures will be in English 30% and in Chinese 70%, and the class materials are in Chinese.

name: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
syllabus: 本課程從中美貿易戰美方指控中國竊取營業秘密及強制技術移轉談起，再以我國營業秘密法與公平交易法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；除重視營業秘密法與公平交易法之基礎內涵外，將以國際比較法的視野，論述二法律與智權行使密切相關的課題，並輔以專題探討或案例分析的方式進行之。
progress:
第1週：介紹授課理念、課程綱要、上課方式與評分標準，並依多數同學需求進行調整---從中美貿易戰至台積電赴美、日設廠談營業秘密保護與強制技術授權及合作技術移轉
第2週：營業秘密法與公平交易法的立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢。
第3週：營業秘密法的法理基礎。
第4週：營業秘密的標的、歸屬與應用。
第5週：營業秘密的侵害、保全程序、救濟與保護（台積電海外投資合作案之營秘保護、區塊鏈與營秘保護等）。
第6週：營業秘密與競業禁止（台積電跳巢案、美光科技挖角案）。
第7週：侵害營業秘密之刑事處罰（穩懋半導體公司營秘遭竊案、英業達公司營秘案、美光控訴聯電及中國晉華竊取半導體DRAM營秘案）。
第8週：侵害營業秘密之損害賠償（先進光賠償大立光15.22億元案）。
第9週：侵害營業秘密案件的審理與秘密保持命令。
第10週：公平交易法與智慧財產權法規範的對象、方法及競合。
第11週：公平交易法對獨占、結合及聯合行為之規範。
第12週：公平交易法對不公平競爭行為之規範。
第13週：違反公平交易法之民事、刑事及行政責任。
第14週：公平交易法與專利(授)權之行使（警告函、高通案）。
第15週：公平交易法與專利(授)權之行使（標準必要專利(SEP)、公平及合理非歧視條款(FRAND)）。
第16週：公平交易法與商標權之行使（攀附著名商標、仿冒商標〈表徵〉）。 
第17週：公平交易法與著作權之行使（電視節目版式、AI創作及AI+大數據）。 
第18週：兩岸及國際公平交易法與營業秘密之保護。

name: 智慧財產權經濟分析
syllabus:
本課程將介紹經濟分析的理論與研究方法，除了探討近年來為何經濟分析的研究方法如此受到重視外，還會討論到該如何從經濟之角度，來分析各類型之智慧財產權。而課程之內容則從基礎之經濟學理論開始談起，更以經濟分析之研究方法，來具體檢視各領域之智慧財產權，包括：著作權、專利權、商標權、營業秘密，藉以達到理論與實際並重之教學目的。事實上，本課程之進行，30%以英文講授、70%以中文講授，而且課堂教材以中文為主。
This course will introduce theories of economic analyses and research methods. Not only does this course introduce why economic analyses are important in recent years, but also does how economic analyze all types of intellectual property rights. Contents of this course are started to discuss basic economic theories and research methods of economic analyses to further examine all fields of intellectual property rights, including copyright, patent, trademark, and trade secrets. Thus, these will achieve teaching purposes for balancing theories and practices. Students who do not have economic backgrounds are welcome to enroll this class. In fact, the class lectures will be in English 30% and in Chinese 70%, and the class materials are in Chinese.

name: 科技法律
syllabus: 近年由於j科技發展，衍生許多議題，例如網路資訊、基因科技、能源科技等，莫不對現行法律制度提出挑戰。主要原因在法律無法預先為未來科技所生問題先為提出規範標準，造成法律只得事後防補。因此，本課程擬分別探討科技發展對現行社會產生的影響，期望學生能對科技發展所生問題有所認識，能依既有法律找出適用可能，並展望未來法律的訂訂方向。將於每週指定討論主題與閱讀內容，修課同學需於上課前閱讀，並於課堂中參與討論。

name: 兒童文學研究
syllabus:
本課程將帶領同學從兒童詩、繪本、小說、電影來品味兒童文學的真、善與美，藉此喚醒被世俗蒙塵的沉睡心靈，以重返純真的赤子心境。 教學方式以互動為主，期待藉由討論兒童文學名著，閱讀相關論文，來帶領同學進入兒童文學的殿堂。 除了閱讀與討論之外，還會教導同學創作；創作的內容含括了兒童詩及手工繪本製作。希望透過作品的完成，來喚起學生的創作興趣，並建立學生創作的信心。
This course will lead the students to read the poems, picture books, novels and films of children literature, and hope to find out the beauty of the children's world. Wish in this way can help the sleeping soul to wake up, and return to pure childhood state. This course will try to lead the classmates to appreciate the children's literature by discussing and questioning the masterpieces, hope in this happy way to help the students to get enter the children's literature. Besides reading and discussing, the course will also teach students how to write. The content of writing course would include the poem and the story which would ask the students to finish the work by themselves. Hope through the works, can arouse students' creation interest, and build up students' confidence of creation.

name: 哲學史（二）
syllabus:
本課程始自ㄧ系列關於「現代哲學」的演講，特別著重於那個階段的幾個主要的思想家，如笛卡兒、史賓諾莎、洛克、休姆，與柏克萊。藉此讓我們得以瞭解理性主義、經驗主義，與唯心論。接下來，我們會探討：企圖整合理性主義和經驗主義的康德批判哲學、馬克思的歷史唯物主義、達爾文的進化論、佛洛伊德的心理分析，與當代的ㄧ些重要理論，如存在主義、海德格、邏輯實證論，與分析哲學。
The course starts with a series of lectures on the history of modern philosophy with an emphasis of some major thinkers during that period of time such as Descartes, Spinoza, Locke, Hume, and Berkeley.  By doing so, we would learn outstanding thoughts concerning Rationalism, Empiricism, and Idealism.  We then shall move onto Kant with a particular look at his attempt of combining Rationalism and Empiricism into his Critical Philosophy.  Afterwards, we will study Historical Materialism and the theory of Evolution provided by Marx, and Darwin, respectively, followed by a look at Freud’s psychoanalysis and some other major accounts in our time such as Existentialism, Heidegger, logical positivism and analytical philosophy.

name: 展演藝術與表達
syllabus: 「展演藝術與表達」是一門符合現代精神與消費文化的課程，將過去展示消費與文化演出的精神融合成為新的趨勢。隨著時代的變遷，從過去以展示品及表演者為主的角色轉變為與消費者大眾的互動精神為主的概念。表演活動範圍也由純粹的表演活動，擴及商品消費空間及觀眾互動；而展示也由靜態之展覽，擴及表演空間與活動的加入，以有利於開擴展示品之魅力。因此將包含設計與藝術的整合、動態與靜態的表現、環境空間與人類行為的結合、參觀行為與學習行為的互動、消費娛樂與文化教育的交流等，表達多元展演精神與「整體藝術」的跨域表現。課程內容包括：展演藝術的定義、特質、起源與類別範圍等基本原理分析，並探討相關案例分析，最後透過實際創作方式進行演練，達成展演藝術與表達的課程目標。

name: 文化資產與行政法規
syllabus: 本課程旨在引導學生認識文化資產的相關議題，包含基本概念、類別、保存維護、再利用情形，深入了解文化資產的意義與價值，以及管理運用的重要性。介紹國內文化資產保存維護情形、管理組織、政策制定、重要法規及所衍伸出的相關問題等。另搭配實地參訪，探討不同類型文化資產管理實例，幫助學生習得文化資產管理實務知能及相應行政法規。

name: 文創產業與品牌、行銷、通路
syllabus:
本課程以文化事業 (cultural vocation) 的發展為目標，品牌價值的最大化為核心，藉由目標客群的設定與品牌行銷策略的擬定與執行，鏈結通路夥伴，建構通路生態系統之團隊合作，建構良善通路的競爭優勢，經營新創品牌的價值，進而創造與形塑文創產業中的優勢品牌與品牌資產。
本課程立基國立臺北科大經典的黑手工程師訓練模式，強調動手式的 OJT (On Job Training)，鏈結產業進行場域實作。課堂上會有大量的實務型動手演練實作，課後會有一定數量的 Homework與 Exercise，透過此體驗學習的訓練課程，期使學生具備微型企業（如：工作室）的基本商業維運知識與能力。

name: 陶瓷彩繪
syllabus:
課程著重在陶瓷彩繪人才培力的學習規畫，以彩繪陶瓷之工藝表現為探究主題，梳理獨特歷史背景與陶瓷發展系統下，所衍生出不同的陶瓷繪製工序工法、內容型態及審美路徑， 經由專業理論及實踐課程，培育新世代工藝傳承人才。
The course focuses on learning and planning for cultivating ceramic painting talents. It takes the technical performance of painted ceramics as the theme of inquiry and sorts out the unique historical background and ceramic development system, which have resulted in different ceramic painting process methods, content types and aesthetic paths. Through professional theoretical and practical courses, this course will cultivate a new generation of crafts inheritance talents.

name: 社會變遷與發展
syllabus: 此門課程將從認識社會結構著手，進而去探討社會結構變遷與發展的意涵。課程涵蓋的範圍兼顧理論與實務，除了讓學生學習去思考當今社會現象產生的結構性因素，並在在日常生活中有更深刻的社會學洞察力與社會關懷的視野。本課程將以講授與集體討論為主要學習方式，並輔以影像作品來解析該週主題相關的社會學概念、現象與案例。

name: 動態影像新研究法
syllabus: This course will provide an introduction to the history and theory of moving images with a focus on the spectatorship. Moving images have a variety of art forms, such as film, video, streaming media and the other different kinds of audiovisual installations. This course attempts to begin with historical film contexts. Furthermore, the discussion moves to the changing paradigms of moving images, and ends with considering the digital media as a new art form which shifts the moving images from movie theater to the diverse exhibiting, such as museum, gallery and online sites. A variety of cinematic contexts from essays to the selected experimental moving images will be screened and discussed.

name: 文創與科技自造
syllabus:
探索文化如何與科技相互融合，以議題運用及人才培力的觀點培養學生思考、創意、創新及創業思維。本次課程將運用聯合國永續發展指標SDGs作為議題核心，引導學生認識國際趨勢，並能運用設計思考及打造原型工具，對應挖掘生活周邊議題，與同班同學或跨校同學合作組隊，針對自己選定之議題提出務實解方，並參與2024年技職盃黑客松競賽或其他校內外比賽。並透過實際提案及動手做，激發學生將永續發展指標之觀念融入文創領域的創業實踐。

This course explore how culture interact with technology, the course combining creativity and making as key element. The course will use United Nation’s SDGs and selected case studies as framework to inspire student’s mindset on entrepreneurship, t culture, technology and creativity.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-社會與法治
研究方法
syllabus:
本課程主要以人文學的研究方法為主，使修課者對人文學科之研究方法有基本的認識，熟悉資料蒐集、分析與詮釋的方式，以及培養研究的能力，並應用所學，在課程期間完成一份研究報告。以歷史學門為例，其課程內容包括學科的定義、史料的蒐集與辨別能力，歷史的詮釋，及歷史研究的侷限性等等問題。
This course is primarily based on the research methods of humanities. Students who select this course will have a basic understanding of the research methods of humanities. Besides, they will be familiar with the mode of data collection, analysis and interpretation, moreover, their capacity of doing research will be trained up. They have to finish a research report by applying what they have learned during this course. Take the history as an example, this course includes the definition of the subject, the interpretation of the history, and the limits of historical research. Besides, students will also learn how to collect and identify historical data in the course.
progress:
本課程旨在說明人文學科的研究方法，建立學生研究的基本認識，課程涵蓋：建立問題意識、資料蒐集、資料庫使用、研究架構等，同學將了解研究方法不只是用於撰寫學術論文，同時也是建立策展論述的方法，期待本課程訓練將培養同學開展議題的能力。

name: 文化史
syllabus:
文化史課程以台灣各地的文化變遷為主。本課程授課內容，是透過物質生活(衣、食、住、行)，集體生活(社會、政治組織)，精神生活(文學、藝術、哲學、宗教信仰)等之介紹，讓學生對台灣文化有更進一步的認識與了解。

The course of History and Culture mainly focuses on the evolution in terms of culture that takes place in every part of Taiwan. The contents of this course including the introduction of material life (clothing, food, housing and transportation), collective life (society, politics, and organization), and spiritual life (literature, art, philosophy and religious belief). Students will obtain further cognition and acquaintance about Taiwanese culture. The teaching mode is by giving students a lecture orally, and students have to discuss and hand in written reports. The teaching style is more vivacious.

name: 文化科技
syllabus:
本課程旨在探究文化與科技的關係，以及科技社會結構如何影響我們的思考。在科技與社會快速變化的過程中，課程將帶領學生發掘科技創新的可能性，這也促使許多文化實踐需重新思考，以適應此刻以媒體驅動的社會，以及如何將它們被應用於策展、文化活動和相關的創作中。本課程亦涉及科技本質上的探索，以了解它如何與文化變革密切相關，包括人文、社會科學、虛擬創作、人工智慧、數位典藏、媒體藝術和媒體傳播等面向上。
The course examines the relationship between culture and technology and how tech-social structure works to shape our ideas. Exploring the possibilities of technological innovation in rapid change, many cultural practices need to be rethought and reworked for a further media-driven society and how they are adopted into curating exhibitions, cultural events, and related productions. The course also addresses the nature of technology in general to understand how it is linked closely with cultural change, in terms of humanities, social sciences, virtual contents, artificial intelligence, digital archives, media art, and media communication.

name: 邏輯思考
syllabus:
學習邏輯思考的目的在於幫助我們培養一種邏輯能力，使我們能夠邏輯理性地以語言進行思考。要達成上述目的，我們首先要了解語言做為一種符號的內在邏輯架構。我們要明白什麼是概念、與概念所指涉的對象、與概念具備的意義和觀念；然後，語句的性質，包含其真假值，它們與字詞和概念的關係。之後，如何用語句去建構論證。為了建構論證，我們要學習傳統的歸納法、三段論法、自然演繹法的基本推論規則與自然語言和形式語言之間的翻譯。總之，我們要會在生活中如何理性地思辨問題並有效地與他人溝通。課程講授將配合一些心理測驗、課堂遊戲與電影教學。
The purpose of learning “Logical Thinking” is to help us acquiring a kind of ability in virtue of which we will be able to think logically and rationally.  To achieve that goal, we need to know the innate logical structure of our language.  That means, we will need first to grasp the essence of concepts including their reference, meaning, and ideas. Then, we shall study the essence of sentences including their truth-value and the relations with words and concepts.  After that, we shall learn how to establish a sound argument. For that purpose, we plan to study induction, syllogism, basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in quantificational logic, and translation between natural and formal language.  In a word, we will be able to speculate problems in our life rationally and communicate with others effectively.   The lecturing of the course will mix with psychological texts, games and practices in the classroom, and scientific films or regular movies.

name: 插畫表現技法
syllabus:
課程主要為探討插畫意涵與設計相關表現形式。透過對物象的觀察，開發創作與設計的資源。練習插畫技法（色鉛筆，水彩，壓克力，拼貼，與軟體組合），並結合現代設計理念，發展創新的文創設計風格。熟悉媒材的表現方式與技巧，並能實驗於文創設計中。
This course mainly explores the illustrator implications associated with the design manifestations. Through observe the images, the learner can develop the creative and design resources. The learner can exercise the illustration techniques (color pencil, watercolor, acrylic, collage, and software combination); combine with modern design, the development of innovative cultural and creative design. At last, the learner will be familiar to the illustrator expressions and skills in order to develop a new experiment in cultural and creative design.

name: 心靈的理論與實踐
syllabus:
「心靈的理論與實踐」(The Theory and Practice of the Mind)旨在對人的心理各個層面，從不同的角度進行探討。課程將以理論講授與實際操作交替進行:我們將借重當代學術研究成果，如腦神經科學、心理學、哲學、神經生物學、社會學等等，以增進我們對人自身重要議題的認識。這些議題至少包括:心靈(Mind)、心流(Mental Flow)、情緒(Emotion)、選擇(Choice)、決定(Decision)、感官(Sensations)、直覺(Intuition)、自我分析( Self-Analysis)、單純性(Simplicity)、潛意識(Subconscious)、創新(Novelty)、洞察力(Insight)與意志力 (Willpower)等等。若時間允許，我們將在課上播放相關的科學影片與電影。
The course investigates several key aspects of human mind from different angles.  To achieve the goal, we shall discuss current topics and issues on the following subjects: Neuroscience, Psychology, Philosophy, Neurobiology, Sociology, etc.  The lecturing shall proceed from reading texts to practicing subjects and methods.  And the topics and issues will include at least: Mind, Mental flow, Emotion, Choice, Decision, Sensations, Intuition, Self-Analysis, Simplicity, Subconscious, Novelty, Insight, and Willpower, etc.  We may watch some relevant scientific films and movies in the class if time allows.

name: 文化保存與創意實踐
syllabus: This course aims to understand the concept of cultural preservation, and the methods of doing cultural preservation by examining different case studies in the world. Different issues related to cultural preservation are also discussed in this course, include the value and authenticity of cultural heritage, the representation and interpretation of culture, and reuse and management of cultural spaces. A creative practice of cultural preservation will be conducted in this course.

name: 動態影像理論與實踐
syllabus:
本課程是動態影像的進階課程，不以歷史性發展為課程目的，旨在探究各類影像涉及的感官經驗以及所屬的文化意義，包含藝術電影、紀錄片、實驗電影與數位影像等，進而說明以動態經驗為基礎的混合現象，其涉及的美學、文化、技術與當代性。閱讀文本涵蓋電影、媒體與視覺文化評論。
This advanced moving images course aims to exam sensory experiences and cultural significances of various cinematic forms from art cinema, documentaries, and experimental images to the digital turn of VR films and beyond. However, the goal of the course is not to be a historical survey but instead an investigation of this hybrid moment and its relationship to aesthetics, culture, technology, and modernity. Readings cover topics in film theory, media theory, and visual cultural critical theory.

name: 複變函數
syllabus:
複數，可分析函數，基本複數函數，複數積分，數列，餘數與極點，函數之映射，保角映射，複數函數應用。
1.Complex Numbers

2.Complex Functions

3.Harmonic Functions

4.Complex Integration

5.Cauchy Theory of Integration 

6.Complex Power Series

7.Laurent Series,Residues

8.Conformal Mapping
progress:
Week 1 Complex Numbers and Their Geometric Representation & Polar Form of Complex Numbers. Powers and Roots
Week 2 Derivative. Analytic Function & Cauchy–Riemann Equations. Laplace’s Equation
Week 3 Exponential Function & Trigonometric and Hyperbolic Functions. Euler’ s Formula
Week 4 Logarithm. General Power. Principal Value & Line Integral in the Complex Plane
Week 5 Cauchy’ s Integral Theorem & Cauchy’ s Integral Formula
Week 6 Derivatives of Analytic Functions & Sequences, Series, Convergence Tests
Week 7 Power Series & Functions Given by Power Series
Week 8 Taylor and Maclaurin Series & Uniform Convergence. Optional
Week 9 Mid-term
Week 10 Laurent Series & Singularities and Zeros. Infinity
Week 11 Residue Integration Method & Residue Integration of Real Integrals
Week 12 Geometry of Analytic Functions: Conformal Mapping & Linear Fractional Transformations (Möbius Transformations)
Week 13 Special Linear Fractional Transformations & Conformal Mapping by Other Functions
Week 14 Riemann Surfaces. Optional & Electrostatic Fields
Week 15 Use of Conformal Mapping. Modeling & Heat Problems
Week 16 Fluid Flow & Poisson’ s Integral Formula for Potentials
Week 17 General Properties of Harmonic Functions. Uniqueness Theorem for the Dirichlet Problem
Week 18 Final
grading:
1.Homework(40%)  
2.Midterm (30%)
3.Final (30%)
textbook: E. Kreyszig, H. Kreyszig, and E. J. Norminton, Advanced Engineering Mathematics, Tenth. Hoboken, NJ: Wiley, 2011.

name: 數位通訊
syllabus:
數位通訊可謂目前行動通訊的基礎，隨著行動通信的技術演進，從第三代通訊(3G)、第四代通訊(4G)、以至於目前的第五代通訊(5G)，甚至是接下來的6G高速時代，均是以數位訊號調變技術來增加資料傳輸速率，致使行動通信及無線網路使用更為便利。
本課程將涵蓋：
1.	數位訊號基礎理論：信號、頻率、帶寬、信噪比、數位訊號和模擬訊號等
2.	數位信號的傳輸：時域和頻域的數位信號表示法、錯誤檢測和糾正（error detection and correction）
3.	數位通訊系統：標準協定（如：Wi-Fi、Ethernet、3G、4G、5G等）、數位信號處理（digital signal processing）、訊號濾波（signal filtering）、多頻道通訊（multichannel communication）等。

並詳細介紹通訊技術之發展-多種規格之演進與比較，以及OFDM正交分頻多工技術。能使學生了解數位通訊常用的基本原理與觀念、充分瞭解通訊技術及發展。


I. Introduction to Digital Communication
Definition and historical background of digital communication
Types of digital communication (e.g. email, instant messaging, social media)
Advantages and disadvantages of digital communication
II. Digital Communication Technologies
Data transmission techniques (e.g. analog-to-digital conversion, modulation, multiplexing)
Networking technologies (e.g. LAN, WAN, Internet)
Wireless communication technologies (e.g. Wi-Fi, cellular networks)
III. Conclusion and Future Trends
Recap of key concepts and technologies
Discussion of future trends in digital communication (e.g. artificial intelligence, virtual and augmented reality)
Preparing for a career in digital communication.

name: 照明設計
syllabus:
就基本光學及人體工學之視覺基本理論及測試方法，以確立照明之質與量的標準，先就現有燈泡、燈管、燈具作整體性之介紹並就其特性比較，從而建立選擇之標準，不僅要求光的亮度，並且綜合考慮光的品質，燈具的安全性，經濟效益、能源的節約及燈具設計，針對亮度的計算，介紹三種不同的計算方法，以供設計使用，綜合前述之重點，就商業、工業、戶外及特性照明等設計，逐一以實例說明，並兼述燈具之控制線路及有關法令。
Course Title:Design of Lighting
Description:This course is designed for one-semester program in the
lighting. The main purpose of this course is to introduce the
softwares and hardwares of lighting. (including lighting equipements.
lighting design, transmission system. and distribution system) and how
to maintain these equipments.

name: 控制系統
syllabus:
Feedback control is an interdisciplinary field in that control is applied to systems in every conceivable area of engineering.  Consequently, control is an active field of research and hence there is a steady influx of new concepts, ideas, and techniques.  Some of these elements develop to the point where they join the list of things every control engineer must know.  This is the course where students, especially EE majors, begin to acquire both traditional and modern topics in the field of control systems.  The core material covered in this course is to provide ample motivation, insight, and understanding in classical control.
The goals of the course can be summarized as below:
	Master design as well as analysis techniques.  Find good feedback control design with clear understanding.  Moreover, seeing them used.
	Learn to solve problems by constructing effective algorithms in computer languages like Matlab and Simulink.
The course is presented in a standard format of lectures, readings, and problem sets.  In addition to a midterm and a final examination, there will be a number of homework  quizzes equally spaced over the term, all in-class.  The quiz questions are based on assigned problem sets in the textbook.  All quizzes/examinations will be closed book.  Class participation is evaluated through attendance (7 points) and class interactions (3 points).  Full attendance students get 7 points.  One point deduction per missing lecture.  Each class interaction with correct answer gets 1 point.  Maximum 3 points for class interactions.  The lecture will be based mainly, but not entirely, on material in the textbook.  Students are especially encouraged to read related textbooks in the field of control systems in addition to lecture notes of the course.

Remarks 備註：
	Course lectures are offered in Chinese. 本課程為中文授課，惟教科書、講義、試題皆以英語呈現。
	Textbook should be purchased asap as it is a very good reference for study in robotics. 教科書應儘快購買。
	Course lecture notes can only be downloaded via iStudy website and are protected under the Intellectual Property law.  Lecture notes are NOT freely distributed. 課程講義可於iStudy網站下載，請尊重智慧財產權，不可散布課程相關檔案及文件。
	All announcements will be made via iStudy website. Class group via Line will be established in the first class. 所有課程相關訊息將公告於北科i學園+、並於第一週上課時成立課程Line群組。

name: 電力電子學實習
syllabus: 電力電子技術相關電路之製作與實驗；包含基本的返馳式轉換器、半橋式轉換器、推挽式轉換器以及全橋式轉換器等架構。課程中除了講解電力電子電路之基本原理外，尚說明並進行各轉換器電路之模擬，接著實際製作各轉換器電路以及測量各種所需波形。期望學生在修習本課程中能夠以實做的實際電路驗證所學的理論，於修習完成後能夠具有電力電子乙級技術士之程度，並於未來就業時能夠與實際工作迅速接軌。

name: 影像處理與實習
syllabus:
本課程包含數位影像處理之基礎理論與實務技巧外，對於影像處理於工業上之應用，有一些啟發性之基本認知與接觸。課程內容含蓋：
１. 數位影像處理基礎
２. 傅立葉轉換在影像處理與分析之應用
３. 影像加強之處理
４. 影像回復之處理
５. 影像幾何上之轉換與變形
６. 影像之形態處理運算
７. 影像邊緣偵測
影像圖形切割與檢測

name: 控制系統
syllabus:
數學基礎簡介，轉換函數，訊號流程圖，實際系統數學模式之求得，狀態方程式，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡圖，控制系統之頻域分析，時域及頻域下之控制器設計。
Teaching Topics: Transfer function, time response, equivalent systems, stability, steady-state errors, root locus techniques, frequency response techniques, controller design, and state space approach
progress:

Week 9: Midterm Exam

Week 11-13: Root Locus Techniques & Design (Ch. 8-9)
Week 14-16: Frequency Response Techniques & Design (Ch. 10-11)
Week 17: State Space Approach (Ch. 3, 12)
Week 18: Final Exam
grading: Quizzes: 30%, Midterm: 30%, Final: 30%, Participation: 10%

name: 數位訊號處理
syllabus:
本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解數位訊號處理的理論基礎及其應用技巧。課程內容包含：(1)離散傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉轉換 (2)Z-轉換在信號處理上之應用 (3)相關函數，迴旋積分及其應用 (4)FIR數位濾波器設計 (5)IIR數位濾波器設計 (6)適應性訊號處理介紹 (7)工程應用及實例研討。
This course introduces the basic theory of digital signal processing and its application. The course outline includes: (1) Discrete-time Fourier Transform and Fast Fourier Transform (2) Z-Transform and its application (3) Correlation Fucntion, Convoluation Integral and its application (4) FIR digital filter design (5) IIR Digital Filter Desgin (6) Adaptive Signal Processing (7) Practical Application

name: 電力電子學實習
syllabus: 使學生瞭解電力電子電路的原理，熟悉電子電路應用於大功率之電力設備的控制方法，經由電路模擬及硬體電路實作與課堂之理論相結合，以印證模擬之數據及波形與課程理論及了解電力電子電路架構的應用。實習內容分為五大項目，包括電路模擬： IsSpice電路模擬軟體、功率半導體與整流電路、直流至直流轉換器、直流至交流轉換器等四項與硬體電路實作：DC-DC轉換器實作電路。

name: 工程數學(二)
syllabus:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：
一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換。
二 向量幾何與分析。
三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。
四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
本學期依序介紹傅立葉分析、偏微分方程式以及向量微積分。

name: 深度學習TensorFlow實務
syllabus:
本課程包含深度學習簡介，內容講述深度學習概述、應用領域、深度學習與傳統機器學習的區別。
1.	TensorFlow介紹：TensorFlow簡介、TensorFlow環境搭建、TensorFlow基礎操作。
2.	神經網路模型：多層感知器（Multilayer Perceptron）、卷積神經網路（Convolutional Neural Network, CNN）、循環神經網路（Recurrent Neural Network, RNN）等。
3.	訓練與評估：模型訓練、超參數調整、評估技巧。
4.	深度學習實戰：使用TensorFlow實現數據分類、影像分類、語音識別等深度學習應用實例。
5.	深度學習進階：深度學習進階技巧，包括半監督學習、生成對抗網路（Generative Adversarial Network, GAN）、強化學習等。
I. Introduction to Deep Learning
Definition and history of deep learning
Overview of deep learning applications
Types of neural networks (Feedforward, Convolutional, Recurrent)
II. Neural Network Basics
Neurons and activation functions
Cost functions and optimization algorithms
Overfitting and regularization
III. Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
Convolution operation
Pooling layers
Transfer learning with pre-trained models
Applications of CNNs (image classification, object detection, segmentation)
IV. Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)
Time-series data and sequential modeling
Types of RNNs (Simple RNN, LSTM, GRU)
Applications of RNNs (text classification, language translation, speech recognition)
V. Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs)
Definition and principles of GANs
Generator and discriminator networks
Applications of GANs (image synthesis, style transfer)
VI. TensorFlow
Overview of TensorFlow
Building and training neural networks in TensorFlow
Advanced TensorFlow features (custom layers, GPU acceleration, TensorBoard)
VII. Case Studies and Projects
Hands-on projects using TensorFlow and deep learning
Case studies from various industries (computer vision, natural language processing, recommendation systems)
VIII. Conclusion
Recap of key concepts and deep learning techniques
Discussion of current trends and future directions in deep learning
Preparing for a career in deep learning and AI.

name: 電信工程概要
syllabus:
本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解電信網路之基本概念、各種設備、及技術標準，以作為學生畢業後從事電信相關行業之基礎知識，也可以作為學生繼續修習通訊相關課程之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)電信簡介 (2)數位傳輸技術 (3)數位交換系統 (4) 信號系統 (5) 光纖通訊系統 (6) 行動通訊 (7) ATM (8) VoIP。
This course contains the Introduction of Telecommunication, Digital transmission technology & systems, Digital switching system, Signaling systems, Fiber-optic communication systems, Mobile communication systems, Asynchronous Transfer Mode(ATM), Voice over Internet protocol (VoIP) etc.
progress:
期中考前的授課內容將以有線通訊網路、光纖通訊為主體；期中考後將以網際網路、無線通訊為主體，無線通訊將會涵蓋微波通訊、衛星通訊、無線區域網路(WiFi)、藍牙通訊、電視寬頻網路、 SDTV/HDTV 、4G/5G行動通訊、低軌道衛星行動通訊系統、RFID/NFC、行動支付等內容。

name: 衛星電機系統設計
syllabus:
本課程講解衛星的電機系統，包括指令與資料處理、電力、通訊、飛行軟體及電機介面等，並以國內衛星的實例說明發展程序。建議先修電子學或電子電路相關課程。
This course introduces the satellite electrical systems, including instructions and data processing, power, communications, flight software, and electrical interfaces. This course also uses the example of domestic satellite systems to illustrate the development procedures. It is recommended that students have taken courses related to Electronics or Electronic Circuits.

name: 工程數學(二)
syllabus:
This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today\'s engineers need to know. The course contents are: Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher order ODEs. Laplace transform, series solution, special function, vector analysis, Fourier analysis and partial differential equations.
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：
一 常微分方程式：一階、二階及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，特殊函數
二 級數解
三 向量幾何與分析
四 傅立葉級數
五 偏微分方程式

name: 電子學實習(二)
syllabus:
電子學實習的課程在教授測試跟設計類比電路，在課程中將會介紹基本的儀器使用說明、電子零件之認識、二極體電路（特性）、電晶體電路（特性）、線性電壓調整器及濾波器等應用。課程在規劃搭配原理的介紹及電路的模擬與實務的驗證，以專案式的教學作為學習的導向。
The course of the electronics experiment laboratory teaches testing and designing of analog circuits. The course will introduce basic instrumentation instructions and understanding of electronic parts, including diode circuits (characteristics), transistor circuits (characteristics), linear voltage regulators and filters, and electronics applications. The course introduces the principle of electronics, the simulation of the circuit, and practical verification of circuits with project learning-based teaching methods.

name: 電子學(二)
syllabus:
電子學導論，放大器基本電路與分類，半導體簡介。
運算放大器，反向與非反向組態，基本應用電路。
二極體，非線性電路應用。
金氧半場效電晶體(MOSFET)，雙極性接面電晶體（BJT），物理特性與電流-電壓特性，直流偏壓問題。
MOSFET電晶體，BJT電晶體，基本放大器，小訊號模型，直流偏壓，離散元件基本電路架構。
積體電路放大器的基本架構，電流源與電流鏡，多級放大器，疊接放大器。
差動放大器，MOS差動對，BJT差動對，CMRR問題，使用主動負載的差動放大器。
頻率響應，Bode Plot，各類放大器的低頻響應，各類放大器的高頻響應。
回授，正回授與負回授特性，各類型回授放大器分析。

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。

name: 資料結構
syllabus:
本課程主要針對以下內容進行說明,包含數據結構的基礎概念：陣列（array）、鏈結串列（linked list）、堆疊（stack）、佇列（queue）、樹（tree）、圖（graph）等。並清楚解釋數據結構的運作原理：陣列的插入、刪除、查找、排序等操作；鏈結串列的插入、刪除、查找等操作；堆疊的推入、彈出、查詢等操作；佇列的加入、刪除、查找等操作。講述演算法：排序演算法（如：快速排序、插入排序、選擇排序等）、搜尋演算法（如：二分搜尋、哈希搜尋等）。
表明數據結構應用：數據結構在資料庫、檔案系統、圖形處理等方面的應用。並且搭配實作：實作陣列、鏈結串列、堆疊、佇列、樹、圖等數據結構，並利用C++語言進行演示。

I. Introduction to Data Structures
Definition of data structures
Types of data structures (arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, etc.)
Algorithm analysis and time complexity
II. Arrays and Lists
One-dimensional and multi-dimensional arrays
Dynamic arrays and resizing
Linked lists and their implementation
III. Stacks and Queues
Definition and implementation of stacks
Definition and implementation of queues
Applications of stacks and queues
IV. Trees
Definition and properties of trees
Binary trees and binary search trees
Tree traversal algorithms (in-order, pre-order, post-order)
V. Hash Tables
Definition and implementation of hash tables
Hash functions and collision resolution
Applications of hash tables
VI. Graphs
Definition and representation of graphs
Graph traversal algorithms (DFS, BFS)
Shortest path algorithms (Dijkstra’s, Bellman-Ford)
VII. Sorting Algorithms
Definition and implementation of sorting algorithms (Bubble sort, Insertion sort, Quick sort, Merge sort, etc.)
Comparison of sorting algorithms
VIII. Advanced Data Structures
Heaps and priority queues
Tries
Bloom filters
IX. Conclusion
Recap of key concepts and data structures
Discussion of real-world applications of data structures
Preparing for a career in data structures and algorithms.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
微積分及演練
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。

name: 物理
syllabus: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skills by giving explanations of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life. Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
微積分及演練
syllabus:
本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

name: 物理
syllabus:
本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.
progress: 1.平衡，2.簡諧運動，3.簡諧運動，4.波動，5.靜電學，6.電場，7.電位，8.電路簡介，9.期中考，10電容，.11.磁力，12.磁場，13.磁場，14.電磁感應，15.交流電路，16.交流電路，17.電磁波，18.期末考。

name: 物理實驗
syllabus:
本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

name: 數位邏輯設計實習
syllabus: This course aims to study the basis of digital circuit design. The course will begin with  number systems and the Boolean algebra. Then, the binary logic gates and the minimization methods, such as Karnaugh Maps and Quine-McCluskey Method will be introduced. Afterwards, we will study combinational circuits such as Adder/Subtractor, Multiplexers, Decoders, and other Programmable Logic Devices. This will be followed by the sequential circuits: latches and flops. Registers and Counters will then be covered. The course will conclude the basic digital design techniques and various topics, including sequential circuit design techniques, state graphs, and future trends.

name: 資料結構
syllabus:
本課程主要針對以下內容進行說明,包含數據結構的基礎概念：陣列（array）、鏈結串列（linked list）、堆疊（stack）、佇列（queue）、樹（tree）、圖（graph）等。並清楚解釋數據結構的運作原理：陣列的插入、刪除、查找、排序等操作；鏈結串列的插入、刪除、查找等操作；堆疊的推入、彈出、查詢等操作；佇列的加入、刪除、查找等操作。講述演算法：排序演算法（如：快速排序、插入排序、選擇排序等）、搜尋演算法（如：二分搜尋、哈希搜尋等）。
表明數據結構應用：數據結構在資料庫、檔案系統、圖形處理等方面的應用。並且搭配實作：實作陣列、鏈結串列、堆疊、佇列、樹、圖等數據結構，並利用C++語言進行演示。

I. Introduction to Data Structures
Definition of data structures
Types of data structures (arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, etc.)
Algorithm analysis and time complexity
II. Arrays and Lists
One-dimensional and multi-dimensional arrays
Dynamic arrays and resizing
Linked lists and their implementation
III. Stacks and Queues
Definition and implementation of stacks
Definition and implementation of queues
Applications of stacks and queues
IV. Trees
Definition and properties of trees
Binary trees and binary search trees
Tree traversal algorithms (in-order, pre-order, post-order)
V. Hash Tables
Definition and implementation of hash tables
Hash functions and collision resolution
Applications of hash tables
VI. Graphs
Definition and representation of graphs
Graph traversal algorithms (DFS, BFS)
Shortest path algorithms (Dijkstra’s, Bellman-Ford)
VII. Sorting Algorithms
Definition and implementation of sorting algorithms (Bubble sort, Insertion sort, Quick sort, Merge sort, etc.)
Comparison of sorting algorithms
VIII. Advanced Data Structures
Heaps and priority queues
Tries
Bloom filters
IX. Conclusion
Recap of key concepts and data structures
Discussion of real-world applications of data structures
Preparing for a career in data structures and algorithms.

name: 物件導向程式設計
syllabus:
OOPs, this course uses python language to introduce object-oriented programming. It includes the introduction of python, script-writing and sharing. For OOP, the course will include both textbook content and examples. Students will report their OOP project at the end of the semester.

name: 線性代數

本課程主要探討線性代數基本理論，而教學目標在於使學生對矩陣行為能有基本的掌握度。課程綱要如以下:
一、矩陣基本運算
二、向量空間
三、特徵值與特徵向量
四、內積、正交與最小平方法
五、矩陣分解

name: 研究討論-資通工程:通訊和DSP

The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technology in the area of Information and Communications Engineering: Communication and DSP. Renowned researchers and scholars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

name: 資訊理論
syllabus: This course aims to study basic and advanced topics in information theory. The course focuses on the concept of information theory,  including entropy, source coding, channel capacity, rate distortion theory, and differential entropy, ...etc. The calculation of channel capacity and rate distortion will be used as computer projects for real implementation. Advanced topics will further cover Gaussian channel and some coding theory.

name: 深度學習數位影像分析
syllabus:
深度學習數位影像分析，在近代的製造、醫藥、農業、太空探索、運輸和通信系統等應用領域，正迅速發展中。本課程主要介紹深度學習數位影像分析基本理論基礎，以此概念實際應用到各領域中。課程將探索最先進的深度學習模型，如物件偵測、影像分類，和影像分割，提供實用的實務練習；最後討論數位影像分析深度學習的未來挑戰。課程也將介紹最新的公開影像數據集(例如MNIST，CIFAR-10和ImageNet)，並涵蓋用於深度學習中的影像數據前處理和樣本標籤註記，詳細探討深度學習模型的評估指標。本課程將使用Matlab和Python範例，實作教學練習，課程單元包含:
●數位影像分析簡介
●深度學習基礎
●影像分析領域之深度學習基本介紹
●卷積神經網絡
●訓練卷積神經網絡
●遷移式學習
●深度學習數位影像數據標籤註記
●深度學習模型評估方式
●深度學習在數位影像分析領域之挑戰
●超引數優化
●激活函式
●損失函式
●優化函式
This course covers the basics of deep learning for digital image analysis, including theoretical concepts and practical applications. Students will learn about object detection, image classification, and segmentation using state-of-the-art deep learning models. The course will also address the challenges of using deep learning in digital image analysis and cover popular image datasets such as MNIST, CIFAR-10, and ImageNet. Additionally, students will gain hands-on experience in image data preparation and labeling, and learn about evaluation metrics for deep learning models. Programming examples will be provided in Python or Matlab. The course includes:
●A gentle introduction to digital image analysis and deep learning.
●Convolutional neural networks.
●Transfer learning.
●Image data labeling for deep learning.
●Evaluating deep learning models.
●The challenges of deep learning in the field of digital image analysis.
●Activation functions.
●Loss functions.
●Optimizers.
progress:

9.	The challenges of deep learning in the field of digital image analysis.
10.	Hyperparameters.

13.	Optimization functions.
14.	Final project presentation.

name: 現代行動通訊錯誤控制技術
syllabus:
錯誤控制技術是推動現代行動通訊超大量傳輸、超高可靠度與超低延遲等特性的重要技術之一。本課程旨在介紹現代無線行動通訊之錯誤控制技術之設計原理與應用，內容涵蓋：(1)無線行動通訊技術之錯誤控制技術簡介 (2) 基礎通道編碼理論與通道容量之介紹(3) 渦輪碼之原理與設計(4) 低密度校驗矩陣碼之原理與設計 (5) 極化碼之原理與法設計 (6)混合式自動重送請求技術之原理與設計。
Error control technology is one of the key enablers for boosting the strict performance of modern mobile communication systems (e.g., extremely-high data rate/reliability and ultra-low latency). This course aims at helping students acquire the knowledge about the applications and design principles of the error control techniques adopted in modern mobile communication systems, covering: (1) Introduction to error control techniques for mobile communication systems, (2) Introduction to basic channel coding theory and channel capacity, (3) Principles and designs of turbo codes, (4) Principles and designs of low-density parity-check (LDPC) codes, (5) Principles and design of polar codes, and (6) Principles and design of hybrid automatic retransmission requests (HARQ) technologies.
progress:
Weeks 1-2 Introduction to error control techniques
Weeks 3-4 Review of basic channel coding theory and channel capacity
Weeks 5-7 Principles and designs of low-density parity-check (LDPC) codes
Weeks 8-9 Project I
Weeks 10-12 Principles and designs of iterative decoders
Weeks 13-16 Principles and design of hybrid automatic retransmission requests (HARQ) technologies
Weeks 15-17 Project II presentation
Weeks 18 Project II demo
grading:
Participation 10%
Homeworks 40%
Projects 50%

Lin and D. J. Costello, Jr., Error Control Coding, 2nd ed. Upper Saddle River, NJ: Pearson Prentice Hall, 2004.

name: 數位電源控制與電路設計
syllabus:
數位電源為目前各大電源轉換電路公司研究的議題。本課程將介紹數位電源轉換器的動作模式、控制與實作考量，配合模擬軟體驗證理論，最後以數位電源設計實例進行探討。本課程藉由理論探討與模擬實作，加強學生的理論知識與實作能力。
Digital power supply design is a major industrial topic. This course introduces the operation and control of digital power converters, and discusses the design principles and their implementation considerations. Simulation is used to validate the theory learned in this course. Also, digital power supply design examples are discussed in detail. Students can strengthen their theoretical knowledge and practical ability through theoretical discussion and simulation practice from this course.

name: 資料探勘
syllabus:
Scope: This course is to introduce useful data mining techniques for students. We hope that students can learn more fundamental and advanced skills in the competitive mobile commerce world.
“Necessity is the mother of invention”—Data mining—Automated analysis of massive data sets.
Data mining (knowledge discovery from data) : Extraction of interesting (non-trivial, implicit, previously unknown and potentially useful) patterns or knowledge from huge amount of data.

name: 交流電機設計
syllabus:
Discuss the theories and designs of kinds of AC electric machines, including: (1) Magnetomotive Force and Flux Distribution on AC Machines; (2) Energy Conversion of AC machines; (3)Winding Insulation in an AC Machine; (4)Voltage and Speed Regulation; (5)Concept of Synchronous Machine Design; (6)Concept of Induction Machine Design.

探討各種交流電機原理與設計，內容包含：(1)交流電機的磁力和磁通分佈; (2)交流電機能量轉換基礎; (3)交流電機的繞組絕緣; (4)電壓與速度調整; (5)同步電機設計觀念; (6)感應電機設計觀念.

name: 大數據技術與管理
syllabus:
由於雲端運算的快速發展，大量資料收集與儲存技術已成瓶頸，大數據技術與管理提供一套具延展性與容錯能力的分散儲存與計算架構, 能有效處理大量複雜數據資料的儲存與運算。
本課程除介紹現有的大數據生態與趨勢，並針對目前軟硬體架構的處理瓶頸，提供系統組態與部署、服務層級協定、監控與管理等系統性規劃的解決方案，並導入跨領域的工程管理科學知識。課程簡扼論述大數據技術與管理的重要，並在Hadoop生態系統中，以Cloudera Hadoop為應用範例，實作說明其重要性。
課程內容包括：大數據的概念、應用生態與趨勢、Hadoop硬體規格與基礎架構規劃、叢集組態與部署、叢集服務層級協定、叢集監控與管理、相關生態技術。

name: 超大型積體電路設計
syllabus:
瞭解CMOS 超大型積體電路之電路元件特性及其組合電路之分析與設計方法，其內容包含：金氧半電晶體電路特性分析、電路性能評估、電路模擬、組合電路設計、序向電路設計、設計方法分析、測試與驗證、CMOS案例討論與Verilog HDL設計等課程內容。
This course covers the electric specification, circuit analyses, and design methods of the CMOS VLSI. The contents of this course include: Circuit characterization, performance estimation, Circuit simulation, Combinational circuit, Sequential circuit, Design methodology, Testing and verification, CMOS case study, and Verilog HDL design.

name: 能源管理技術
syllabus:
現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力的關鍵，本課程主要內容為：
    1.能源成本控制
    2.區域型電力能管理策略
    3.能源系統的經濟性設計概念
    4.冷暖系統的檢測與分析
    5.總合能源操作的工程化資料收集
    6.新能源系統的生態模組化設計
At the completion of this course, students will be able to.
1.Compare and contrast the various forms of energy eonversion.
2.Examine the techmologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.
3.Apply the concepts of electrical converters.
4.Evaluate the major types of energy storage.
5.Deformine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.
6.Analyze the methods in which energy can be conserved with in the various energy sectors of society.

name: 照明設計
syllabus:
就基本光學及人體工學之視覺基本理論及測試方法，以確立照明之質與量的標準，先就現有燈泡、燈管、燈具作整體性之介紹並就其特性比較，從而建立選擇之標準，不僅要求光的亮度，並且綜合考慮光的品質，燈具的安全性，經濟效益、能源的節約及燈具設計，針對亮度的計算，介紹三種不同的計算方法，以供設計使用，綜合前述之重點，就商業、工業、戶外及特性照明等設計，逐一以實例說明，並兼述燈具之控制線路及有關法令。

name: 數值方法
syllabus:
Engineering problems always involve complicated mathematics. Traditionally, solving mathematical equations requires elaborating process of derivation and induction of formula which require students to spend a long time to learn and master the skills and still not every student can achieve the level of expertise to solve these complicated equations. Moreover, many of these equations are not able to solve analytically. With the advance of computing technologies, an ordinary student, when helped by suitable software, can solve those equations which only gifted students could solve before. Not only that, those equations not solvable analytically can be solved today numerically. The purpose of this course is to train undergraduate students to solve engineering problems by using computers. Students will learn not only the theoretical background of numerical methods but also the popular engineering software MATLAB in this class. The choice of MATLAB instead of programming language like FORTRAN, C, or C++ is because MATLAB not only provides an abundant repertoire of programs for solving all kinds of engineering problems but also is a programming language that students use to create his own programs. This will equip students with a powerful tool no matter for higher study or an engineering career in the future. The contents include the following topics.
1.	Introduction to numerical method and MATLAB: give introductory examples, useful background material, identification of some basic issues and an introduction of computation and programming with MATLAB.
2.	Roots of Equations: deals with finding the zeros of a nonlinear function of one variable, as well as methods for minimization of such a function.
3.	Linear Algebra and Matrices: treat topics from numerical linear algebra. Include solving systems of linear equations, factorization of matrices and matrix inversion.
4.	Curve Fitting: deals with finding an equation that fits a set of points by linear least-square and nonlinear regression. Include polynomial regression, multiple linear regression, general linear least-square regression, QR factorization and the backslash operator, and nonlinear regression.
5.	Interpolation: include Newton interpolation, Lagrange interpolation and splines.
6.	Numerical Integration: give the formula for integrating a function that can not be analytically integrated. Include Newton-Cotes formula, the trapezoidal rule, Simpson’s rule, Romberg integration and Gauss quadrature.
7.	Ordinary Differential Equations: many engineering problems are solved in ODE form. This is always the most difficult parts of numerical methods. This chapter gives the technique for solving ODE. Include Euler’s method, Runge-Kutta method, multi-step method. 
8.	Eigenvalues: gives the technique for finding eigenvalues. Include polynomial method and power method.

name: 人體生物學及生物物理學
syllabus:
在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。
本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。
經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. name: Python物件導向實務應用
syllabus:
※大綱內容須說明課程與USR計畫場域議題之關聯性，及如何與課程內容結合之方式，並同步於課程系統更新。

近年來許多關於人工智慧、網路應用、甚至於嵌入式系統等等的場域皆使用Python來做為開發之程式語言。有鑑於多數的Python開發者皆將Python作為一般的直譯式程式語言，卻沒有善用到Python物件導向之特性，因此本門課將主要以Python物件導向程式撰寫為出發，輔以要求學生開發各類型之應用來熟悉Python物件導向程式之特點，並且教導學生使用各類型之應用函式庫來讓學生更加熟悉Python之特性。課程之安排將教導學生開發應用系統介面程式，所習得之技能亦可以用於開發各式各項創新之服務，亦可以用於開發人工智慧應用相關之主題。此外本門刻意要求學生於期末實作可以用於老人照護排班與line機器人服務系統與開發運算思維教材等應用。

name: 矩陣代數與應用
syllabus: This course is the deepening and broadening of linear algebra. In terms of deepening the theory, this course starts with the Gaussian elimination method, explaining the four vector spaces. Next, it explains the orthogonality and projection of matrices. In addition, this course explains the determinants, eigenvalues and eigenvectors, powers and exponents of matrices, and spectral decomposition, finally concluding with singular value decomposition, which is the theorem that unifies all the contents in this semester. In terms of broadening applications, this course introduces scientific and engineering applications, such as regression analysis, linear programming, graph theory and networks, and principal component analysis.
progress:

7. Spring break

13. eA and Differential Equations
14. Similarity Transformation and Spectral Theorem

18. Final

syllabus:
本課程內容包括邏輯閘的特性與功能測試，能利用積體電路完成各種基礎邏輯電路的組裝及設計，並能利用電子儀器進行量測、檢修。探討最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CAD軟體工具介紹。基礎邏輯閘實驗、組合邏輯實驗、加法器及減法器實驗、組合邏輯應用實驗、正反器邏輯實驗、循序邏輯電路應用實驗。

Combinational logic application experiments. 16. Flip-flop experiments. 17. Sequential circuit application experiments.

name: 計算機演算法
syllabus: This full-English course discusses the design and analysis of data structures and algorithms. The coverage of this graduate-level course is wider than the undergraduate-level course "Data Structures" and "Computer Algorithms", and includes the discussion of computation models, computation theories, and discrete mathematics techniques that assist the complexity analysis of data structures and algorithms. Advanced data structures and algorithms are covered; in addition, data structures and algorithms for novel computer hardware architecture (such as nonvolatile memories, distributed systems, and quantum computers) are also presented.

name: 資料結構
syllabus:
本課程將主要介紹資料結構(Data Structure)基本概念，輔以C語言作為實作練習之程式語言，課程內容包含：堆疊(Stack)、佇列(Queue)、串列(Linked List)、樹(Tree)、圖(Graph)...等抽象資料型態(Abstract Data Type，ADT)的介紹與實作練習，其次，介紹程式撰寫常用演算法(Algorithm)，包含：排序(Sorting)、搜尋(Search)...等演算法的介紹與實作練習。

1.	修課學生可從本課程學習常見資料結構(Data Structure)。
2.	修課學生可從本課程學習常見演算法(Algorithm)。
3.	修課學生可從本課程練習C語言實現上述資料結構與演算法。

name: 機率
syllabus:
The course aims to provide an introduction to probability which is a useful and fundamental mathematical tool for EE students. The course contains the following topics:

1. Experiments, Models, and Probabilities
2. Discrete Random Variables 
3. Continuous Random Variables
4. Pairs of Random Variables
5. Random Vectors
6. Sums of Random Variables
7. Parameter Estimation Using the Sample Mean
8. Hypothesis Testing
progress:
Weeks 01~02: Experiments, Models, and Probabilities
Weeks 03~04: Discrete Random Variables 
Weeks 05~06: Continuous Random Variables
Weeks 07~08: Pairs of Random Variables
Week     09: Midterm Exam
Weeks 10~11: Random Vectors
Weeks 12~13: Sums of Random Variables
Weeks 14~15: Parameter Estimation Using the Sample Mean
Weeks 16~17: Hypothesis Testing
Week     18: Final Exam

The schedule may be adjusted if necessary.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

With more than 5 times of being absent, your participation score will also be affected. 2. Only being present during the roll call counts. If you're late, you'll be seen as absent. 3. Absence from a class is no excuse for not knowing the assignment and what has been discussed in class. It is the student’s responsibility to find out what has been covered in the class by checking 北科i學園 or getting handouts/notes from the classmates. No late work / make-up exams will be accepted (unless you have requested an extension and been given approval ahead of the deadline).]

-40% Project & In-class participation, assignments, quizzes, etc.
-20% Final Exam

name: 勞作教育
syllabus:
目標：
期望學生透過校園環境整理及打掃體驗活動，認識勞作教育之理念，並從實作課程中養成同學不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的企業家精神，同時建立學生手腦並用，勤勞愛物的觀念，培養學生健全的人格品德、正確的價值觀及刻苦耐勞的工作態度。
progress:
課程內容：
第一階段：勞作教育理念介紹
由授課教師於課堂上講述勞作教育的意義及學期課程內容。
第二階段：實作體驗及反思
透過校園及外圍環境整理或是校外勞教相關活動，讓同學們體驗不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的精神，並於體驗後進行討論及撰寫反思單，啟發同學多元思考。
第三階段：期末成果分享
學期末彙整學期課程剪影，並回顧反思學習成果。
grading:
出席及學習態度:40%
活動參與及心得:40%
期末報告:20%
textbook: 自編教材

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
微積分
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、創新思考和解決問題能力，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。

name: 物理
syllabus: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。

Electromagnetic Waves (第17週) 14. 期末考 (第18週)

name: 物理實驗
syllabus: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。

name: 線性代數
syllabus:
線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一,著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明.課程大綱如下：
1.解聯立方程式
2.矩陣運算
3.行列式
4.向量空間
5.線性轉換
6.特徵值及特徵向量
7.選擇性題材,視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法, Jordan form ,或線性規劃

name: 物件導向程式設計
syllabus:
物件導向程式設計是一種以物件為中心的程式設計方法. 本課程以Java為主, C++為輔. 讓同學們從實做中學習物件導向的開發概念, 此外近年AI寫程式能力大幅進步, 課程上使用ChatGPT進行協同開發. 課程大綱包括:
1. 類別(Class)介紹, 2.物件導向與資料抽象化, 3.類別與方法, 4. .繼承, 5. 靜態與動態繫結, 6. 多型性, 7. Java開發環境及工具, 8. 各種設計模式介紹(Design Patterns), 9. 使用Java開發小遊戲, 10. 訓練AI玩遊戲 

Class website: http://www.aiotlab.org/teaching/oop.html 

Object-oriented programming (OOP) is a programming paradigm based on the concept of "objects", which usually defined as “class” in programming language like C++ and Java. In this class we will introduce the basic concepts of OOP, such as object, class, encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism. Java is the primary language used in the class, but we will also cover OOP in C++. We hope this class will help you understand OOP concepts as well as be ready for developing high-quality software.

17. Final Exam

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
微積分
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。

name: 物件導向程式設計
syllabus: This course offers a broad introduction to computer programming and object-oriented programming. The major programming language focused will be C++, one of the "big 3" programming languages according to the TIOBE survey in Dec. 2017. We shall also cover essential data structures, e.g., linked list and binary search trees, modern development tools, e.g., Make, Subversion, Git, and unit testing tools, object-oriented programing paradigms, design patterns, and refactoring. How to plan a real-world-level project shall also be discussed. From this course, students can expect to be equipped with essential know-hows for computer programming and object-oriented programming, both of which are indispensable in the foreseeable future.

name: 醫電工程概論
syllabus:
本課程運用跨領域專長整合共同設計開發醫療電子應用系統或服務
內容包含:
(1) 生醫檢測儀表系統設計與製作課程模組規劃如下：
生醫檢測儀表系統概論、生醫檢測之光電設計實務、嵌入式系統之醫療儀表應用實務、無線網路與生醫儀表整合設計、醫療器材品質系統查驗實務
(2) 睡眠感測元件設計與製作課程模組規劃如下：
睡眠相關概念與其量測方法、可攜帶式睡眠監測硬體設計、演算法設計、睡眠感測後端資料整合系統開發
(3) 無線健康整合服務系統應用於失智老人之照護
RFID 室內安全監控系統、RFID戶外安全監控系統、GPS-GSM戶外安全監控系統、警急救援軟體平台
progress: 第一週：心電圖訊號原理及特性。 第二週：醫用電子實習-心電圖訊號量測實作。第三週：QRS 偵測演算法。第四週：呼吸訊號原理及特性。第五週：醫用電子實習-呼吸訊號量測實作。第六週：吸氣與吐氣時間比例及呼吸速率計算。第七週：血氧訊號原理及特性。第八週：醫用電子實習-血氧訊號量測實作。第九週：期中考。第十週：血氧濃度-最大最小值及心率與血氧濃度計算。第十一週：血壓訊號原理及特性。第十二週：醫用電子實習-血壓訊號量測實作。第十三週：心跳計算與血壓顯示。第十三週：睡眠偵測簡介。第十四週：醫用電子實習-睡眠檢測實習。第十五週：睡眠演算法介紹。第十六週：RDID與WSN定位服務。第十七週：失智老人照護實習。第十八週：期末考。
grading: 總成績＝[期中考＋期末考＋實習成績＋（100-點名未到次數x10)]/4

name: 異質多網多媒體服務
syllabus:
本課程介紹異質多網多媒體的特性與架構，在多媒體部分，介紹多媒體基本組成、編解碼(Codec)原理、串流(Streaming)協定；在網路部分，介紹常用之有線(Ethernet)及無線網路(Wi-Fi、Bluetooth、Cellular/Mobile)，以及針對多媒體設計之網路機制，最後，配合研究所性質，透過論文導讀方式介紹當下視訊串流(Video Streaming)的最新發展，藉此提升學生對於新世代異質多網多媒體服務之認識。

1. 修課學生可從本課程學習多媒體串流(Multimedia Streaming)。
2. 修課學生可從本課程學習異質化網路(Heterogeneous Networks)。
3. 修課學生可從本課程練習相關軟體實作(Software Implementation)技巧。

name: 人體生物學及生物物理學
syllabus:
在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。
本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。
經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

name: 深度學習應用開發實務
syllabus: The goal of this course is to give students a broad overview of state-of-the-art deep learning algorithms, and teach students how to develop deep learning applications by hands-on coding examples. Most examples taught in this class are based on the TensorFlow framework. We will cover many different fields including image classification, object detection, natural language processing, reinforcement learning and generative adversarial networks.

name: Python物件導向實務應用
syllabus:
※大綱內容須說明課程與USR計畫場域議題之關聯性，及如何與課程內容結合之方式，並同步於課程系統更新。

近年來許多關於人工智慧、網路應用、甚至於嵌入式系統等等的場域皆使用Python來做為開發之程式語言。有鑑於多數的Python開發者皆將Python作為一般的直譯式程式語言，卻沒有善用到Python物件導向之特性，因此本門課將主要以Python物件導向程式撰寫為出發，輔以要求學生開發各類型之應用來熟悉Python物件導向程式之特點，並且教導學生使用各類型之應用函式庫來讓學生更加熟悉Python之特性。課程之安排將教導學生開發應用系統介面程式，所習得之技能亦可以用於開發各式各項創新之服務，亦可以用於開發人工智慧應用相關之主題。此外本門刻意要求學生於期末實作可以用於老人照護排班與line機器人服務系統與開發運算思維教材等應用。

name: 混合訊號積體電路設計
syllabus: This course offers an in-depth exploration into the analysis and design of mixed-signal integrated circuits (ICs), with a particular emphasis on signal conversion and system modeling. The curriculum is structured around four main pillars (MLDS) : (1) Modeling - the development of mixed-signal circuits, (2) Language - proficiency in programming languages such as Verilog-A, Verilog-D, Python, C, and Matlab, (3) Data/Signal - thorough analysis of circuit performance and signal quality, and (4) System - mastery in adaptive optimization algorithms. Practical examples, including voltage regulators, Phase-Locked Loops (PLLs), and Successive Approximation Register (SAR) Analog-to-Digital Converters (ADCs), will be used to reinforce learning.

Week 13: Mid-Term Project Assignment

Week 16-17: Analysis and Design of SAR ADC
Week 18: Final Project Submission

2022 Assignment and Project Examples:
•	MSD-HW1: Simulation of feedback amplifier's transient response with specific initial conditions using programming languages. Submission of code and output files within two weeks.
•	MSD-HW2: Numerical transient analysis of a nonlinear feedback amplifier using mathematical tools. Submission includes code files.
•	MSD-HW3: Calculation of resistance in a mesh network using linear algebra, verified with Hspice, to be submitted within one month.
•	MSD-HW4: Generation and spectral analysis of a 10-Hz sinusoidal wave using MATLAB, Mathematica, or Python. Submission of solutions and spectrum graph within one month.
•	MSD-HW5: PLL linear model design and system stability verification using MATLAB and other tools. Submission of various files and screenshots within one month.
•	MSD-HW6: Design and simulation of an integer divider for PLL in Verilog, verified through digital design flow. Submission of code and waveform screenshots within one month.
•	Final Report - PLL Locking Simulation: Design of an integer PLL with a report including design flow, simulations, and Verilog files. Submission of comprehensive files by the deadline.

name: 太空工程實務專題
syllabus:
太空工程實務專題課程旨在讓學生瞭解和掌握太空工程領域的實踐技能和實務知識，以及培養學生的團隊協作、問題解決和創新思維能力。學生將進行一個實際的太空工程設計項目，通過實踐瞭解太空工程的設計、測試、實施和管理流程，並透過報告、演示和評審等形式展示項目成果。通過此課程的學習，學生可以瞭解太空工程領域的最新發展，掌握相關的技能和知識，並提升團隊合作和項目管理能力。本課程可同時藉由產學合作設計進行實際演練。
The aim of the Space Engineering Practical Project course is to enable students to understand and master practical skills and knowledge in the field of space engineering, as well as to cultivate their teamwork, problem-solving, and innovative thinking abilities. Students will undertake a practical space engineering design project to understand the design, testing, implementation, and management processes of space engineering through practice, and demonstrate project outcomes through reports, presentations, and assessments. Through this course, students can understand the latest developments in the field of space engineering, master relevant skills and knowledge, and enhance their teamwork and project management abilities. This course can also provide practical exercises through industry-academia collaboration.

name: 衛星通訊收發機設計
syllabus:
本課程探討衛星通訊系統收發機設計，介紹衛星端與地球站通訊收發資料流。課程涵蓋的主題包括：通訊協定、通道編碼演算法、調變技術、多天線設計、軟體無線電技術、通訊數據機實現。通過這些主題的介紹，學生將了解衛星通訊收發機設計的技巧，並學習以軟體無線電實現通訊數據機。
This course discusses the design of transceivers for satellite communication systems and introduces the flow of data sent and received in communications between satellites and earth stations. Topics covered in the course include communication protocols, channel coding algorithms, modulation technology, multi-antenna design, software-defined radio technology, and the implementation of communication modem. Through the introduction of these topics, students will understand the techniques of satellite communication transceiver design and learn to implement communication modems using software-defined radios.

name: 醫電工程概論
syllabus:
本課程運用跨領域專長整合共同設計開發醫療電子應用系統或服務
內容包含:
(1) 生醫檢測儀表系統設計與製作課程模組規劃如下：
生醫檢測儀表系統概論、生醫檢測之光電設計實務、嵌入式系統之醫療儀表應用實務、無線網路與生醫儀表整合設計、醫療器材品質系統查驗實務
(2) 睡眠感測元件設計與製作課程模組規劃如下：
睡眠相關概念與其量測方法、可攜帶式睡眠監測硬體設計、演算法設計、睡眠感測後端資料整合系統開發
(3) 無線健康整合服務系統應用於失智老人之照護
RFID 室內安全監控系統、RFID戶外安全監控系統、GPS-GSM戶外安全監控系統、警急救援軟體平台
progress: 第一週：心電圖訊號原理及特性。 第二週：醫用電子實習-心電圖訊號量測實作。第三週：QRS 偵測演算法。第四週：呼吸訊號原理及特性。第五週：醫用電子實習-呼吸訊號量測實作。第六週：吸氣與吐氣時間比例及呼吸速率計算。第七週：血氧訊號原理及特性。第八週：醫用電子實習-血氧訊號量測實作。第九週：期中考。第十週：血氧濃度-最大最小值及心率與血氧濃度計算。第十一週：血壓訊號原理及特性。第十二週：醫用電子實習-血壓訊號量測實作。第十三週：心跳計算與血壓顯示。第十三週：睡眠偵測簡介。第十四週：醫用電子實習-睡眠檢測實習。第十五週：睡眠演算法介紹。第十六週：RDID與WSN定位服務。第十七週：失智老人照護實習。第十八週：期末考。
grading: 總成績＝[期中考＋期末考＋實習成績＋（100-點名未到次數x10)]/4
