name: 自然語言處理與情感計算
syllabus:
Course Description: 
	This course offers an in-depth exploration into patent analytics. Participants will traverse topics such as research methodologies specific to patents, foundational aspects of patent law, the pivotal role of semiconductors in patenting, keyword-centric patent searches complemented by pertinent case studies, the integration of linguistics and logic in understanding patents, the practical applications of ChatGPT, and the utility of Natural Language Processing in patent data analysis.

Course Topics:
1.	Research Methodology in Patent Analytics:
	•	Overview of innovation trends
	•	Analyzing McKinsey and Gartner reports for patent insights
2.	Basics of Patent Law:
	•	Intellectual Property: Understanding the Basics
	•	What makes an invention patentable?
	•	Constructing and analyzing a patent claim
	•	Understanding patent structures
	•	The thin line between innovation and non-obviousness
	•	Crafting an effective patent strategy
3.	Semiconductors and Their Importance in Patenting:
	•	Introduction to semiconductor processes, manufacturing, and devices
	•	Deep dive into VLSI design, IP, MCU, CPU, GPU, firmware, OS, and software
	•	A look at solid-state devices
	•	Advanced Process Technologies (Refer to Advanced-Process-Technologies.pdf for detailed insights)
4.	Keyword-driven Patent Search & Case Studies:
	•	Patent cases on advanced devices: Planar FET, FinFET, GAA
	•	Patent cases involving AI methodologies
5.	Language, Logic, and Meaning in Patent Analysis:
	•	Introduction to linguistics in patent analysis (Reference: https://chowkafat.net/Lingtopic.html)
	•	Basics of semantics and its importance in patent comprehension
	•	Deep dive into formal semantics and generalized quantifier theory
	•	Deciphering the logical form and structure in patents
	•	Introduction to propositional logic and its application in patent analysis
	•	Unraveling predicate logic in patent contexts
6.	Practical Applications using ChatGPT:
	•	Using ChatGPT for instructional language and problem-solving in patent analytics
	•	Case study: Constructing a GAA using ChatGPT
	•	ChatGPT in research methodologies and patent search
7.	Natural Language Processing (NLP) in Patent Analysis:
	•	Understanding word embedding and word vectors
	•	Techniques for determining similarity in patent documents using NLP
progress:
W1 10/22(日) Research Methodology in Patent Analytics
W2 10/29(日) Basics of Patent Law
W3 11/5(日) Semiconductors and Their Importance in Patenting
W4 11/19(日) Keyword-driven Patent Search & Case Studies
W5 12/2(六) Language, Logic, and Meaning in Patent Analysis
W6 12/9(六) Practical Applications using ChatGPT
W6 12/9(六) Natural Language Processing (NLP) in Patent Analysis
grading:
1. Homework assignments - 40%
2. Mid-term project 30%
3. Final proejct 30%

此課程之目標為多媒體系統整介紹，包含介紹所有影像和視訊的標準格式、視訊的壓縮基本原理，目前主流的視訊壓所標準格式，讓學生了解到1.多媒體簡介2.多媒體發展平台3.多媒體資訊系統設計4.多媒體資訊系統實體建置。課程內容包含: 1.多媒體資料簡介2.多媒體發展平台3.超媒體介紹4.H.264壓縮技術5.H.264標準架構6.多媒體編輯7.多媒體伺服器的建置
This course is mainly aimed at introducing the Multimedia Systems, including: (1) Introduction to Multimedia Systems (2)Multimedia Platforms for developers (3)Hypermedia Systems (4)H.264 Video Compression (5) H.264/AVC Frameworks (6) Multimedia Editor (7) Develop and Manage Multimedia Server

name: 數值方法
syllabus:
Engineering problems always involve complicated mathematics. Traditionally, solving mathematical equations requires elaborating process of derivation and induction of formula which require students to spend a long time to learn and master the skills and still not every student can achieve the level of expertise to solve these complicated equations. Moreover, many of these equations are not able to solve analytically. With the advance of computing technologies, an ordinary student, when helped by suitable software, can solve those equations which only gifted students could solve before. Not only that, those equations not solvable analytically can be solved today numerically. The purpose of this course is to train undergraduate students to solve engineering problems by using computers. Students will learn not only the theoretical background of numerical methods but also the popular engineering software MATLAB in this class. The choice of MATLAB instead of programming language like FORTRAN, C, or C++ is because MATLAB not only provides an abundant repertoire of programs for solving all kinds of engineering problems but also is a programming language that students use to create his own programs. This will equip students with a powerful tool no matter for higher study or an engineering career in the future. The contents include the following topics.
1.	Introduction to numerical method and MATLAB: give introductory examples, useful background material, identification of some basic issues and an introduction of computation and programming with MATLAB.
2.	Roots of Equations: deals with finding the zeros of a nonlinear function of one variable, as well as methods for minimization of such a function.
3.	Linear Algebra and Matrices: treat topics from numerical linear algebra. Include solving systems of linear equations, factorization of matrices and matrix inversion.
4.	Curve Fitting: deals with finding an equation that fits a set of points by linear least-square and nonlinear regression. Include polynomial regression, multiple linear regression, general linear least-square regression, QR factorization and the backslash operator, and nonlinear regression.
5.	Interpolation: include Newton interpolation, Lagrange interpolation and splines.
6.	Numerical Integration: give the formula for integrating a function that can not be analytically integrated. Include Newton-Cotes formula, the trapezoidal rule, Simpson’s rule, Romberg integration and Gauss quadrature.
7.	Ordinary Differential Equations: many engineering problems are solved in ODE form. This is always the most difficult parts of numerical methods. This chapter gives the technique for solving ODE. Include Euler’s method, Runge-Kutta method, multi-step method. 
8.	Eigenvalues: gives the technique for finding eigenvalues. Include polynomial method and power method.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 微積分
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。

name: 機率與統計
syllabus: This course introduces students to probability, random variables and fundamental statistics. Topics include fundamental probability theory, random variables, distribution functions, Bernoulli, binomial, negative binomial, geometric, hypergeometric, and Poisson distributions. The other continuous topics covered are uniform, exponential, normal, gamma and beta distributions; joint distributions; properties of expectation, central limit theorem, Chebyshev inequality, and law of large numbers; fundamental statistics.

name: iOS 應用程式開發
syllabus:
Apple推出iPhone以及iPhone SDK 後，造成了一股不可擋的智慧型手機革命，由於相較於桌上型和筆記型電腦，手機是人們日常生活中更容易貼近使用的行動裝置，因此，手機中的App 更可以幫助人們解決生活中的問題。
本課程將由最基本的入門點切入，前段會先帶領同學針對Swift語法，委派設計(Delegate)模式等iOS入門的幾大難題上課，接著利用Storyboard建構出常見的iOS app 使用者介面，結合感測器網路等功能開發各種應用程式。

6. 核心應用程式設計
7. 感應器應用
8. 多媒體與相機功能
9. 網路應用程式
10. 專題實作及評鑑

name: 物件導向分析與設計
syllabus:
本課程探討應用物件導向方法從事軟體設計的過程與步驟, 透過課程專題製作, 學者將學習以UML記載分析與設計之結果, 並使用一個物件導向語言(如Java或C++)實作之. 課程內容: 1. 物件導向模型 -- UML介紹 2. 物件導向程式語言與環境 3. 物件導向軟體發展週期 3.1 物件導向分析 - 需求分析, 使用個案, 觀念模型, 有限狀態模型 3.2 物件導向設計 - 實際使用個案, 合作圖, 類別圖, 設計模板, 3.3 程式撰寫 - 設計與程式之應對 4. 專題
This course familiarizes the students with the principles and techniques for object-oriented software development. The students will use UML and an object-oriented language such as Java or C++ to complete a term programming project. Course contents: 1. Object-oriented modeling with UML 2. Object-oriented languages and environments 3. Object-oriented software development process 3.1 Object-oriented analysis - requirement analysis, use case analysis, conceptual models, finite state machine models 3.2 Object-oriented design - real use cases, collaboration diagrams, class design diagrams, design patterns 3.3 Construction - mapping design to codes 4. Term project.
progress:
1. This course covers object-oriented modeling for software development. Materials covered include class models, state models, and interaction models in UML, a reference process model based on Unified process, implementation issues, and software engineering principles. This course is thinking and programming-intensive.
2. Students are required to complete a non-trivial software project. Only object-oriented languages such as C++/Java/C# are allowed. A project team may have 1-4 students. A single person team is allowed but is not encouraged.
3. There will be no exams; instead, there are 7 homework assignments, several in-class exercises, and two project reviews. All assignments turned in must be typed (handwriting will not be accepted).
grading:

name: 電腦圖學
syllabus: AR/VR之人機互動應用已日漸普及, 其重要性已是不可言喻, 電腦圖學在日常生活中已經是一個不可或缺的科技 。因此本課程宗旨為教導學生電腦圖學之基礎理論,  並搭配OpenGL程式來開發3D互動程式。課程中將搭配業師協同教學, 指導學生如何開發符合使用者需求之應用程式, 課程將搭配實地探訪的方式, 理解使用者需求, 並設計出應用程式之雛形, 以及如何做到有效地使用者評估。

name: 機器學習
syllabus:
This course covers a broad classes of machine learning algorithms. After taking this course, students should be able to conduct research in this field. The emphasis of this course is not in the theoretical development (math), but in the understanding level. Therefore, many examples will be given in the lecture to show how to apply the equations to real problems. The detailed contents are given in the course schedule field.

Prerequisite: Calculus (partial derivatives), undergrad linear algebra (eigenvalues & eigenvectors), undergrad probability (random variable, joint density, Gaussian distribution), and programming skills (Python)
progress:
Week 1: Class announcement and introduction to machine learning
Week 2: introduction to machine learning (cont'd)
Week 3: Basics of supervised learning (classification and regression), VC dimension, Bayesian decision theory, and Naive Bayes classifiers 
Week 4: Dimension reduction techniques: PCA, FA, LDA and ICA, 
Week 5: Unsupervised learning: Clustering algorithm (k-means)
Week 6: Decision trees: ID3, C4.5, and bagging algorithm (random forest)
Week 7: Basics of optimization
Week 8: Basics of optimization (Cont'd) and gradient search
Week 9: MT
Week 10: MT sol.  
Week 11: Feedforward neural networks with examples: multi-layer perceptrons, Back propagation, and Regularization methods
Week 12: Deep learning and convolutional neural networks
Week 13, 14: More on deep neural networks: YOLO, Autoencoder, LSTM, and advanced topics, such as Bayesian networks, confidence of classification, and self-supervised learning 
Week 15: SVM, Adaboost, and Ensemble learning
Week 16: Design and analysis of experiments
Week 17:  Reinforcement learning
Week 18: Final exam
grading:
MT 30 %
Final 40 %
HW 30 %
Project 10 % (optional)

name: 雲端與物聯網安全
syllabus:
This course will introduce Google Cloud computing-related technologies to give students a comprehensive understanding of the Google Cloud platform, architecture, services, and programming. Course contents include 1. Cloud storage system architecture, storage network, and virtualization technology, 2. Business continuity operation storage technology, 3. Storage architecture security and management, 4. Cloud scheduling technology, performance, and security, 5. Virtualization Data center construction - virtual computing, storage, network, desktop, and applications, 6. Cloud services and management, 7. Introduction to cloud computing development and enterprise applications, 8. Internship courses and special projects. After the mid-term exam, we will begin to introduce the Internet of Things and development trends, Week 11 Internet of Things information security issues and trends, Week 12 Internet of Things information security detection technology, Week 13 Internet of Things information security detection technology and implementation, Week 14 Internet of Things Security risk assessment, Week 15 final special production, Week 16 final special production, Week 17 final special report, Week 18 final report. 

本課程將導入  Google 雲端運算相關技術，使學生對Google 雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.實習課程與專題計畫。
期中考後將開始介紹物聯網與發展趨勢，第11週物聯網資訊安全問題與趨勢，第12週物聯網資訊安全檢測技術，第13週物聯網資訊安全檢測技術與實現，第 14 週物聯網安全風險評估，第 15 週期末專題製作，第16週期末專題製作，第 17 週期末專題報告，第 18 週期末報告

syllabus:
本課程主要探索分析不實訊息的方法，透過這門課將學習到異常訊息、社交工程、傳播路徑及深度造假等對不實訊息分析的技術, 包含語意分析、帳號識別分析及傳播路徑對不實訊息的影響分析。

name: 區塊鏈技術與應用
syllabus:
區塊鏈技術(作為比特幣等數位貨幣的核心)已重塑了金融交易與分散式交互方式之未來。同時它也被期待帶給我們一個更自組與可提供事實證明的數位化世界。抽象化區塊鏈構造是非常精巧的，它倚賴輕量化密碼學工具搭配分散式系統概念，完成了開放、安全且有效率的系統(如比特幣)。本課程為區塊鏈技術與應用上之概念介紹，包含：比特幣與區塊鏈設計、相關基礎密碼學工具、分散式網路與共識、區塊鏈應用。
Blockchain techniques (the core of cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin) have reshaped the future of financial transactions and decentralized interactions. They are also expected to bring us a more self-organizing and dependent digital world. The abstraction of blockchain is very delicate. It relies on cryptography tools and decentralized system concepts to achieve an open, secure, and efficient system (such as Bitcoin). This course aims to introduce the concepts of blockchain techniques and applications, including Bitcoin and blockchain design, basic cryptography tools, decentralized networks and consensus, and blockchain applications.

name: 資料科學原理與教育數據應用
syllabus:
資料科學是個跨領域的重要興新學科，其基本知識含括資訊、線性代數、機率與統計等，相關技術可應用在許多領域上，包含教育領域。本課程從學科整體介紹開始，討論資料科學中各主要階段的相關議題：包含資料搜尋擷取、資料整理與問題發想、數理知識回顧與討論、資料分析建模與方法、資料呈現與視覺化等。除課堂上講授與討論外，課程亦著重如何實際應用所學，將使用教育資料並以小組方式進行議題發想與分析實作的學期專題。此外，為強化健全資料視覺呈現課題，在實作專題中課程亦著重學生報告能力的培養，希望培育出全方位的資料科學人才。
Data science is an emerging interdisciplinary field that explores how to produce or create the valuable information and knowledge from large, multi-typed, or unstructured data and provides effective feedbacks to many applications, including education. The related topics include data processing and computing, data storage, statistics and probability, linear algebra, and data analysis. This course introduces the rapidly growing field, discusses the state-of-art techniques, and provides students with the fundamental related knowledge as well as the ability to use software tools. The major phases on data manipulation- collection, preparation, analytics, and presentation, in data science will be discussed. The training of this course is toward equipping students with the general mindset and the ability to solve problems practically with the learned techniques on educational data with project groups. In addition, the students also need to practice the presentation for the findings and results of the studied problem in order to equip with the ability to convey the thoughts well and demonstrate things visually. The major objective of this course is to cultivate talents in data science.

name: 開源系統軟體與實務
syllabus:
開源軟體 (open-source software)對於資訊世界的發展極其重要，尤其是系統軟體與中介軟體。在1990年代快速發展的GNU/Linux，1990年代末期進入互連網時代，世界上最多伺服器使用的開源碼網頁伺服器Apache HTTP Server應運而生，之後更衍生出傳奇性的開源碼Apache Project。迄今，各個開源碼社群持續改進、優化既有的軟體，並且不斷地開發出有巨大影響力的新計畫，包括廣泛用於建構雲端服務與巨量資料運算的 OpenStack、Hadoop和Spark，世界上最多人使用在智慧手機和平板的Android作業環境。開源系統軟體與中介軟體更成為物聯網和巨量資料分析時代的重要基礎，高效率、即時性、機器與機器之間良好的溝通與合作是這個時代應用開發的關鍵，除了需要有高效率、穩定、安全的作業系統之外，還需要更多高品質、優化度高的系統軟體與中介軟體。
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Open-source software is extremely important to the development of the information world, especially system software and middleware. GNU/Linux developed rapidly in the 1990s and entered the Internet era in the late 1990s. The open-source web server Apache HTTP Server, which is used by the most servers in the world, came into being, and then the legendary open-source Apache Project was born. So far, various open-source communities have continued to improve and optimize existing software, and continue to develop new projects with great influence, including OpenStack, Hadoop and Spark, which are widely used to build cloud services and massive data computing. The most widely used Android work environment on smartphones and tablets. Open-source system software and intermediary software have become an important foundation in the era of Internet of Things and massive data analysis. High efficiency, immediacy, and good communication and cooperation between machines are the keys to application development in this era. In addition to high efficiency, In addition to a stable and secure operating system, more high-quality, highly optimized system software and middleware are needed.

name: 機器視覺
syllabus:
本課程介紹機器視覺之基本概念、原理及衍生應用，同時輔助以開放的影像函式庫來實作訓練；課程中由基礎的基本影像分析入門，並逐步導入機器視覺理論與方法，二維影像校正與立體視覺等內容；課程中將介紹機器視覺系統的相關資源與實作能力的培養，並進一步延伸至影像量測、機器學習與機器人領域的範例應用。
The field of machine vision has been growing at a fast pace. As in most developing fields, not all aspects of machine vision that are of interest to active researchers are useful to the designers and users of a vision system for a specific application. This course is intended to provide a balanced introduction to machine vision. Basic concepts are introduced with only essential mathematical elements. The details to allow implementation and use of vision algorithms in practical applications are provided, and engineering aspects of techniques are emphasized.

name: 自然語言處理與文件探勘
syllabus: 在各種應用領域中，非結構化的文件相當普遍。如何精確有效地從文件中擷取出重要資訊並分析語意，將有助於彙整不同想法。本課程介紹基本的自然語言處理技術，包括: 語彙組成、語法分析、語意分析等，以及常見的文件探勘方法。除了介紹詞性標註 (POS tagging)、關鍵詞擷取 (keyterm extraction)、中文斷詞 (word segmentation)之外，也將探討不同的字詞與文件表達方式，並應用深度學習方法進行有效的語意分析，如: 情緒分析、意見探勘等。

name: 物件導向程式設計實習
syllabus:
使學生熟悉，物件導向程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：1. C++ 設計環境 2. 類別與物件實習 3. 建構者與解構者實習 4. 繼承實習 5. 虛擬函式與多型實習 6. 運算子溢載實習 7. 例外處理實習 8. 泛型程式設計實習 9. 標準模板程式庫實習 10. 期末專題設計
This lab covers the following topics: introduction to C complier used for ARM CPU, Debugger tools for ARM CPU, functions of the evaluation board, usage of the emulator, writing and debugging C language for ARM CPU, writing and debugging assembly language of ARM, combining C and asm codes, issues of using interrupts, usage of various I/O devices, including parallel ports, serial ports, A/D converters, and D/A converters, and term project.
progress:

1. Object Oriented Programming
2. 遊戲程式設計與製作

重要時程：
週次	事項	說明
1	第一次上課	練習Game framework、討論分組與題目
2	確定分組	請上網登錄分組情形。

3	完成練習
6	專題進度展示(1)	互相觀摩專題進度(每組簡報5分鐘)

grading:
1. 本學期將分組(每組以兩人為限)，製作一個遊戲程式。學期成績以平時成績(20%)、實習進度展示(20%)、實習報告(30%)、實習成果(30%)等項目為計分標準。唯：(1)實習成果之成績未達標準(C+或以下)者，不論其他成績為何，其學期成績均調整為不及格；(2)未完成實習報告所規定之事項者，學期總成績依該規定扣分；(3)同組兩人貢獻程度不同者，學期成績依貢獻比例適度調整；(4)選擇自提物件導向專案者，評分標準將於開學公告，且較為嚴格，風險高請審慎考量。
2. 學期中教師(或助教)每隔週(或隔週)會考察一次進，考察的目的是解遊戲程式的進展，並協助解決程式設計的問題。平時成績以每次考察時進之控制為計分標準，進愈快者成績愈佳。第三週未完成練習者，每樣練習扣平時成績10分。
3. 每缺席、遲到1節課，學期總成績扣1分。
4. 期末實習報告應指出組員的分工情形，以及組員對實習貢獻的百分比，以供調整評分之考。
5. 為量化各組每週投入實習的時間與程式的數量，每次上課時，各組均須上網填寫前一週用於製作遊戲程式的時間與工作內容，並上傳程式。

name: 機率
syllabus: 本課程介紹機率學的原理與應用。機率學為數學的一門學科，探討不確定事件或行為的數學表示及計算方式，廣泛應用於自然科學、工程及社會科學中。本課程之授課範圍，包含：1.組合分析、2.機率公設、3.條件機率與獨立事件、4.離散隨機變數、5.連續隨機變數、6.二維與多維隨機變數、7.期望值性質、8.極限定理。

name: 資料科學導論
syllabus:
本課程將初步介紹資料科學之基礎，帶領學程學生學習基本程式設計及工具應用，如何由手上之現有資料或網路資料進行發想及定義問題、學習使用適當演算法技術，由數據中探索資料之特殊樣式，提供最佳決策支援之依據。
This course introduces fundamental concepts in data science. Guide students to learn basic programming and application tools. Students will learn how to analyze data in hand or collect data from Internet, and try to define new and creative problems. In addition, students will also learn basic algorithms to approach the solutions. Exploring and discovering the special patterns of data can provide a way for the best decision support.

name: 駭客攻防概論
syllabus:
駭客是一門非常廣泛的學科，涵蓋了廣泛的主題。 本課程將提供駭客攻防的各種概念，並解釋如何在即時環境中使用它們。
本課程將包括駭客的類型，駭客的優勢/劣勢，駭客的目的，駭客的工具，駭客的技能，駭客的流程等。
Hacking is a very broad discipline, which covers a wide range of topics. This course will provide the various concepts of Ethical Hacking and explain how you can use them in a real-time environment.
This course will include the type of hacking, advantage /disadvantage of hacking, the purpose of hacking, tools of hacking, skill of hacking, process of hacking, etc.

name: 數據程式設計
syllabus:
課程中將教導學生如何透過以程式(Python)的方式，來自動建置必要的檔案環境，用來儲存及引用這些擷取來的巨量資訊或大數據(Big Data)，以利後續的搜尋與增刪，使能更符合教育現場對此數據的應用。對於眾多的Python資料處理與網頁擷取模組，課程中嘗試以分門別類的方式，來示範如何從網路及雲端擷取各種類型與項目的資料，並提供練習與提問，讓學生熟練這些模組及其使用的方法，進而可以將這些內容應用在未來面對的教育大數據項目中，甚或能開發出更貼合教育情境的模組，還能分享以供大眾使用。
In this course we will teach students how to have the ability for processing big data. It includes how to automatically create the necessary file environment for storing and referencing the huge amount of information or big data, which accessed through a programmatic approach (by Python) to facilitate subsequent search, addition, and deletion to better fit the application of such data in the educational scenarios and their own fields. Furthermore, there are many Python data processing and web scraping modules developed for public use. Thus, we try to demonstrate how to use these modules to retrieve various types of data from the Internet and the cloud in a separate way. To help students understand the usages of the common used modules, this course will provide related exercises and questions for students to familiarize themselves with these modules. Hopefully, the students can learn, and then apply these contents to their own fields and future educational big data projects.

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus:
ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

name: 勞作教育
syllabus:
本課程目標是協助學生透過校園環境整理及打掃體驗活動，認識勞作教育之理念，從勞作課程中養成同學不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的企業家精神，使學生透過實際的勞作課程，培養學生手腦並用，勤勞愛物的觀念，培養學生健全的人格、良好品德、正確的價值觀及刻苦耐勞的工作態度。
課程內容：包含四大階段
（一）勞作教育理念介紹：選取勞作教育相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含勞作教育意義、勞作教育前測作業說明
（二）勞作教育實作階段：勞作課程分三項不同情境施作。
（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須於各實作階段課程進行討論與反思，並撰寫心得報告、完成後測作業。
（四）期末成果分享：勞作教育期末成果分享，並辦理獎勵工作。
The purpose of this course is to introduce the idea of labor service to students. Students who take this course have to participate in the campus cleaning activities. This is to help students building up: (i) the team-work abilities; (ii) the concepts of ethics; (iii) the abilities of concerning the society. In addition, the course would help students to develop the accurate attitudes in the daily life and the healthy personalities. Furthermore, this course would also help students to enrich the sense of humanities. Four stages are included in this course: (i) the introduction of the labor service, (ii) the field work studies, (iii) the class discussions, and (iv) sharing of the experiences of the labor service.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 計算機程式設計(二)
syllabus: 本課程介紹計算機程式設計的觀念與方法，程式設計語言以Python/C語言為基礎，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入程式設計技術。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練及其在資訊工程上之應用，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計專業之基礎。 實習目的使學生熟悉計算機應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則。內容含程式設計環境、程式語言結構、基本函數、流程控制、與資料結構。

name: 物理
syllabus:
本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

name: 物件導向分析與設計
syllabus:
本課程探討應用物件導向方法從事軟體設計的過程與步驟, 透過課程專題製作, 學者將學習以UML記載分析與設計之結果, 並使用一個物件導向語言(如Java或C++)實作之. 課程內容: 1. 物件導向模型 -- UML介紹 2. 物件導向程式語言與環境 3. 物件導向軟體發展週期 3.1 物件導向分析 - 需求分析, 使用個案, 觀念模型, 有限狀態模型 3.2 物件導向設計 - 實際使用個案, 合作圖, 類別圖, 設計模板, 3.3 程式撰寫 - 設計與程式之應對 4. 專題
This course familiarizes the students with the principles and techniques for object-oriented software development. The students will use UML and an object-oriented language such as Java or C++ to complete a term programming project. Course contents: 1. Object-oriented modeling with UML 2. Object-oriented languages and environments 3. Object-oriented software development process 3.1 Object-oriented analysis - requirement analysis, use case analysis, conceptual models, finite state machine models 3.2 Object-oriented design - real use cases, collaboration diagrams, class design diagrams, design patterns 3.3 Construction - mapping design to codes 4. Term project.
progress:
1. This course covers object-oriented modeling for software development. Materials covered include class models, state models, and interaction models in UML, a reference process model based on Unified process, implementation issues, and software engineering principles. This course is thinking and programming-intensive.
2. Students are required to complete a non-trivial software project. Only object-oriented languages such as C++/Java/C# are allowed. A project team may have 1-4 students. A single person team is allowed but is not encouraged.
3. There will be no exams; instead, there are 7 homework assignments, several in-class exercises, and two project reviews. All assignments turned in must be typed (handwriting will not be accepted).

name: iOS 應用程式開發
syllabus:
Apple推出iPhone以及iPhone SDK 後，造成了一股不可擋的智慧型手機革命，由於相較於桌上型和筆記型電腦，手機是人們日常生活中更容易貼近使用的行動裝置，因此，手機中的App 更可以幫助人們解決生活中的問題。
本課程將由最基本的入門點切入，前段會先帶領同學針對Swift語法，委派設計(Delegate)模式等iOS入門的幾大難題上課，接著利用Storyboard建構出常見的iOS app 使用者介面，結合感測器網路等功能開發各種應用程式。

name: 機器學習
syllabus:
This course covers a broad classes of machine learning algorithms. After taking this course, students should be able to conduct research in this field. The emphasis of this course is not in the theoretical development (math), but in the understanding level. Therefore, many examples will be given in the lecture to show how to apply the equations to real problems. The detailed contents are given in the course schedule field.

Prerequisite: Calculus (partial derivatives), undergrad linear algebra (eigenvalues & eigenvectors), undergrad probability (random variable, joint density, Gaussian distribution), and programming skills (Python)
progress:
Week 1: Class announcement and introduction to machine learning
Week 2: introduction to machine learning (cont'd)
Week 3: Basics of supervised learning (classification and regression), VC dimension, Bayesian decision theory, and Naive Bayes classifiers 
Week 4: Dimension reduction techniques: PCA, FA, LDA and ICA, 
Week 5: Unsupervised learning: Clustering algorithm (k-means)
Week 6: Decision trees: ID3, C4.5, and bagging algorithm (random forest)
Week 7: Basics of optimization
Week 8: Basics of optimization (Cont'd) and gradient search
Week 9: MT
Week 10: MT sol.  
Week 11: Feedforward neural networks with examples: multi-layer perceptrons, Back propagation, and Regularization methods
Week 12: Deep learning and convolutional neural networks
Week 13, 14: More on deep neural networks: YOLO, Autoencoder, LSTM, and advanced topics, such as Bayesian networks, confidence of classification, and self-supervised learning 
Week 15: SVM, Adaboost, and Ensemble learning
Week 16: Design and analysis of experiments
Week 17:  Reinforcement learning
Week 18: Final exam
grading:
MT 30 %
Final 40 %
HW 30 %
Project 10 % (optional)
textbook: Course PPT files are available for students.

name: 雲端與物聯網安全
syllabus:
This course will introduce Google Cloud computing-related technologies to give students a comprehensive understanding of the Google Cloud platform, architecture, services, and programming. Course contents include 1. Cloud storage system architecture, storage network, and virtualization technology, 2. Business continuity operation storage technology, 3. Storage architecture security and management, 4. Cloud scheduling technology, performance, and security, 5. Virtualization Data center construction - virtual computing, storage, network, desktop, and applications, 6. Cloud services and management, 7. Introduction to cloud computing development and enterprise applications, 8. Internship courses and special projects. After the mid-term exam, we will begin to introduce the Internet of Things and development trends, Week 11 Internet of Things information security issues and trends, Week 12 Internet of Things information security detection technology, Week 13 Internet of Things information security detection technology and implementation, Week 14 Internet of Things Security risk assessment, Week 15 final special production, Week 16 final special production, Week 17 final special report, Week 18 final report. 

本課程將導入  Google 雲端運算相關技術，使學生對Google 雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.實習課程與專題計畫。
期中考後將開始介紹物聯網與發展趨勢，第11週物聯網資訊安全問題與趨勢，第12週物聯網資訊安全檢測技術，第13週物聯網資訊安全檢測技術與實現，第 14 週物聯網安全風險評估，第 15 週期末專題製作，第16週期末專題製作，第 17 週期末專題報告，第 18 週期末報告

name: 區塊鏈技術與應用
syllabus:
區塊鏈技術(作為比特幣等數位貨幣的核心)已重塑了金融交易與分散式交互方式之未來。同時它也被期待帶給我們一個更自組與可提供事實證明的數位化世界。抽象化區塊鏈構造是非常精巧的，它倚賴輕量化密碼學工具搭配分散式系統概念，完成了開放、安全且有效率的系統(如比特幣)。本課程為區塊鏈技術與應用上之概念介紹，包含：比特幣與區塊鏈設計、相關基礎密碼學工具、分散式網路與共識、區塊鏈應用。
Blockchain techniques (the core of cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin) have reshaped the future of financial transactions and decentralized interactions. They are also expected to bring us a more self-organizing and dependent digital world. The abstraction of blockchain is very delicate. It relies on cryptography tools and decentralized system concepts to achieve an open, secure, and efficient system (such as Bitcoin). This course aims to introduce the concepts of blockchain techniques and applications, including Bitcoin and blockchain design, basic cryptography tools, decentralized networks and consensus, and blockchain applications.

name: 保有隱私與安全計算
syllabus:
實現計算已從傳統地本地端機器獨立完成，進而委託上雲端等服務提供者協力完成。然而隨著資料或應用的授權，相關的計算安全性必須重新被探討。本課程將會從資料的隱密性出發，探討如何使用同態加密法輕鬆完成一個安全的授權計算，進而利用其他輕量化元件(混淆電路、私密分享)來取代同態加密並重新設計授權計算協定。接著會轉往定義資料的隱私性，並介紹k匿名等去識別化技術，最終帶入現今最嚴謹的差分隱私。透過上述之保有隱私與安全方法，將著名的人工智慧與機器學習演算法導入授權計算之中，重構不同情境的新型態安全計算框架。
The implementation of computation has been completed independently from the local machine, and then outsourced to the cloud (or some service providers) to complete it. However, with the delegation of data or applications, accordingly the security of such computation must be revisited. This course will start from the data confidentiality, discuss how to use homomorphic encryption to easily complete a secure outsourced computation, and then use other lightweight components (garbled circuit, secret sharing) to replace homomorphic encryption and redesign the secure protocols. Then it will move to define the privacy of data, introduce de-identification techniques such as k-anonymity, and finally bring the most rigorous notion of differential privacy. Through the above-mentioned methods of preserving privacy and security, artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms are introduced into the outsourced computation to reconstruct a new type of the framework for different scenarios.
progress:
1. Intro to privacy and security with computation
2. Cryptography basic
3. Homomorphic encryption (HE) I
4. Homomorphic encryption (HE) II
5. Applications of HE
6. Secret sharing (SS) I
7. Secret sharing (SS) II
8. Applications of SS
9. Project progress report
10. Garbled circuit I
11. Garbled circuit II
12. Privacy definition
13. Differential privacy I
14. Differential privacy II
15. Privacy preserving machine learning
16. Advanced topics
17. Final project presentation
18. Final project presentation
grading:
Class participation 10%
Quizzes and exercises 40%
Projects 50%

name: 資料科學原理與教育數據應用
syllabus:
資料科學是個跨領域的重要興新學科，其基本知識含括資訊、線性代數、機率與統計等，相關技術可應用在許多領域上，包含教育領域。本課程從學科整體介紹開始，討論資料科學中各主要階段的相關議題：包含資料搜尋擷取、資料整理與問題發想、數理知識回顧與討論、資料分析建模與方法、資料呈現與視覺化等。除課堂上講授與討論外，課程亦著重如何實際應用所學，將使用教育資料並以小組方式進行議題發想與分析實作的學期專題。此外，為強化健全資料視覺呈現課題，在實作專題中課程亦著重學生報告能力的培養，希望培育出全方位的資料科學人才。
Data science is an emerging interdisciplinary field that explores how to produce or create the valuable information and knowledge from large, multi-typed, or unstructured data and provides effective feedbacks to many applications, including education. The related topics include data processing and computing, data storage, statistics and probability, linear algebra, and data analysis. This course introduces the rapidly growing field, discusses the state-of-art techniques, and provides students with the fundamental related knowledge as well as the ability to use software tools. The major phases on data manipulation- collection, preparation, analytics, and presentation, in data science will be discussed. The training of this course is toward equipping students with the general mindset and the ability to solve problems practically with the learned techniques on educational data with project groups. In addition, the students also need to practice the presentation for the findings and results of the studied problem in order to equip with the ability to convey the thoughts well and demonstrate things visually. The major objective of this course is to cultivate talents in data science.

-An Overview (with introduction on educational data)
-Mathematical Preliminaries
-Data Munging
-Scores and Rankings
-Statistical Analysis
-Visualizing Data
-Mathematical Models
-Linear Algebra
-Linear and Logistic Regression
-Distance and Network Methods
-Machine Learning
-Case Study: Practical Applications on Education Data
-Project Demo

name: 安全程式設計
syllabus:
安全程式設計是資訊安全領域中的關鍵技術。不良的「程式設計習慣」和「不考慮安全保護的程式設計」很容易導致可有心人士所利用。
本課程除了建立安全程式設計的基礎知識外，特別著重於同學的實務能力、漏洞測試、與安全程式開發能力。同時，透過分享最新的論文研究與相關技術報告，協助研究生在研究階段獲取最新的領域知識。
Security programming is a key technology in the field of information security. “Bad programming habits” and “programming without security consideration” can easily lead to the use of malicious people. Four major themes will be explored.
In addition to establishing the basic knowledge of security programming, this course focuses on student's practical ability, vulnerability testing, and security programming development ability. At the same time, by sharing novel research papers and related technical reports, the students can obtain the newest and complete domain knowledge in their research stage.
progress:

3. 靜態分析
4. 程式安全漏洞原理分析

6. 動態分析

name: 智慧顯示與感測含實習(II)
syllabus: 本課程主要是讓修課同學對顯示面板相關的理論與產業動向有初步的認識，除了透過產業導師的教導與實地工廠的見習，讓同學在最短的時間內對現今顯示面板產業有初步的認識，也將進行各種液晶原件的製作與相關光電物理特性的量測與應用，藉此訓練修課同學能成為顯示面板的初階人才。

name: 影像處理
syllabus:
The course aims to learn how digital images are practiced in real-world applications, especially in medical images and computer vision.
This class will introduce the image's composition, image adjustment, composition, and even feature extraction for radiomics to apply to image detection and recognition. We will introduce some popular image processing algorithms about image processing and implement them in medical imaging projects.

name: 電磁與近物實驗
syllabus: 在同學修完電磁學與近代物理後，藉由本實驗課程驗證所學之理論，訓練儀器操作技巧與數據分析之能力。電磁學方面包括有：庫侖定律與鏡像電荷實驗、密立根油滴實驗、電容與介電常數測定、電磁感應與電感測定、電感與電容器儲能實驗、霍爾效應實驗、微波實驗；而近代物理部分則涵蓋：原子光譜量測實驗、黑體輻射實驗、空腔輻射實驗、光電效應實驗、電子繞射實驗、法蘭克-赫茲實、與太陽能電池特性量測等實驗。

name: 英文溝通與應用(二)
syllabus: The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

name: 勞作教育
syllabus:
本課程目標是協助學生透過校園環境整理及打掃體驗活動，認識勞作教育之理念，從勞作課程中養成同學不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的企業家精神，使學生透過實際的勞作課程，培養學生手腦並用，勤勞愛物的觀念，培養學生健全的人格、良好品德、正確的價值觀及刻苦耐勞的工作態度。
課程內容：包含四大階段
（一）勞作教育理念介紹：選取勞作教育相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含勞作教育意義、勞作教育前測作業說明
（二）勞作教育實作階段：勞作課程分三項不同情境施作。
（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須於各實作階段課程進行討論與反思，並撰寫心得報告、完成後測作業。
（四）期末成果分享：勞作教育期末成果分享，並辦理獎勵工作。
The purpose of this course is to introduce the idea of labor service to students. Students who take this course have to participate in the campus cleaning activities. This is to help students building up: (i) the team-work abilities; (ii) the concepts of ethics; (iii) the abilities of concerning the society. In addition, the course would help students to develop the accurate attitudes in the daily life and the healthy personalities. Furthermore, this course would also help students to enrich the sense of humanities. Four stages are included in this course: (i) the introduction of the labor service, (ii) the field work studies, (iii) the class discussions, and (iv) sharing of the experiences of the labor service.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 學院指定向度-人文與藝術
微積分
syllabus: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。

The course is designed for chemical engineering major. The topics explore chemistry at a greater depth and with more emphasis on concepts, problems, and calculations. Topics include significant figures, thermochemistry, gases, quantum theory and the electronic structure of atoms, periodic relationships, chemical bonding, chemical reaction, oxidation-reduction reaction, chemical kinetics, chemical equilibrium, acids and bases, changes of states, synthetic polymer materials, electrochemistry.

name: 影像處理
syllabus:
The course aims to learn how digital images are practiced in real-world applications, especially in medical images and computer vision.
This class will introduce the image's composition, image adjustment, composition, and even feature extraction for radiomics to apply to image detection and recognition. We will introduce some popular image processing algorithms about image processing and implement them in medical imaging projects.

name: 奈米光學薄膜
syllabus:
本課程的主題將集中於奈米薄膜的光學性質，討論介質以及金屬鍍膜材料所製作的奈米結構。本課程將介紹許多新穎的應用，包括完美抗反射、偏極轉換器、偏極分光器與完美波片。進一步根據局部電漿效應對於金屬與介質複合薄膜的影響可發展超穎材料薄膜。本課程包含設計、製程與量測，透過課程學習，學生可學會奈米光學薄膜的完整知識。
(1)課程簡介(2)斜向沉積技術技術(3)光學非均向薄膜(4)等效介質理論(5)表面電漿理論 (6)長程表面電漿 (7)超穎材料 (8)完美抗反射與波板 (9)感測技術 (10)仿生薄膜 (11)偏極態量測 (12)橢圓偏光儀

name: 非線性光纖光學與應用
syllabus: Owing to the relatively small fiber core, many third order nonlinearity effect including self-phase modulation, four wave mixing, stimulated Raman scattering will be excited as high intensity pulsed light propagation in fiber.  In addition, the nonlinearity will be enhanced by means of novel fiber such as photonics crystal fiber or tapered fiber.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of optical fiber and propagation theory (Nonlinear Schrödinger equation) to simulate different kind of nonlinear optical phenomenon.  In addition, it will introduce the principle of the mode-locked fiber laser and variety soliton dynamics.

name: 光學系統設計
syllabus: The class is to introduce some basic knowledge about optical design systems such as the matrix formalism of geometrical optics and aberrations. Moreover, this class is to provide the students with experience in modeling the theory and applications for optical system design, using commonly used software tools such as RSoft, LightTools and CODEV. Student will also learn more system design such as the solar dish receiver and laser system from professional specialist faculties from Synopsis.

學院指定向度-創新與創業
電子學實習(二)
syllabus:
電子學實習的課程在教授測試跟設計類比電路，在課程中將會介紹基本的儀器使用說明、電子零件之認識、二極體電路（特性）、電晶體電路（特性）、線性電壓調整器及濾波器等應用。課程在規劃搭配原理的介紹及電路的模擬與實務的驗證，以專案式的教學作為學習的導向。
The course of the electronics experiment laboratory teaches testing and designing of analog circuits. The course will introduce basic instrumentation instructions and understanding of electronic parts, including diode circuits (characteristics), transistor circuits (characteristics), linear voltage regulators and filters, and electronics applications. The course introduces the principle of electronics, the simulation of the circuit, and practical verification of circuits with project learning-based teaching methods.

name: 國語文實務應用
syllabus:
本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。 
    奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

name: 線性代數
syllabus:
本課程中英雙語授課。This course will be taught bilingually in Chinese and English. 

線性代數為科學與工程的基礎數學工具，本課程教授線性代數的基本概念與運算技巧。課程大綱包括：矩陣、線性聯立方程組、線性轉換、向量空間、特徵值及特徵向量、正交性與最小平方估計。
This course Linear Algebra
- is a mathematics course.
- is useful and fundamental to EECS/CSIE (and many other discipline) students.
- emphasizes both computations and concepts.
- asks you to use mathematical software packages (MATLAB, Scilab, or Octave) to solve linear algebra problems.
- guides you to read an English textbook.
- requires hard work.
本課程
- 為數學課
- 為電資/資工領域(及許多其他專業領域)學生基礎課程
- 計算與概念並重
- 要求使用數學套裝軟體解線性代數問題
- 引導同學閱讀英文教科書
- 需要同學用功讀書
progress:
課程資料將透過北科i學園+、FB、Teams、或Zuvio公布。
課程進度：
1. Matrix Operations (Sections 2.1 and 2.2) 矩陣運算
- To learn basic matrix arithmetic operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication power, transpose, and inverse. 矩陣加、減、乘、乘方、轉置、反矩陣
2. Linear Equations (Sections 1.1 to 1.5) 線性方程式
- To understand the basic terminologies and notations of matrices and systems of linear equations, in the forms of vector equation and matrix equation. 線性聯立方程組、向量方程式、矩陣方程式
- Solving a system of linear equations by reducing a matrix to its echelon form. 解線性聯立方程組、階梯型式
Test #1
3. Introduction to Linear Independence and Linear Transformation (Sections 1.7, 1.8, and 2.3) 線性獨立與線性轉換
- First exposure to key concepts such as linear independence and linear transformation. 線性獨立與線性轉換初探
- More about the matrix inverse. 更多有關反矩陣
- To summarize the concepts for systems of n linear equations in n unknowns. 綜整n個變數n個線性方程式
Midterm Exam
3. Vector Spaces (Chapter 4) 向量空間
- Introduction to vector spaces. 向量空間簡介
- Fundamental subspaces of a matrix: column space, row space, and null space. 矩陣子空間：行空間、列空間、零空間
- Basis, coordinate system and dimension. 基底、座標系統和維度
Test #2
4. Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors (Chapter 5) 特徵值與特徵向量
- To understand the meaning of eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a matrix, and the approaches to find them. 矩陣特徵值與特徵向量的意義與計算方式
- Diagonalization of a matrix (linear transformation). 矩陣的對角化
5.  Orthogonality and Least Squares (Chapter 6) 正交性與最小平方
- To introduce inner product of vectors, and thus the geometric concepts of length, distance, and angle (perpendicularity). 向量內積，長度、距離、角度(垂直)
- To be familiar with the use of orthogonal bases. 正交基底
- Least-Squares approximation. 最小平方估計
Final Exam
grading:

本課程原則上不接受期中撤選，請非本班同學三思後再加選，另人數不得超過教室容量。

Classroom Rules (上課規範):  “尊重自己、也尊重他人學習的權益”
1. 請準時上課，不遲到早退。
2. 非經允許，上課時不可使用手機、平板、筆電等電子用品。手機請關機或調成靜音。
3. 上課時請專心於此課程之學習，非討論時間請避與他人交談。
4. 如有短暫急事，得在不影響他人上課的情形自行離開教室，並請迅速回座。
5. 如有事無法出席請盡量事先請假，並須有相關證明文件。
6. 習題可討論但勿抄襲。
違反以上規範者，將視情節輕重扣分。另請同學共同維護教室整潔。

name: 中文與台灣文化介紹
syllabus:
中文課程共分四年三階段授課。
第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。
第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。
第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. 
In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language.
In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. 
In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

name: 雲端運算與應用
syllabus:
課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.大量資料運算及案例分析，9.Hadoop 與 Mapreduce，10.雲端運算之SaaS架構，11.實習課程與專題計畫。

Big Data Computing and Case Study, 9. Hadoop and Mapreduce, 10. Cloud SaaS, 11. Lab. and Final Project.

name: 任務和系統設計驗證確認
syllabus:
本課程將包含兩部分，太空任務分析和設計(SMAD)和驗證、確認和測試(VVT)。太空任務分析和設計旨在確保整體計劃的可行性和成功，而驗證、確認和測試則是為了確保實際系統能夠在極端的太空條件下成功運行。在本課程中，第一部分任務分析和設計將提及諸多技術，並以小型衛星為範例說明包含設計和降低成本的過程，當中也會包含有關多衛星製造、太空電腦、酬載設計等的細節。第二部分包括測試硬件和軟件性能、確認系統可靠性、驗證數據傳輸和確保儀器功能。詳細的細節會包含VVT作用的解釋、系統開發中VVT會具有的活動、測試/非測試系統的VVT方法等。

Space Mission Analysis and Design (SMAD) ensures the viability and success of the overall program, while Verification, Validation, and Testing (VVT) ensures that the actual system can operate successfully under extreme space conditions. In this course, Part I, "Mission Analysis and Design," will refer to these techniques, placing more emphasis on the process of designing and reducing the cost of small spacecraft and including more details on multi-satellite manufacturing, space computers, payload design. The second part, "VVT", included testing hardware and software performance, confirming system reliability, verifying data transfer and ensuring instrument functionality. The details of VVT include explaining the role of VVT, system development VVT activities, and VVT methods for test/non-test systems.

1. The Space Mission Analysis and Design Proces
2. Mission Characterization
3. Mission Evaluation
4. Requirements Definition
5. VVT Systems and Process
6. Canonical Systems VVT Paradigm
7. Methodology Application of VVT
grading:
Midterm examination: 50%
Final report: 50%

[2] L. Wiley J. and W. James R., Space Mission Analysis and Design, 3rd ed., vol. 8. Microcosm, 2005.

name: 複雜系統專案管理
syllabus:
複雜系統專案管理是一種專門用於複雜項目的管理技巧。它使用分項管理方法，來預測和了解不斷變化的應用環境，確保複雜的工程項目的品質和成本，以及確保計劃準時完成。它由深入的規劃、品質管理、問題解決、進度及準確的檢測和調整所組成，並從團隊中運用整合協調和溝通管理，確保具備競爭優勢的項目順利達成。課程中包含，複雜系統專案概念，管理能力、架構、流程、方法等。
Project management of complex systems is a management technique specifically designed for complex projects. It uses an itemized management approach to predict and understand the different application environments, ensure the quality and cost of complex projects, and ensure that programs are completed on time. This course includes complex systems project concepts, management capabilities, structures, processes, and methodologies.

name: 進階太空系統工程
syllabus:
本課程為衛星系統的進階課程，課程內容介紹整體衛星系統工程的實務運作，考量一個衛星系統於規格設計、材料選用、次系統製造、系統測試等各種不同階段的運作，並以立方衛星之介紹為範例。
This course is an advanced course for satellite systems. The content of the course introduces the practical operation of the overall satellite system engineering. We will introduce factors for the design or developing a satellite system at different stages such as system specification, design, component selection, sub-system research and manufacturing ,and component/ subsystem/system level testing. The practical cubesat design experience will be one of the examples discussed in the course .

name: 太空科技專題討論
syllabus:
太空科技應用課程旨在介紹太空技術在各種應用領域的應用，並探討太空科技如何影響人類生活和科學研究。課程涵蓋的主題包括：太空探索，地球觀測，通訊和衛星導航，太空工程和材料科學，太空生物學和醫學，太空經濟和商業。通過這些主題的介紹，學生將了解太空科技在各個領域的應用和未來發展方向，並能夠掌握相關技術和知識。
The Space Technology Application Course aims to introduce the application of space technology in various fields, and explore how space technology impacts human life and scientific research. The course covers topics including space exploration, Earth observation, communication and satellite navigation, space engineering and materials science, space biology and medicine, and space economy and business. Through the introduction of these topics, students will understand the application of space technology in various fields and future development directions, and be able to master relevant technologies and knowledge.

name: 大數據技術與管理
syllabus:
由於雲端運算的快速發展，大量資料收集與儲存技術已成瓶頸，大數據技術與管理提供一套具延展性與容錯能力的分散儲存與計算架構, 能有效處理大量複雜數據資料的儲存與運算。
本課程除介紹現有的大數據生態與趨勢，並針對目前軟硬體架構的處理瓶頸，提供系統組態與部署、服務層級協定、監控與管理等系統性規劃的解決方案，並導入跨領域的工程管理科學知識。課程簡扼論述大數據技術與管理的重要，並在Hadoop生態系統中，以Cloudera Hadoop為應用範例，實作說明其重要性。
課程內容包括：大數據的概念、應用生態與趨勢、Hadoop硬體規格與基礎架構規劃、叢集組態與部署、叢集服務層級協定、叢集監控與管理、相關生態技術。

syllabus: The goal of this course is to give students a broad overview of state-of-the-art deep learning algorithms, and teach students how to develop deep learning applications by hands-on coding examples. Most examples taught in this class are based on the TensorFlow framework. We will cover many different fields including image classification, object detection, natural language processing, reinforcement learning and generative adversarial networks.

name: 進階C語言實務
syllabus:
C/C++語言是廣泛能與硬體溝通的高階程式語言，無論是在傳統UNIX系統、3D影像虛擬視覺化設計、中介語言等應用上，是新一代程式語言開發的基石。C/C++語言的跨平台的通用性和深層的記憶體管理機制，透過進階的C/C++語言的學習，使其更靈活地發揮在各項專案設計中。本課程會以基礎C/C++語言的回顧為開始，並將C/C++語言帶入位元操作與物件化內容，最後導入電腦圖學與高效能平行化計算等應用。
The C/C++ language is a high-level programming language that can communicate with a wide range of hardware, and is the basis for the next generation of programming language development, whether in traditional UNIX systems, 3D image virtualization design, intermediary languages, etc. The cross-platform versatility and deep memory management mechanism of the C/C++ language make it more flexible for various project designs through advanced C/C++ language learning. This course will begin with a review of the basic C/C++ language, move on to bit manipulation and object-based content, and finally lead to applications such as computer graphics and high-performance parallel computing.
progress:
1. 資料型態、變數與陣列(Data types, variables and arrays)
2. 指標與其特殊使用環境(Pointer and its special usage environment)
3. 位元操作(Bit manipulation)
4. 靜態動態記憶體配置(Static / dynamic memory configuration)
5. 物件化的C/C++操作(Object-based C/C++ operations)
6. 資料結構的應用(Data structure applications)
7. 電腦圖學應用(Computer graphics applications)
8. 平行化應用(Parallelization applications)
grading: 作業與說明(Assignment and Report) 100%
textbook:
[1] Hipson, Peter D. Advanced C. Sams, 1992.
[2] Van der Linden, Peter. Expert C programming: deep C secrets. Prentice Hall Professional, 1994.

name: 智慧型演化計算
syllabus:
自然界的進化行為一直人類賦予計算機智慧學習的對象，但仿效自然界中生物間的適應性過程，建構出的龐大模型，一直是在一項艱鉅的挑戰，但不諱言的他的回報也是巨大的。進化計算便是基於生物遺傳學、自然選擇和出現的適應性行為等進化機制，建立出來的智慧型模型，以利智慧系統的建立。本課程將介紹各項演化計算方式，並以實作的方式實際了解彼此間的差異。
The evolutionary behavior of nature has always been the object of learning that man has endowed computer intelligence with. However, the construction of huge models that emulate the adaptive processes among organisms in nature has been a difficult challenge, but the rewards have been enormous. Evolutionary computation is an intelligent model based on evolutionary mechanisms such as biological genetics, natural selection, and emergent adaptive behaviors to facilitate the establishment of intelligent systems. This course will introduce the various evolutionary computation methods and provide a practical understanding of the differences between them in a hands-on manner.
progress:
1. Introduction of evolutionary algorithm
2. Simple Genetic Algorithm
3. Evolution Strategy
4. Evolutionary Programming
5. Genetic Programming
6. Direction based Search
7. Implementation Encoding and Operators
8. Selection Methods
9. Replacement and Stop Criteria
10. Parameter Control
11. Performance Evaluation
12. Ant Colony Optimization
13. Particle Swarm Optimization
14. Artificial Immune Systems
grading:
作業與說明(Assignment and Report) 60%
期末報告(Final report) 40%
textbook:
[1] De Jong, Kenneth A. "Evolutionary computation: a unified approach." Proceedings of the Companion Publication of the 2015 Annual Conference on Genetic and Evolutionary Computation. 2015.
[2] Dumitrescu, Dumitru, et al. Evolutionary computation. CRC press, 2000.
